story:
Where Beauty is Peace of Mind 

 

When it comes to  and hair/ make up styling, it was naturally the next step for me to venture out on my own.  When I would design the beauty aspect for the brides, it would often turn full styling services for the entire wedding.

 

I've worked for a big box salons, where all they care about is the sale. If you didn't have the right kind of money, you got less customer service.   I saw women break down from self-esteem  issues or an over abundance of nerves.  I knew then that this was more than just a job.  When you encounter stylists that are overwhelmed with 2 and 3 appointments at a time, it makes the woman feel less appreciated. Every woman deserves to feel beautiful, cherished, exquisite and honored. That's why I created "beauty to behold" to be an ON-Site concept. It's a idea where we transcend hair and make-up trials, bridal gown shopping, as well as award show styling.

As a contributor, you will be a key player in creating a space where women are seen as human beings. They will feel love, peace and become confident that the desired look can be achieved.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get 

We need $20,000 to finish BYUTE hair care system, custom strip lashes and session kits for our artists. We have chosen to create our own hair care system that's keratin based, sodium free, thermal protective and restorative to the hair. As well as full cruelty free 3D mink lashes niche for brides.  Here are a few perks.... YAY!

Travel size product

A Full size product and any great services to choose from on your birthday

GO Getter Membership 

Full Sponsorship 

We chose Flex- Funding. Should we not reach our goal, the funds raised will still go towards our product line creation of BYUTE Professional Hair Care & Lashes. It may take us a bit longer to get our desired amount of product but we will not stop the fight!

The Impact

I can't do this alone. It takes a village to raise a child and building a dream needs a team. YOU ARE A PART OF THAT TEAM! 

When a woman gets ready to look for a wedding, it can be one of the most unsure moments in her life. I worked over 15 years in the beauty and bridal fashion world and I've seen it happen first hand. I've seen women get turned away because of size, money, language barrier, and sexual orientation. So we want to give back. I want to bring back the Peace and Love this world is missing. I want to empower women in the one moment that should mean the most. By contributing to this campaign you are in fact giving women in our Metro Atlanta area a chance to have peace in loving themselves.

Risks & Challenges

I understand this is a BIG vision. I understand it comes with risks like:

Do women want a one stop shop? 

Yes! I've talked to all of my previous clients and they wish they had a place where beauty services are in one place.

Isn't the market over-saturated with salons in Atlanta?

If this was only a  salon, I would answer yes. However, this is an elite version of a on-site salon. I know of no other place like it in the U.S. 

Other Ways You Can Help!

Share on your social media outlets (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snap Chat)! We need all the sharing and exposure we can get. 

Giving money is a sacrifice, but an even greater one is giving your time. If it's not you who can give monetarily, then talk to someone who can! Crusading for the uplifting of women is just as important as giving to the cause!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

 

THE FEATURED SECTIONS

The Lashes:

  • The Binky- a baby lash with natural glam for the boho chic bride
  • The Blusher- Perfect for any brides who wants add a bit of drama
  • The Banger- for the girl who wants to flutter her way to the alter
  • The Boss-  for a strong bride who knows what she wants
  • The Baddie- For the sexy chic bride who wants to be seen
  • The Bombshell- for the bride who will strut down the aisle

The Hair Care

SHAMPOO
With Keratin Protein & ProVitamin B5

This Keratin-infused shampoo gently smoothes and softens while adding strength to prevent breakage. Plant extracts help reduce frizz and fly-aways, leaving the hair silky and shiny. Removes build-up on hair and scalp. Great for wavy, curly and frizzy hair. Safe for colored, straightened and chemically-treated hair. Alcohol, paraben, sulfate and sodium chloride-free. UV & thermal protectant. pH balanced.

CONDITIONER
With Keratin, Soy Protein & Coconut Oil

A daily conditioner infused with Keratin, helps to seal the cuticle and reduce frizz leaving it smooth and shiny. Plant extracts and conditioners strengthen, repair, and restore elasticity. Locks out humidity. Perfect follow-up to a Keratin smoothing treatment or chemical straightening service. Safe for colored, straightened and chemically-treated hair. Alcohol, paraben, sulfate and sodium chloride-free. pH balanced.

MASQUE
With Aloe, Rosemary Extract & Keratin Protein
Restores & Smooths

A reconstructive hair masque, infused with Keratin and nutrients, repairs and rebuilds elasticity. Adds moisture and leaves hair deeply nourished, smooth and shiny without weighing it down. Safe for colored, straightened and chemically-treated hair. Alcohol, paraben, sulfate and sodium chloride-free. UV protectant. pH balanced.

SERUM
With Red Algae, ProVitamin B5 & Keratin
Smooths & Seals

This amazing Keratin-infused leave-in serum seals the cuticle to control frizz.Tames wild curls, making them shiny and bouncy. When used with heat, hair’s shine and smoothing are intensified. Color Safe. Alcohol, paraben and sodium chloride-free. UV protectant.

story:
Summary

My name is Shawndria McCoy and I am a North Carolina native (yes, an east coast girl).  My passion is and has always been in the fashion accessory industry, in particular shoes.  It's been a dream for the past 8 years to start my own shoe line, but not just any shoe line.  I have struggled all of my life, even when I was a young girl, finding shoes that fit my feet comfortably.  I was in middle school wearing a size 11 and by college I had grown to a size 13.  Shoes of that size were very hard to find and when I did find them, I was only able to wear them for a short time before they started hurting....BADLY!  All women want to have shoes that they can wear all the time without any discomfort.  Who wants to have to take several pairs of shoes with them daily to accommodate for their mobility or work or other activities?  No one.  It is my desire and vision of Esemelle Shoes to create shoes for women who, like me, have challenges finding shoes in larger sizes that fit their feet comfortably.  Esemelle's staple is "Comfortability, Affordability, Accessibility, all with a Chic Look".

It is the long-term goal and vision of Esemelle Shoes to give back to the community by providing shoes to the less advantaged population in the United States and abroad.  We understand the needs of women all over the world and there are women in other countries that do not have the means to obtain shoes that feet their feet.  We would like to ultimately donate a a wealth of shoes to these poverty stricken countries.  As a Contributor and Supporter of our brand, you will help us to achieve this goal and hopefully surpass it.  We all see the videos on television showing individuals in poverty stricken countries with no shoes on their feet.  When will we stop looking at these individuals and help them?  Helping is not an insurmountable task, but it does require funds to do it.  This is why Esemelle is so passionate about what it is doing and the visions and objectives it will accomplish.  However, we cannot do it without your support.

What We Need & What You Get

Esemelle Shoes is seeking at least $80,000 in funding, which will be used solely for the startup of the business.  Specifically, the funds will go towards the shoe design process, trademarks, manufacturing, branding and marketing, and hiring 1 employee.  As a Contributor, you will get to select a shoe from our first phase designs to have made in your size (for yourself or give as a gift to a deserving lady).  You will receive a 50% discount on your first shoe order (once the shoes are manufactured) and free standard shipping for all orders over $75.  In the event Esemelle Shoes does not raise the needed funds (our goal amount), all monies raised will go specifically to the design and manufacturing process only and the company will not hire any additional employees.  We can assure you that any funds raised, no matter how great or how small, will not be wasted or misused.  We manage our books professionally and consistently and will certainly be able to account for every penny we collect.  If at any time a Contributor has any question about any funds and how they are being used, we will gladly provide that information.

With our future goal of being able to donate shoes to the less advantaged populations around the globe, each Contributor will have their name, if they desire, in one shoe box which is donated so that the recipient will know that it was your support that provided those shoes for them.  This vision is not about Esemelle Shoes getting the credit...we just want to make other ladies happy while they strut their stuff.

The Impact

Your Contribution is valuable because there is a market for this niche and Esemelle Shoes is confident it can and will meet this need.  We have done our research and we have talked to a host of women with this problem who are eagerly waiting and excited about our upcoming spring/summer 2019 debut of our new collection.  It does not end there though...just think of all of the ladies who are unable to purchase shoes or who do not have the means whom our future donation will help.  As a Contributor, whether male or female, you very well may know someone who has the same problem that I do with finding larger sized shoes.  Why not help me to help them?  You don't have to be of any particular gender, age, or sex to be a blessing to someone else.

We are not new to business.  I, the Founder, have built several other successful businesses and I am passionate about all I do.  My life mission has always been to help others and the visions of Esemelle Shoes are no less than.  

Risks & Challenges

The business faces threats of having someone market the same ideas before the business has met the requirements to apply for a trademark or other protections.  The challenges will include marketing to such a large international population and getting the word out to a large enough sector to promote a faster and more consistent profit.

Another risk the business will overcome is the decline in the U.S. economy.  Shoes are a discretionary purchase and online stores are heavily dependent on per capita disposable income and macroeconomic factors that drive consumer spending.  Our branding and intense marketing strategies will keep our shoes in demand.  Because this fashion accessory niche is heavily needed and much sought after, the business will be able to overcome this risk and drive sales consistently.

The product, its timing, potential competitors, and the spending habits of my potential customers are concerns the business must account for and overcome.  The product must solve a problem to get consumers to invest.  Timing needs to address the market at the right time.  Competition from the big or well-known brands must be recognized as customers gravitate to what they are most familiar with.  To overcome this threat, I must recognize and focus on my value and what exactly I am bringing to the market. I must know and understand the buying trends of my potential customers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand there are some who would like to contribute to our campaign and support our efforts, but right now that may not be a possibility for you.  No worries.  We totally understand.  You still have lots of talent you can contribute to help us make this campaign and business a success.  Help us spread the word about Esemelle by posting our campaign on your social media sites.  Let's make some noise!  Tell a friend, coworker, family member or neighbor about our campaign.  No assistance is too small.  We cannot do this alone.  You can also use Indiegogo's share tools located here on this page below.  That's all there is to it.  We greatly appreciate you and all of your support.

I must know and understand the buying trends of my potential customers.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand there are some who would like to contribute to our campaign and support our efforts, but right now that may not be a possibility for you.  No worries.  We totally understand.  You still have lots of talent you can contribute to help us make this campaign and business a success.  Help us spread the word about Esemelle by posting our campaign on your social media sites.  Let's make some noise!  Tell a friend, coworker, family member or neighbor about our campaign.  No assistance is too small.  We cannot do this alone.  You can also use Indiegogo's share tools located here on this page below.  That's all there is to it.  We greatly appreciate you and all of your support.

story:
Our Story 

  • Speckii is the creation of co-founders Luba and Michael. The creative designer of this sibling team, Luba was inspired to create Speckii purely out of necessity. A mother of two, prominent New York City attorney, she found it very frustrating to rummage around the house looking for her glasses in the morning while getting her kids ready for school. That’s when she had her AHA moment, “A home for glasses is an absolute necessity for all busy people around the country.”

  • Speckii’s mission is to bring appealing eyewear storage to all eyewear users around the world. 

  • Speckiis are the coolest way to store your sunglasses and readers at home.
  • We are extremely close to bringing Speckii to the world...you'll want one before everyone else. 
  • It's also an excellent gift for all the sunglass lovers in your life.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $20,000 to buy the machinery for Speckii production.

  • With your pledge, you will get one of the very first Speckiis in the world.
  • Speckii is a subsidiary of OYOBox (www.oyobox.com) who's luxury boxes have won the following endorsements:

The Impact

Speckii will allow you to always SEE-CHOOSE-WEAR your daily glasses with ease.

  • Your jewelry has a home
  • Your watches have a home
  • Now your glasses have a  home with Speckii

 

SPECKII COMES IN 2 VIBRANT COLOR COMBINATIONS

 

  1.  Grey top (grey, white, black)                                        

 

2.  Orange top (Orange, Grey, Black)

 

HOUSES UP TO 5 PAIRS OF YOUR FAVORITE GLASSES

 

WASHABLE INTERIOR LEATHERETTE & SHATTERPROOF WINDOW

 

 

 

SPECKii FITS ALL SIZES FROM YOUR READERS

TO YOUR OVERSIZED SUNNIES

 

 

 

SPECKii  CO-FOUNDERS LUBA & MICHAEL, 

BROTHER, SISTER TEAM!

story:
Medusa gi – the martial arts uniform designed for women

The Medusa gi is the first martial arts uniform designed from scratch specifically for women. The gi has the look of a traditional martial arts uniform with a superior fit tailored for women’s physique. This means that you can train to the max with confidence in your uniform.

Regular gi vs. Medusa gi

Uniforms (gi) are integral to the practice of martial arts. Wearing a smart, crisp uniform is a sign of dedication and commitment and an essential part of a martial artist's identity.

While the traditional gi design is functional, it is crude and boxy. For most women these 'unisex' gi are far too broad in the back and wide in the waist, which means saggy jackets and cuffs that often need to be rolled up. Regular gi are uncomfortable and ill-fitting, and women often have to stop their training to adjust, tuck-in or re-tie their uniform.

These photos of Charlotte, wearing her usual size regular gi (without the usual turn-ups) and wearing the Medusa gi, show the improved fit. 

The Medusa gi has been specifically designed to give the correct fit, flexibility and smart looks for women martial artists. This means they can concentrate on their training, confident that their gi will perform for them.

Revolutionary design for a superior fit

The Medusa gi looks like a traditional uniform, but it’s been designed specifically to fit women. Finally, women martial artists can have a gi that enhances their performance!

Designed by professionals, tested by experts

We have dedicated four years to develop a gi that fits women properly, giving maximum comfort, flexibility and importantly, confidence. We started from scratch, working with Donna Longman, a professional garment designer with years of experience in premium sportswear design.

For us, ‘good’ just isn’t good enough. We want the Medusa gi to be the best uniform you’ve ever worn. Throughout the development phase each prototype was rigorously tested by experienced martial artists. Their feedback has helped shape our initial concepts into the finished Medusa gi we have today. We want you to feel exceptional when training and competing, whatever the challenge.

Traditional looks, performance fit

The Medusa gi blends the ethos of a traditional martial arts uniform with the attitude of performance sportswear design. This means a gi made from crisp, opaque 14oz cotton with correct fit and proportions through the body and carefully considered design details.

About Medusa

We are a team of three martial artists with over 40 years’ experience in competing internationally, teaching and coaching, with a lifelong friendship based on our mutual respect for traditional martial arts.

We have been privileged to meet many dedicated women who are outstanding in their chosen martial art. We are inspired by the skill, strength and commitment of these women, and have made it our mission to honour them with the highest quality uniforms and apparel.

Why are we crowdfunding?

We're really proud of the Medusa gi and the overwhelmingly positive reaction from our testers. Now we are ready for the first production run, but we need £8,250 to finance it - that's where you come in! Show your support for women martial artists by making a donation (look for the 'Back It' link at the top of the page), or choose from our range of perks, including Medusa apparel and the new Medusa gi (we've even got something for the men!).

Sizing

Medusa gi have separately sized jacket and trousers, so you can mix-and-match the fit to suit you. Jackets and trousers will fit women from 160 cm (5'3"); shorter women may need to alter the length of their trousers. For reference, the women in our video and photos are heights from 160 cm to 167 cm tall and are UK size 6 to 10.

Women's Jacket Sizing

Jackets are sized Small (UK 6-8, USA 4-6), Medium (UK 10-12, USA 8-10) and Large (UK 14-16, USA 12-14). 

Women's Trouser Sizing

Trousers (pants) are sized from UK 8 (USA 6) to UK 16 (USA 14). 

If you fall between two size brackets we recommend that you choose the next size up.

If you are unsure which size to choose, please email or message us on Facebook and we will happily help you select the best size. 

 

Timeline

All the design and development phases for the Medusa gi and apparel are complete. Our factory is ready for our order in mid April, and we expect to start shipping in July 2018.

Risks and Challenges

Through the design and development process we have been working with a trusted European factory who understand our products and our demands for the highest quality; they are now waiting for our first order.

Naturally, unexpected delays can happen, but we have put everything in place to mitigate the risks. As with our martial arts practice, we are committed to achieving our goal to deliver the high quality gi that women deserve.
story_txt: Medusa gi – the martial arts uniform designed for womenThe Medusa gi is the first martial arts uniform designed from scratch specifically for women. The gi has the look of a traditional martial arts uniform with a superior fit tailored for women’s physique. This means that you can train to the max with confidence in your uniform.Regular gi vs. Medusa giUniforms (gi) are integral to the practice of martial arts. Wearing a smart, crisp uniform is a sign of dedication and commitment and an essential part of a martial artist's identity.While the traditional gi design is functional, it is crude and boxy. For most women these 'unisex' gi are far too broad in the back and wide in the waist, which means saggy jackets and cuffs that often need to be rolled up. Regular gi are uncomfortable and ill-fitting, and women often have to stop their training to adjust, tuck-in or re-tie their uniform.These photos of Charlotte, wearing her usual size regular gi (without the usual turn-ups) and wearing the Medusa gi, show the improved fit. The Medusa gi has been specifically designed to give the correct fit, flexibility and smart looks for women martial artists. This means they can concentrate on their training, confident that their gi will perform for them.Revolutionary design for a superior fitThe Medusa gi looks like a traditional uniform, but it’s been designed specifically to fit women. Finally, women martial artists can have a gi that enhances their performance!Designed by professionals, tested by expertsWe have dedicated four years to develop a gi that fits women properly, giving maximum comfort, flexibility and importantly, confidence. We started from scratch, working with Donna Longman, a professional garment designer with years of experience in premium sportswear design.For us, ‘good’ just isn’t good enough. We want the Medusa gi to be the best uniform you’ve ever worn. Throughout the development phase each prototype was rigorously tested by experienced martial artists. Their feedback has helped shape our initial concepts into the finished Medusa gi we have today. We want you to feel exceptional when training and competing, whatever the challenge.Traditional looks, performance fitThe Medusa gi blends the ethos of a traditional martial arts uniform with the attitude of performance sportswear design. This means a gi made from crisp, opaque 14oz cotton with correct fit and proportions through the body and carefully considered design details.About MedusaWe are a team of three martial artists with over 40 years’ experience in competing internationally, teaching and coaching, with a lifelong friendship based on our mutual respect for traditional martial arts.We have been privileged to meet many dedicated women who are outstanding in their chosen martial art. We are inspired by the skill, strength and commitment of these women, and have made it our mission to honour them with the highest quality uniforms and apparel.Why are we crowdfunding?We're really proud of the Medusa gi and the overwhelmingly positive reaction from our testers. Now we are ready for the first production run, but we need £8,250 to finance it - that's where you come in! Show your support for women martial artists by making a donation (look for the 'Back It' link at the top of the page), or choose from our range of perks, including Medusa apparel and the new Medusa gi (we've even got something for the men!).SizingMedusa gi have separately sized jacket and trousers, so you can mix-and-match the fit to suit you. Jackets and trousers will fit women from 160 cm (5'3"); shorter women may need to alter the length of their trousers. For reference, the women in our video and photos are heights from 160 cm to 167 cm tall and are UK size 6 to 10.Women's Jacket SizingJackets are sized Small (UK 6-8, USA 4-6), Medium (UK 10-12, USA 8-10) and Large (UK 14-16, USA 12-14). Women's Trouser SizingTrousers (pants) are sized from UK 8 (USA 6) to UK 16 (USA 14). If you fall between two size brackets we recommend that you choose the next size up.If you are unsure which size to choose, please email or message us on Facebook and we will happily help you select the best size.  TimelineAll the design and development phases for the Medusa gi and apparel are complete. Our factory is ready for our order in mid April, and we expect to start shipping in July 2018.Risks and ChallengesThrough the design and development process we have been working with a trusted European factory who understand our products and our demands for the highest quality; they are now waiting for our first order.Naturally, unexpected delays can happen, but we have put everything in place to mitigate the risks. As with our martial arts practice, we are committed to achieving our goal to deliver the high quality gi that women deserve.

story:
Design Process

Making Ossetia comb was a long process. We have created a large number of designs and prototypes. Quality and ergonomics are the most important aspects for us. The final design and size has been chosen for the comfortable use of the comb. Our product features convenience, quality, aesthetic and moderate design. Our combs is designed by us and made by skilled artisans who finish each piece by hand.

Material science.

A lot of time we devoted to the choice of material. It was necessary to choose suitable material, that would be the most long-term, durable and resistant to aggressive environments. We tried a variety of options, but chose a high-quality stainless steel, which has all the qualities listed above.

We do not strive to create much, we crave for quality and convenience.

This project is the result of long and hard work of our team.

We love Indiegogo.

With our design finalized, we are ready to begin production, but we need some help to launch it. You not only help our ideas to become a reality, but you also give us the opportunity to do what we love-without the influence of outside investors. We hope you will join us.

What if you don't raise enough funds before the deadline?

If we don't raise all $4,000 by the completion of this campaign, all funders will be issued a full refund. This means that your donation is completely risk-free. You'll either receive the perk you chose or get your money back, depending on whether we meet our goal.

Shipping: How much is shipping?

Shipping is a standard flat fee of $7 for Europe and the United States, and $8 for the rest of the world.

story:
About Us

Aurea Le' Mon is a high end luxury brand focused on selling upscale lingerie, loungewear, and wine. The brand combines a fusion of Chic, Risque, and Free-Spirit style. But thats not all! We are also a unisex brand expanding our collection one launch at a time. 

The Designer

The brand was discovered through the vision of our Fashion Buyer/Designer, Eliza Cintron, a student at the Art Institutes located in Philadelphia P.A. Along with her passion, Eliza posseses the drive and wherewithal to constantly update and improve the online shopping experience through her eyes. 

Products & Services 

Intimate/Loungewear: We provide high end lingerie, under garments, and loungewear for both men and female. We have high quality fabrics and designs that will make you feel confident in your skin. We also design many transitional pieces that may be worn inside or as couture outerwear.

Custom wine: We customize the best tasting wine. Looking for something sweet that leaves you feeling good? Our wine will keep you coming back for more.

We Stand For

We want to combine a collection of lingerie, intimates and loungewear alongside wine that will have the customer feeling good from the inside out. We want to build a brand that not only allows women to feel confident and sexy but ALL gender, races, or sexualities. We want to increase romance and persons inner sensuality though our designs.

One of our upcoming projects will offer pieces in all skin tones, with a photoshoot portraying different females of all colors embracing each others beauty and their beauty within.

 

Fun Fact

 The name Aurea was inspired from the middle name of an important woman to the CEO/Designer, Eliza Cintron. "My inspiration behind my name "Aurea Le' Mon" is from my mother that passed before she was able to see my success and I plan to show her the strong minded lady she raised and as my biggest supporter let her know all of her hard work was worth it. I will never stop working on my dreams or should I say goals because I am making it a reality."

story:
Who we are?

Margaux & Camilla is a watch brand that chooses to compliment the creative side of who you are as an individual. We each shine in our own way and what better way to express that uniqueness than with a watch that exudes individuality just as much as you. Inspired by automotive luxury, we chose to incorporate the fine touches that we see in vehicles, such as alcantara, leather, and ambient lighting, to make a watch that sets itself apart from the rest. Meticulously crafted with elegant, high-quality materials, you will possess a well designed watch without having to break the bank.

So we invite you to choose your path

Ç'est la vie ... non ç'est ta vie

The Classic

The Classic brings two flavors that will add wonders to anyone that wears it. In La Rose & Le Bordeaux you get two different but distinct looks. La Rose uses rose gold stainless steel with a subtle satin pink and cream as a combination that just melts together. Le Bordeaux on the other hand uses a striking satin burgundy and rose gold stainless steel to add a pop of color to your wrist.

Le Bordeaux - Satin Burgundy Dial w/ Rose Gold Casing

 

La Rose - Satin Pink Dail w/ Rose Gold Casing

 

 

The Chronograph

The Chronograph comes in two styles, La Crème and Le Nuage. La Crème adds a light touch to your wrist blending cream, white and brushed black stainless steel that looks aesthetically pleasing all around. Le Nuage, a warmer tone, mixes warm gray with brushed silver stainless steel for an eye catching look.

 

La Crème - Matte White Dial w/ Black Brushed Casing

 

Le Nuage - Warm Gray Dial w/ Silver Brushed Casing

 

 

Our Chronograph uses a Swiss ISA movement. In a traditional watch you have the hour hand, the minute hand and the second hand. The traditional second hand here does not move with the watch. It remains still and functions with the chronograph. 

We've chosen only the highest quality materials because you deserve nothing less. Our alcantara and leather come straight from Italy. We've also chosen to use Ronda Swiss movements in our classic watch and Swiss ISA movements in our chronograph as they are both trusted Swiss movements and work well over time.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $60K in order for our project to get off the ground. The funds we raise will go into production costs to produce our first batch of watches and to invest into more unique watch designs for you. The more we raise the more we can create for you.

The Perks

For our Early Bird backers you will have a chance to purchase your Margaux & Camilla watch of your choosing for 40%+ off the retail price. This Early Bird pricing is limited so get it before it sells out.

For our Regular Backers you will still have a chance to purchase your Margaux & Camilla watch of your choosing for a percentage off the retail price. There are even bundled packages for even more savings just for you.

If we do not reach our goal then the funds will go back to you. We are in this for a fixed goal and with your help we can achieve it

Risks & Challenges

There are many risks and challenges in achieving a goal such as this. That is why we have worked tirelessly with our manufacturers to make sure that everything that can go wrong is addressed. We factored in a buffer in case there are delays in manufacturing but we are assured that there will be none. If anything happens along the way good or bad we will notify you, our backers, every step of the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't purchase a perk we understand but we ask if you can please share this with your friends and family. We would love for you to be apart of this journey in any way you can.

This is just the start! We hope that you are as excited as we are to see these watches on your wrists!

SINCERELY YOURS,

Margaux & Camilla

Feel free to email us with any questions at info@margauxandcamilla.com or visit our website at margauxandcamilla.com

story:
Our mission is to create a restorative and regenerative circular economy that keeps fashion products, components, and materials at their highest utility and value always. By collaborating with future independent brands and designers who are betting against fast fashion and producing clothes in an ethical way that considers both people and planet, we believe we can create a better, more sustainable world and inspire other visionaries to do more with less by using structured recycled fabrics.

             Our closed-loop system aims to not only reduce textile waste in landfills but will also empower men and women change-makers to spend less time getting dressed, and spend more time pursuing their passions by becoming a better version of themselves and supporting each other to do the same. This new way of consuming and purchasing clothes will hopefully help men and women save time and money, but more importantly, it will help save our planet.

 

We have and are planning to partner up with several emerging independent brands and designers that are established by male and female founders. All the garments are responsibly made right here in the United States and use low impact fabrics. We believe that collaboration is the way of the future.

 

PARAGOD has made its goal to provide a variety of garments that are ethically and responsibly made by brands across the United States. Our clothing selection includes minimal, transitional, and good quality pieces that can be styled to your personal taste to create a diverse capsule wardrobe that takes you from 9am to 9pm.

** To clarify this is an example of a few ideas of 12 piece capsule, this is not exactly what you would be receiving. Capsules will be customized based on your preference and picks at the end of the campaign.**

 

 

 

HOW IT WORKS 
First, you take a brief quiz so we can learn more about you and your lifestyle. Then, shop our online selection of responsibly made independent brands. Choose versatile pieces to build a 6, 8 or 12-piece capsule wardrobe. Then our innovative algorithm mixes and matches your wardrobe essentials and presents you with the possible outfit combinations based on your picks. You can buy the entire capsule or purchase items individually. Our timeless and versatile designs never go out of style, so you’ll always be able to incorporate them into your existing wardrobe.

When ready to change up the essentials, PARAGOD offers an integrated recycling program. Simply send your old capsule clothing items back to us, and we’ll give you a rebate on the next capsule purchase. After we receive the clothing, we give it a new life by reusing the fabrics or recycling the textiles. At PARAGOD, we’re empowering the next generation to see our visions of the lifestyle we all live and how we’re suppose to portray our style into the active world, by providing our conscious consumers to recycle — and to look good while doing it.

BENEFITS 
• Less stress, more productivity.
• Saving money.
• Less decision making (more time to do what you’re passionate about).
• A simplified wardrobe.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At PARAGOD we are dedicated to developing and providing a circular economy that promotes the responsible production and consumption.

Buying ethical, sustainable fashion isn’t just a sale; it’s a solution.

We are committed to working with driven independent brands and designers who share our same ethos to focus on the greater good. We believe collaboration is the new competition. It’s time to let emerging independent brands, designers and forward-thinking entrepreneurial men and women shine. We are building a community of creators, explorers, leaders who think differently about the world. Buying a thoughtful, responsible wardrobes that are well rounded not only makes getting dressed even easier but also provides these hard-working men and women with more time to think about how they’re going to change the world — and how they’re going to support others to do the same.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Funding Breakdown

Goal: $35,000 +

Indiegogo Fee + Transaction Fee  = 8% ($2800)

Web Development   = (Between$8500-9K)

Inventory/ Wholesale = (Between $17K-$20K)

Shipping+ Logistics  =  ($1500-$2K)

Q&A

What are sustainable fabrics?
Sustainable clothing (low impact fabrics) refers to fabrics derived from eco-friendly resources, such as sustainably grown fiber crops or recycled materials. It also refers to how these fabrics are made.

How much does it cost?

Each of our clothing will have different ranging price points varying the style and the amount of material that goes into our garments. We the Paragod family do ensure that our prices will be reasonable.

What happens if the garments don’t fit? Or if I don’t like certain pieces?

We totally understand, that finding the correct fit is SO important when building a wardrobe. That being said, our team is committed to finding you the right pieces of your capsule wardrobe and your lifestyle. After receiving your capsule, you will have 14 days to request an exchange or refund. Our team will work with you find a solution that best fits you, even if that is a refund.

Why is there a shipping cost when FREE shipping was Mentioned for domestic, and international?

We will only offer FREE shipping to those who purchased perks that were more in cost, Your new wardrobe is of high value, and we utilize shipping that guarantees the security of your order.  The small shipping cost ensures your order gets to you safely.

Risks & Challenges

This isn't our first crowdfunding campaign, so we know how to coordinate these products on time and in the high quality. While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details and logistics throughout prototyping, and planning for collaborative production, there is always the chance that unforeseen challenges will arise.

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and continue to be transparent as we can with you until we correct the issue.

Survey - Fill out your survey as soon as the campaign is over. 3-4 days after the campaign is concluded, you will be emailed a link to a survey. There you’ll provide us with your size(s), color choices(s), and address (etc) so we know what to send you and where to send it.

Quality - We are working with some of the best-emerging designers and brands in the United States. We have chosen to work with premium and recycled structured fabrics. The garments are being sewn with premium and recycled threads and stitching right here in the United States through our collaborative partners.

Shipping - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link to a survey. Please fill this out as soon as possible so we can ship your godly product to you! We’re going to begin pre-sale orders ONE (1) WEEK after the end of the campaign.  Orders will be shipped once the curation and selection process is completed with each individual backer that chooses the capsules wardrobe option as a reward.

RETURNS - Most campaigns do not have return policies. Being that this is apparel, we will offer an exchange policy. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or received the wrong size, you have 15 days to exchange the garment upon receiving the capsule. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address and phone number, so you will be able to get a response from a real person.

We have chosen to work with premium and recycled structured fabrics. The garments are being sewn with premium and recycled threads and stitching right here in the United States through our collaborative partners.Shipping - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link to a survey. Please fill this out as soon as possible so we can ship your godly product to you! We’re going to begin pre-sale orders ONE (1) WEEK after the end of the campaign.  Orders will be shipped once the curation and selection process is completed with each individual backer that chooses the capsules wardrobe option as a reward.RETURNS - Most campaigns do not have return policies. Being that this is apparel, we will offer an exchange policy. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or received the wrong size, you have 15 days to exchange the garment upon receiving the capsule. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address and phone number, so you will be able to get a response from a real person.

story:
In Indonesia, continuous news comes from doctors and medical personnel who treat patients with corona virus or Covid-19 . They were declared dead after being infected while having to deal with Covid-19 patients.

As of Saturday, (4/4/2020) there were 25 doctors who died while treating Covid-19 patients. The list is circulating among doctors and health workers.

The use of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) apparently can not be done haphazardly. Especially in handling corona virus or covid-19 which has become this pandemic.

It must be understood, this tool apparently can not be used again after being released or cannot be used repeatedly. Therefore, for medical personnel the use of Personal Protective Equipment must be fully utilized.

Because it is used only once, medical personnel, both doctors and nurses, must withstand their basic needs for food and drink. In addition, they also have to hold themselves to the toilet or to urinate or defecate.

In addition to the price that is quite expensive, the availability of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) that is rare now requires medical staff to make the most of this tool.

Our goal for the next five weeks is to get at least 3,000 standard urinal bag and mask equip with water bottle into the hands of medical workers as quickly and cheaply as possible to comfort the medical staff on duty.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word about this effort on social media (and through Indiegogo share tools) to help us meet our goal! 

Backer support is also welcome to:

  • Spend time on the project as a volunteer for a few hours a day to keep our costs down (for example, we could really use help finding material suppliers, since many vendors are closed or out of stock, and others are price gauging)
  • Hand delivering urinal bags and mask with water bottles to medical centers (for those local to the Jakarta area)

story:
Short Summary

If you’ve watched the hit tv sensation Tiger King this is the shirt for you! If you haven’t, get off this page right now and go watch it!

What We Need & What You Get

It’s pretty simple, you preorder a tee and we’ll send it to you once the campaign finishes!

The Impact

What’s so cool about this t-shirt is that 20% of the proceeds are going to the Wildlife Conservation Society! You get a trendy shirt to wear while you help protect wild animals everywhere.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t buy the shirt? No worries! If you’d like to contribute to the cause some other way you can repost this page on your Facebook or Twitter account!

story:
Multicapp is not all a product generated from somewhere. The idea behind this was intentional based on true incident.

It is common that there is a chance for hair loss due to continued use of  helmet while riding two wheelers. I was also a person facing difficulties on this regard, where i was looking for a solution to this as you know it is not fine to have hair loss for youngsters like me. It is common that people using kerchief to stay away from this issue.

Meanwhile i was thinking about a solution to this problem, my friend pointed out that he is also facing difficulty while riding two wheeler not because of this hair loss, but because of having allergy due to the breathing of smoke & dust from the polluted air. Yeah it is also an important issue faced by the mass.

Now my imaginations where concentrated on two things preventing hair loss and then prevention from breathing polluted air. This lead to the idea of having a cloth that have this multiple use.Then idea was improved from just a cloth to a cap.

As i have started from a single idea of hair loss now i reached on a multiple idea.Now the product has already covered hair,nose,mouth, what remains now in the head??

Yeah of course Ear & Eyes.. Then started thinking about problems that affects eyes and ear, it gives the idea of noise & Reflection of sunlight(Also a problem for neck) so why can’t i think of using the product to get protected from these too.. This widens the usage.

Now i start to work my ideas to connect the uses of simple kerchief and a cap into a single product. What make a kerchief usable is that  is used to get us free from sweat, it paves the way to have an idea about connecting the product with sweat and sports (we sweat more on playing right?).

These were the base where finally i reached in a position where a Cap + Kerchief giving solutions to most of the problems faced related to head,face & neck. When i have connected this with temperature & climate all the required use you are seeing now was completed.

Iam 100% confident that it is the simplest and most affordable product that gives solutions to a variety of problems which are mostly faced by the common man.

 

 

 

 

Importance of Multicapp increases along with the increase in its no.of uses. It widens the scope of cap by having multiple wearing styles & is available in 3 attractive colours. The importance of Multicapp can be felt under different situations, The main feature of Multicapp is its capacity to regulate body temperature & here comes the main importance of the product. It is very useful during the time of Driving, Traveling, Playing,Workout etc. It protects and gives relief from the UV rays as well as it can act as a mask which keeps us away from the bad effects of dust and smoke in the polluted atmosphere. The absorbing capacity of the cloth helps to wipe out sweat which is a difficulty mostly during the time of playing & workouts. The attractive features like elasticity,washable & moisture wicking material use the product more userfriendly.

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of Young minds located in USA. We always look for innovative ideas & techniques which will do good for the public. 

We work on finding products  which make simple sense, but provide greater solutions for the human being.  This was the intentional thought that lead us towards Multicapp. It may look like a simple product, but act as a greater solution for the various problems in modern environment.

 

1. Does it fit for all age groups?

Ans: As multicapp focuses on health, travel etc, there is no need of restriction on the basis of health.Because these are the factors affecting the whole human irrespective of their age.

2. It is comfortable under helmet?

Ans: It fits comfortable under your helmet, It is highly stretchable and it makes any hindrance while you driving & it also reduces hair loss due to the continues use of helmet.

3. Is this multicapp water resistant?

Ans: No

4. Does Multicapp is washable or not?

Ans: Yes, multicapp is washable.

5. Is it stretchable and does it cover neck completely?

Ans: It is highly stretchable & it can cover your neck completely.

6. Is it useful in winter & summer?

Ans:  It is useful for all seasons

7. Is the item easy to use?

Ans: Yes, it is very easy to use & the various styles can be studied after viewing our youtube video.

8. How much is the thickness of given product?

Ans: Multicapp is really a thin product, it is not at all a thicker material.

9. Is this cap stretchable?

ans: Yes. It is stretchable and flexible product

10. Is multicapp smooth or hard?

ans: it is very smooth

11. What kind of cloth material is used?

ans: Merino Wool

12. Reason for using merino wool ?

ans: It is the softest wool available in the world

13. Is the item durable?

ans: Yes

14. Does continues use of multicapp cause any problems?

ans: Yes

15. Is it possible to wash with other cloths?

ans:  Yes it is washable with other cloths

story:
Every day that you serve with your military unit you have each others’ backs. You are a family. To remember those times in service and in battle together and to remember the bond you forged, you often carry a unit challenge coin.

But your military brothers and sisters are not your only family. Often, there are those who are left behind and stand behind you so you can do the work of protecting our country. They have always been with you and always will be.

When we are away from our families, it is comforting to have a reminder that they are a part of us. The Family Challenge Coin is a way for you to remind one another of your love and commitment to each other:  

Family Challenge coins are one and a half inches in diameter and stamped in high quality metal with an antique bronze finish. The first side of the coin (above, right) is a declaration that you are a military family.  You are marked by your commitment to your country, to your mission, and to your family.

The other side of the coin (above, left) is a reminder:  “I believe in you, I love you, I’m thinking of you” signifying that your strength as a family and your love and support for one another reaches across the space between you.  The image of a soldier hugging their child will be sculpted in the surface of the coin, giving an attractive 3-D effect.

With the Family Challenge coin, you can carry this reminder with you always.  Just as a Family Challenge coin is a reminder of the unity of your family, it is also a symbol of the unity of all military families. A sacred bond shared only by those who understand the sacrifice it takes to protect our country.

These coins are designed and ready for our first production.  In order to pay for the dies and the first manufacturing run, we need to raise $1000.

In return for your contribution, we will send Family Challenge Coins for you and your family, packaged beautifully so that you can keep them for yourself or give them to your loved ones for birthdays, graduations, holidays or special occasions.

In exchange for your support of our military families, we offer the following perks:

For a contribution of $20 you will receive one Family Challenge Coin.

For a $35 contribution you will receive two challenge coins,

for a $50 contribution you will receive three,

for a $65 contribution will receive four, and

for an $80 contribution you will receive five of these beautiful Family Challenge coins.

Click on one of the perks on the right hand side of the screen to contribute.

And help us spread the word by clicking on the social media links above the list of Perks.

Join with us in supporting and strengthening the families of those serving in our military.

story:
Our products include perfect sizes for women with wide hips and backs some times due to beautiful pregnancies, large cup sizes for breast with support, and tummy control to mold figures. All of this accompanied by subtle designs and colors that highlight the elegance and delicacy of all of us regardless of our age or body types.


 

Our swimsuits are designed and made here in Colombia by Mothers who are the heads of their household. 


 

 

We already have the designs, we have already taken photos with the prototypes but we need to increase our inventory.
We're using this as a pre-order campaign for TERRA our newest collection, we want people from outside our country to have the possibility of knowing how wonderful our products are. We will use the money collected to start manufacturing the products you chose and to strengthen our brand.
We seek that Inanna's bathing suits can reach the women who need them in all corners of the planet. 
We need you to join our team! Back us, select from any of our beautiful perks. We will be shipping by June 2019. 
Please join us in this adventure to carry the message of empowerment and self-love that INANNA has throughout the world.


 

Hello, my name is Stephany, co-founder of the brand Inanna Swimwear.  Being a woman that has always had to wear a size 14  has been an ongoing battle especially when it comes to wearing the latest trends.

We are located in Colombia, a country recognized worldwide for exporting high-quality swimwear around the world. However, for a woman size 8 and above finding a bathing suit that meets her every need and with the latest design, Is really impossible.

This is why we created Inanna Swimwear, a brand with which we want to carry a message of self-love so that women embrace and value their bodies more. No more complex thoughts or fears when it comes to enjoying their family vacation. A brand with which we can all identify with, that makes women feel beautiful, self-assured and very empowered.

We have built a community around the brand of women of all kinds to whom through our marketing campaigns we empower every day. As a policy in our campaigns, you will only see real bodies of all kinds, regardless of their stretch marks or cellulite.

¨INANNA WAS BORN FROM THE NEED TO TEACH EVERY WOMAN THAT, NO MATTER HER SIZE OR WEIGHT, WE ALL ARE ENTITLED TO ENJOY THE SUN WITH PRIDE AND FEELING BEAUTIFUL ̈

 

DON'T FORGET TO FOLLOW US AND HELP US
SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN.

story:
Introducing the Jagpod, the World’s first energy-efficient tiny home that uses recycled shipping containers and solar panels to provide affordable, sustainable housing.

The United Nations estimates that 1.6 billion currently live in substandard housing, and that number is rapidly growing. Creating an affordable, clean, and efficient housing option is one of the most important issues facing the world today. 

The vast supply of shipping containers around the world and the fact that they can easily be repurposed into homes means that homebuyers save big compared to traditional homes, with models starting at $25,000.

People that live in areas prone to natural disasters are prime candidates for the Jagpod. Shipping container homes handle a variety of disasters better than traditional homes: floods, fires, hurricanes, and earthquakes, just to name a few.

 We can do the majority of the work in building your home in our manufacturing facility, so the building process is dramatically faster than traditional homebuilding. New homes can be ready and fully furnished within 90 days.

The Jagpod’s solar panels allow you to stop wasting money on your electric bill. Combined with the recycling of a shipping container, you have a home that is extremely eco-friendly and cost-effective. 

Housing affordability continues to decline as many households spend well over the recommended 30% of income on housing. Reducing housing costs allows families to spend money on other things like food, education, healthcare, or starting a business.

We want to offer an affordable to home to every family in the world, but we also understand that every homebuyer is unique. We can customize your home to match your family’s needs.

As housing costs continue to rise, the tiny home trend has really taken off in the past few years. Shipping container homes are a natural next step for the alternative housing market due to their affordability, safety, and eco-friendliness. 

With 100 million homeless across the globe, there is a huge need for affordable housing options for non-profits and government agencies. This is an opportunity for us to make a big impact and help alleviate a major societal problem. 

Millennials are known for their dislike of excessive material possessions, and many older people are looking to downsize their homes and declutter their lives after retiring. The Jagpod offers everything you need to live, with less maintenance and less worries.

The turbulent housing market of the last decade has shown the pitfalls of taking on too much debt. We’re giving people an opportunity to take on much less mortgage debt, so they don’t have to worry about losing their home.

Purchasing a home is one of the biggest decisions a person will ever make, so we need to have a showroom with 3 different models that people can closely examine and picture themselves living in.

We’re taking on the challenge of fighting the global housing crisis. The need for affordable and safe housing is enormous and vitally important, and we want to help as many families as possible achieve their dream of owning a home.

Risks and challenges

The marketplace today is ripe for shipping container homes. Exorbitant real estate prices in major cities and a desire by millennials to live smaller has created a surge in shipping container projects nationwide. This trend has been gathering steam from television programs like Tiny Homes, and inspiring stories from people all of the country who chose to live an unconventional lifestyle within an upcycled shipping container.

Jaguar Containers goal is to become to #1 Brand for container homes. Our JagPods will set the example for market excellence while providing unique value for cost conscious consumers. To achieve our goal, we have teamed up with Precision Structural Engineering http://www.structure1.com/, a US-based structural engineering firm focusing on green design and licensed in over 47 states to mitigate any foreseeable challenges that may arise in the completion of the project.

It’s critical that Jaguar Containers establish a showroom and container prototypes to showcase the container lifestyle to appropriate buyers, accelerate our revenue growth and create brand awareness. We see our role as educating consumers and getting them comfortable with the idea of owning a shipping container home. Your financial support will help us achieve our goal in bringing these homes to countries around the globe.

 We can do the majority of the work in building your home in our manufacturing facility, so the building process is dramatically faster than traditional homebuilding. New homes can be ready and fully furnished within 90 days.

Jaguar will customize your Jagpod as basic or luxurious as you want

Container homes are trending all over the globe.

Container homes are used for disaster relief shelter


Millennials are known for their dislike of excessive material possessions, and many older people are looking to downsize their homes and declutter their lives after retiring. The Jagpod offers everything you need to live, with less maintenance and less worries.




The turbulent housing market of the last decade has shown the pitfalls of taking on too much debt. We’re giving people an opportunity to take on much less mortgage debt, so they don’t have to worry about losing their home.

Material costs of container homes are significantly less than traditional homes


Purchasing a home is one of the biggest decisions a person will ever make, so we need to have a showroom with 3 different models that people can closely examine and picture themselves living in.

Help us build showrooms to realize your dream home


We’re taking on the challenge of fighting the global housing crisis. The need for affordable and safe housing is enormous and vitally important, and we want to help as many families as possible achieve their dream of owning a home.

Container homes are the future of housing















Risks and challengesThe marketplace today is ripe for shipping container homes. Exorbitant real estate prices in major cities and a desire by millennials to live smaller has created a surge in shipping container projects nationwide. This trend has been gathering steam from television programs like Tiny Homes, and inspiring stories from people all of the country who chose to live an unconventional lifestyle within an upcycled shipping container.Jaguar Containers goal is to become to #1 Brand for container homes. Our JagPods will set the example for market excellence while providing unique value for cost conscious consumers. To achieve our goal, we have teamed up with Precision Structural Engineering http://www.structure1.com/, a US-based structural engineering firm focusing on green design and licensed in over 47 states to mitigate any foreseeable challenges that may arise in the completion of the project.It’s critical that Jaguar Containers establish a showroom and container prototypes to showcase the container lifestyle to appropriate buyers, accelerate our revenue growth and create brand awareness. We see our role as educating consumers and getting them comfortable with the idea of owning a shipping container home. Your financial support will help us achieve our goal in bringing these homes to countries around the globe.

story:
Elemento Watches is an Italian project created to spread unconventional forms of Art and to support Young International Artists by diffusing their Artworks. 

To do so, we ideated these Limited-Edition Watches Collection. 

Each of them contains a unique art piece in it.

Hi Guys!

Are you Looking for a trendy watch to wear this winter?
You must make a Gift but do not have any Ideas?

Here’s our watches: elegant, light and fashionable!
Available both in black and White strap.

But the most Important thing is that it makes you an art ambassador!
Don’t you believe it? Keep reading.



It would be great if you bought one: you'd help us to realize our Dream! 

Our goal is to raise enough Funds so that we can start the Production, and at the end be able to involve a lot of Artists from all over the World.

(Link: Here's is our first watches limited edition)


What are you Waiting for? Together, one step at a time, We can be the change that future generations will be grateful for!

story:
" These Greenstones are an experience that photographs are unable to convey "

Indiegogo Collector  Edition  ( PERK # 1 )

  * The White Greenstones ( above ) are so rare we only have a few available.

 

 

Bronze Edition  (  below )

        *  You get two (2) Greenstones per order like the samples above.   

 

Silver Edition " Worry " Greenstones  (below)

 *  Incredible Worry Greenstones (above) are selected for shape & texture.

 

Gold Edition  (  below ) 

* You get four (4) Greenstones: 1. Our largest Greenstone  2. The rarest RED Greenstone, plus two special Greenstones. (samples above)

 

 

 

                       GREENSTONE  DOCUMENTATION

 

Greenstones are the World's rarest gemstones

found only in one location ( CANADA ) from Earth's oldest rock.

( 4.5 billion years old )

Documented by:

National Geographic ~ Science Magazine ~ Carnegie

Institution of Washington ~ McGill University [ Earth

and Planetary Science ] *

Jonathan O'Neil Ph.D.  *

 

 

~~~~~

 

 

 

         The " Heart Greenstone "            

            

               

The Cousteau Expedition meets the Greenstones

 

        "The message in a bottle" and the Greenstones gave me confidence that opened many doors of Happiness in my life. In 1980, on a warm sunny day, on the  Canadian North Shores of Lake Superior, I was invited aboard Cousteau's ship, Calypso. Later, I invited the Cousteau crew to meet my family, especially my Dad as he was a renowned historian and Story -Teller.

          My Dad and I guided the Calypso crew to the exact location where the famous U.S. luxury yacht, Gunilda had sunk in 80 meters of water. While visiting our home, the Cousteau family entertained us with their story-telling adventures and we told them our stories of life in the wilderness bush country. I showed them our Greenstone Collection and their faces were energized as they held these precious gems in their hands... Jean-Michel Cousteau informed us that these Greenstones came from a region of Lake Superior that has no geological similarities like it anywhere else on Earth. I asked him to explain further and he simply said that these isolated islands here, on Lake Superior, are like a miniature version of the Gallopogus Islands that are known as having the World's rarest forms of plants, animals, and rock formation. He further noted that the geological formations where these Greenstones were found are totally different from that of the mainland that surrounds these unique islands.    The Cousteau Expedition decided to spend extra days researching this unusual remote geological phenomenon.                                                                       The Cousteau Society is world famous for its extensive research capabilities, so to watch their enthusiasm for these Greenstones was very impressive and I began at that very moment to realize that these Greenstones were incredibly rare. My research later in life further validated this fact from organizations such as National Geographic.

 

The Cousteau Society's ship "CALYPSO"

 

"Prepare-for-DIVE"  by Submersible on Canada's Lake Superior to explore the U.S.A. Luxury Yacht " Gunilda".  It sunk May 11, 1911, to a depth of 80 meters in Northern Canada after running aground in one meter of water. The U.S. marine maps did not indicate this shallow water area, that was located in the middle of a deep channel, so the luxury yacht ran completely on top of it and when the salvage tugs pulled the vessel off this shoal she sank immediately to the bottom eighty meters below. This event has become a local and worldwide legend. The yacht is now a protected Heritage Sunken Vessel and will forever remain where it is.... preserved immaculately by Lake Superior's pristine cold waters year round.

 

 

Bon Voyage !!!!!!

 

                      *  1980 - The Calypso's submersible is lowered into the water to film                                                       the luxury yacht, "Gunilda" , that sank 80 meters down in - 1911 *

* Rare photo by  Eddie SAGE H.P. ( Lake Superior, Canada.)

 

      All of The Cousteau's  film and photography of this event was lost in a fire so this above photo is the only one in existence.     

*** I also have a letter of thanks for the help our Family gave the Cousteau Expedition. It is signed by the Father and Cousteau Society founder,  Jacques-Yves-Cousteau, dated > February 12, 1981.

*** I have decided to give the original photos that I took that memorable day, to The Cousteau Society along with their "Thank you" letter to us.

 

 

Official Document of the Luxury Yacht Gunilda  ( below ).

 

 

~~~~~~~~~~~

 

 

 Eddie  SAGE H.P.       Greenstones = Happiness

 

" This is it "

THE  EPIC  GREENSTONE  STORY

By: Eddie SAGE H.P.

Join me in making something very special happen.

Let's help people understand how to be happy and have fun in a simple way! 

I know how to live a simple and happy life, compassionately. I want to share my happiness and that is why this project is so incredibly important to me. I want to help people be Happy. The funds you contribute will make it possible for me to share these simple methods of how to be happy and have fun. My goal is to present awesome live seminars, worldwide. With my extensive background as a Family Counsellor and lecturer, it comes naturally for me to help others.  Storytelling  (counseling ) is a method of helping people that goes back in time to our ancestors. My ancestors in ancient times were renowned storytellers.  With your help, I am going to share my incredible life stories to help people wherever I can, like my Ojibway Ancestors did.

The Ojibway Elders use storytelling to share knowledge and they use the Greenstone as a personal guide for accessing knowledge.

MeegWetch*

 *Wisdom is what develops in a person when one puts knowledge to a wise use in their daily life. So you can see the link now, between Greenstones and Happiness, at this profound level. My Dream is to convey this profound level of knowledge to people so that more wisdom will develop in human beings. Children are born Wise, we need to keep that Wise Way growing. This is my love of life and why I am so passionate about what I do. The Greenstone is the catalyst for me to share this wisdom, now.

 

~~~~~~~~~~

 

My support team keeps me consistent and on track 

 KaYan  & Marvin 

 

   ~~~~~~~~~~  

 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

My abundant passion for life 

                                                           

                                                         " I am a child forever, adults need to be children."                                                                                                                                 Eddie SAGE H.P.

        

 My family lived in the remote wilderness of Canada on the shores of the Inland Sea called Lake Superior. The bush country was my teacher/guide. I learned from birth how to be with Nature, on my own, so that I could survive and live a happy compassionate life anywhere.                

       **Nature teaches Respect **                                                                                                              

 The message in a bottle

                 One day, when I was very young, I was alone on a remote beach on Lake Superior.  I was sitting on this pristine beach trying to break a bottle by throwing stones at it. When it wouldn't break, I went over to it and picked it up and   WOW.... inside was the message in a bottle.  It turns out that the bottle with the message in it had been on an incredible journey. It had traveled thousands of kilometers across the vast expanse of Lake Superior from the United States all the way to this beach in Canada. The C.E.O. of Alton Box Board Co. in the United States told his business friends, as they were partying on his cruise boat, that this bottle would be found by someone and it would bring them GOOD LUCK. They laughed at him. He was very confident so he threw the green bottle ( message inside ) in the water and today that someone, me Eddie "SAGE", who found this bottle with the message in it, is still living a life of good luck. Imagine the feelings of happiness this man had when he read my letter about me finding his message in a bottle. Imagine my feelings of wonder when I found the message in a bottle. This experience is forever etched in my Spirit. I am sure this helped me have a very Good Life. 

 

         *The purpose of this Fundraiser is to share my experiences of beautiful luck. I need to get these Greenstones and this story to as many people as possible so that this "good luck" will travel a long way, like that green bottle I found. The Greenstones were discovered right next to this "message in a bottle" beach and that C.E.O. was right on about it bringing the finder of his message in a bottle, Good LUCK. These Greenstones have been a lifetime of great joyful times with my family and friends. My Mother and younger Sister started to do lapidary, which involves the collecting of precious gemstones, because of me and my love of the Greenstones. Our whole family was closer, as we grew up, simply because we all had fun with these Greenstones, lots of fun, actually. 

                         I raised a beautiful son who helped edit /direct this fundraiser and he remembers the good times we had with these Greenstones. Now, we are having fun sharing our ideas together. As we were working on this project tonight, KaYan remembered how I would give these precious Greenstones to people and how it really made people so happy.  The sharing of this Greenstone Happiness Story, worldwide, depends on the success of this Greenstone Fundraiser.

 

              There was a lot of hard work involved.

                        My personal intensive research authenticated that these Greenstones are incredibly rare ( found only in one place on Earth ) and that they come from Earth's oldest rock formations found only in Northern Canada. These Scientific findings surprised me, so I did further validation over several years with major worldwide importers and exporters of gemstones. After that, I was totally certain and convinced that these gemstones were highly valuable. In fact, when I showed these Greenstones to gemstone experts, not a single one had ever seen anything like these rare Greenstones and they really wanted to have them. 

As a former Geologist and Mining Engineer who worked in the field, I have an expertise in this type of research and validation process. All this work was worth it, as I now look forward to the next step, after this fundraiser, which is to share this story and teach people Happiness Worldwide with the Greenstone as the catalyst. 

 Thanks to you, the donors, this is now possible on a quality level that was not possible before, so thanks for funding this passionate  Greenstone project.

 

We are deeply honored to receive your donations.

 

 

" Family fun is so precious, kinds~ of~ like these precious Greenstones "

                                                                                                     SAGE H.P.  

The above Celestial event occurred while I was

creating this campaign, today. What a validation from above,

 as I worked in awe under this magical wonder.

WOW ! *

I have filmed these Sun Halos for years and never seen a

rainbow halo so close to the sun (the sun is the white ball in the center). 

This is even rarer than my Greenstones, Ha Ha Ha.

 

Look closely at this photo and see more colors (actually a double rainbow).

I also filmed this extremely rare event that lasted all day in a solid blue sky.

I searched the Internet.....there was nothing like this with the halo so close to the sun.

                                                                          

Any comments?

EMAIL  me, SAGE H.P. at  >  eddiesagehp@gmail.com

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

 

 

  Important Notification *

 

Special thanks to Indiegogo *

This rare Greenstone Collection is now released worldwide 

Get a Greenstone and one for a friend (s)  

    Thank you for backing us     

You are making people's lives better and better

~~~  

 

 

   I have been told that I am a gifted Story Teller. Please know this >> The funds you donate will go towards the expenses involved in the telling of these heart~warming stories in many countries. The plan is to conduct Story Telling Lectures in a way that, people hearing these incredible adventures, will learn simple ways to live in happiness.These true stories are my legacy that needs to be shared publicly, now!

 

 

 Please share our Indiegogo site with your social media networks. Save this link (below) then forward it to others > 

 https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/greenstone-f...

 

~~~~~~~~~~~

 

 

 

MeegWetch KaYan, you are pure light..........

Lots of Love, Dad  x o

              To honor my teacher, the World famous Ojibway drum-maker, Gilbert Baxter of Thunder Bay, CANADA

and my cousin Ronnie,  both true Warriors in a tough World !

~ All my relations ~

S~7

                                   
 
  Donate and share this Fundraiser, please. Save this link >  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/greenstones-...

All this work was worth it, as I now look forward to the next step, after this fundraiser, which is to share this story and teach people Happiness Worldwide with the Greenstone as the catalyst.  Thanks to you, the donors, this is now possible on a quality level that was not possible before, so thanks for funding this passionate  Greenstone project. We are deeply honored to receive your donations.  " Family fun is so precious, kinds~ of~ like these precious Greenstones "                                                                                                     SAGE H.P.  The above Celestial event occurred while I wascreating this campaign, today. What a validation from above, as I worked in awe under this magical wonder.WOW ! *I have filmed these Sun Halos for years and never seen arainbow halo so close to the sun (the sun is the white ball in the center). This is even rarer than my Greenstones, Ha Ha Ha. Look closely at this photo and see more colors (actually a double rainbow).I also filmed this extremely rare event that lasted all day in a solid blue sky.I searched the Internet.....there was nothing like this with the halo so close to the sun.                                                                          Any comments?EMAIL  me, SAGE H.P. at  >  eddiesagehp@gmail.com ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~     Important Notification * Special thanks to Indiegogo *This rare Greenstone Collection is now released worldwide Get a Greenstone and one for a friend (s)      Thank you for backing us     You are making people's lives better and better~~~       I have been told that I am a gifted Story Teller. Please know this >> The funds you donate will go towards the expenses involved in the telling of these heart~warming stories in many countries. The plan is to conduct Story Telling Lectures in a way that, people hearing these incredible adventures, will learn simple ways to live in happiness.These true stories are my legacy that needs to be shared publicly, now!   Please share our Indiegogo site with your social media networks. Save this link (below) then forward it to others >  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/greenstone-f... ~~~~~~~~~~~   MeegWetch KaYan, you are pure light..........Lots of Love, Dad  x o              To honor my teacher, the World famous Ojibway drum-maker, Gilbert Baxter of Thunder Bay, CANADAand my cousin Ronnie,  both true Warriors in a tough World !~ All my relations ~S~7                                      Donate and share this Fundraiser, please. Save this link >  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/greenstones-...

story:
Our tees are designed using vectorial images made by us, and a high quality printing process (sublimation), The threads are literally dyed in the process leaving a highly detalles print without any stiffness, the process does not affect the softness of the fabric and the color is never lost or faded while it is washed.

  

More Details:

  • The T-Shirts are 100% polyester, as required by the sublimation printing process.
  • They feel just as soft as cotton.
  • The colors will never fade or lost the color, even after repeated washings.
  • Are simple, fresh, comfortable, no odor and easy to wash and it's so light it does not feel. 
  • Size available: S / M / L / XL

  • Once the campaign is finished, you will be able to pick your design and size.

 

Here a representation of our designs:

 

Size Chart: 

 

 

Stretch Goals:

  • 15,000 | Fully Funded 
  • 18,000 | New Design
  • 22,000 | New Design 
  • 25,000 | Expanded Sizes (Up to 2XL / 3XL / 4XL) 
  • 29,000 | Two New Designs

 

Post-Funding Schedule:

If successfully funded, the campaign will complete on September 8. Funds will take up to 7-15 days to be deposited to our account, Per the Indiegogo FAQ.

so that we can get your rewards to you as soon as possible, we would be starting production from September 15-24th. Based on these time frames, we send the rewards in the two week of October.

 

Our Pledge To You:

  • You are able to cancel at any point of time and get a full refund.
  • Easy and secure shipping using local carriers like UPS, FedEx or US Postal Services to delivery each parcel. You can follow the journey via Track & Trace.

  • The garment without any factory defect.
