story:
Travel In Chic has partnered with three incredible organizations. Reaching our goal for this campaign, will not only enable us to meet our minimum order requirements with our manufactuers and bring our products to the market, but will also help us to begin donating to these powerful causes for every collection that we sell. 

                                              

As sisters we have always had a common love for both travel and fashion, and our hearts have always been rooted in philanthropy. We created Travel In Chic as a way to create and inspire, but most importantly as a way to use our passions to make a positive impact in the world.

 

     

            

   

        

                   

             

We designed the Emerie Collection to embody elegance and class.

                   

  

 

We designed the Lola Collection to express Natural and Earthy Vibes. 

             

         

            

We designed the Zoe collection with urban and edgy inspiration.

story:
Short Summary

Xcentricstyle Is A Southern California Based Company Dedicated To Merging Fashion
And Technology. Our Mission Is To Promote Green Energy And The Conservation 
Of Our Planet. We Appreciate Life And Equality And We're Seeking To Build Our
Company To Make A Difference.

Ultimately We Intend To Promote Unity And Education 
By Eventually Dedicating 10% Of Our Income To Anti-Crime Education And Provide 
Productive Opportunities To Youth. Our Company Goal Is To Make Our Customers Stand Out And Bring Attention To The idea Of Art And Fashion Joined With Usability.

The Solar Panel Jacket Purse and  Phone Case with Clip Will Instantly Elevate Your Outfit
Making a Bold Fashion Statement, if you're Constantly Using
Your Smart Phone for Work, Or Entertainment, You'll Love The
Functionality of This Purse and Clip.

The USB Style Charging Cord Fits Any Type of Device and is capable of Charging Devices Such As Laptops, IPads, and Smartphone's When Attached to the Purse on the Go.

 12"x 10"x 6" or 10"x 8"x 5" in size, Boasting a 20 Inch Retractable Cord, And A Non Visible 6400 MAH Battery That Triple's Your Battery Life When Fully Charged. Accompanied with a Speed Charger, You Can Fully Charge Your Device In Approximately 40 Minutes. The Internal Battery inside the Purse Is Designed to Fully Charge in Approximately 15 minutes.  The External Solar Panel When Visible To Light Constantly Charges The Internal Battery.

 If You Fully Charge a Solar Panel Jacket Purse and Keep It Visible During the Day Your Smart Phone Will Stay Charged 24/7 When Used For Basic Functionality, Never Use A Plug Again....We Thank You In Advance For Your Support And Are Forever Grateful.

What We Need & What You Get

We Have A Patent Pending For Each Prototype In our Campaign:

1.  Patent Pending: Solar Panel Hand Bag, With Solar Cellular Phone Recharging
     Capabilities,(Physically Resembling A Jacket).# 62/492,023
     United States Patent And Trademark

2.  Patent Pending: Belt Clip Solar Charging Smart Phone Holder, Featuring
     Trickle Charging Micro Solar Cells, With Direct Charging.# 62/496,325
     United States Patent And Trademark.
We  are seeking to Manufacture Our Product and need:
(1). lithium Ion Batteries
(2).Micro Solar Panels
(3).Plastic Phone Cases
(4).Voltage Limiters And L.E.D. Lights
(5).USB Connectors

We Have An Electronic Manufacturer, and a Hand Bag Manufacturer On Standby Who Will Wire and Mass Produce Our Products According To The Engineered Patent Illustrations.

When The Campaign Is Completed We're Shipping The Wiring System For The
Solar Jacket Purse And The Solar Belt Clip To The Electronic Manufacturer, Along 
With The Plastic Phone Case's for Mass Production.

Once The Wiring Technology Is Completed We're Shipping It To The Hand Bag Manufacturer 
To Assemble Both Products According To The Prototype And Our Contributors Pre Orders.
Thereafter, We're Mailing Each Item To Our Campaign Contributors Specific To Their
Pre Orders And Open Our Online Store To Fulfill Our Campaign Perks At: www.xcentricstyle.com
(1).(Inventory):Acquire The Manufacture To Mass Produce our Products
      To Stock The Online Store At,xcentricstyle.com

(2).Acquire An Attorney To File Our Patents For The Solar Jacket Purse
     And Solar Belt Clip By August 2017.

Available Styles and Prices for Purses

(1).Two-Tone Alligator Skin & Mink Fur Solar Panel
      Jacket Purse (shown): $ 600.00 Crowd Funding Campaign
      & Retail At:$ 800.00(Donate Now $ 600.00 U.S.)
      Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only

(2).Black Or Brown Alligator Skin Solar Panel Jacket Purse:
     $ 450.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 650.00
     (Donate Now $ 450.00 U.S.)
      Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only

(3).Black Or Gray Leather Solar Panel Jacket Purse:$300.00
     Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 450.00
     (Donate Now $ 300.00 U.S.) 
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only

     $ 350.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At: 550.00
     (Donate Now $ 350.00 U.S)
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only

     $ 250.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 400.00
     (Donate Now $ 250.00 U.S.)
      Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.

(6).Black or Brown Alligator jacket Purse(With No Solar System):
     $ 400.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 600.00
     (Donate Now 400.00 U.S.)
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only

Available Styles and Prices for Designer Phone Cases

1).Black Alligator Skin & Mink Fur Solar Panel Designer Clip (shown):
    $255.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 290.00
    (Donate Now $ 255.00 U.S.)
    Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.

(2).Brown Snake Skin Solar Panel Designer Clip(shown):$ 210.00
     Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At:$ 245.00
     (Donate Now $ 210.00 U.S.)
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.

(3).Black Or Brown Alligator Skin Solar Panel Designer Clip:
     $ 225.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At: 260.00
     (Donate Now $ 225.00 U.S.) 
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.

(4).Black Leather Solar Panel Designer Clip:$ 150.00 Crowd
     Funding Campaign & Retail At: $ 190.00 
    (Donate Now $ 150.00 U.S.)
    Free Shipping & Handling U.S. Only.

(5).Black Or Brown Alligator Skin Designer Clip(With No Solar System):
     $ 160.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At: $ 195.00
     (Donate Now $ 160.00 U.S.)
     Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.

(6).Pink Ostrich Skin Designer Clip(With No Solar System):
     $ 145.00 Crowd Funding Campaign & Retail At: $ 180.00
     (Donate Now $145.00 U.S.)
      Free Shipping & Handling U.S.Only.
 

Campaign Perks:

Earn A (Free) Solar Panel Designer Belt Clip (Donate Ten And Tell A Friend)

Donate $ 10.00  And Get 12 Friends To Make A $ 10.00 Donation, you will Receive a Free Solar Panel Designer Clip. Provide Your $ 10.00 Donation Invoice Number And Name To your  Friends You're Referring And Once Your Friends make Their $10.00 Donation Instruct Them To email Your Name And Invoice Number to Our Email Address at 12referrals@xcentricstyle.com.

Upon Verification That Your 12 Friends Have Donated $ 10.00 And emailed Your Name And Invoice Number to Our Email At: 12referrals@xcentricstyle.com, You will Be Notified That You Have Earned A (FREE) Solar Panel Designer Phone Clip.
(PLEASE NOTE): If This goal Is Not Met And A Friend Has Made A Donation As A Result Of Your Referral, You'll Receive A 30% Discount On Any Item You Purchase From xcentricstyle.com.

2).
Donate $ 10.00  And Tell A Friend you will Receive A 30% Discount On Any Item
Purchased From xcentricstyle.com.
(Please Note): All Referrals Must Be Verified Or
Your $ 10.00 Donation Will Become A 15% Discount.
Provide Your $ 10.00  Donation Invoice Number And Name To The Friend
You Referred And Once Your Friend Has Made A $ 10.00 Donation Instruct Them To
Email Your Name And $ 10.00 Invoice Number to Our Email At: 1referral@xcentricstyle.com,

 Upon Verification That Your Friend Has Donated $ 10.00 And emailed Your Name And Invoice Number to Our Email At 1referral@xcentricstyle.com.You'll Be Notified That You Have Receive A 30% discount.
(Important Notice):
Please Register On xcentricstyle.com After Making Your Donation.
You Must Use The Correct Email Address That Applies To Your Donation. This Will Allow Our Management Team To Keep A Record Of Your Donation.

When A Donation Is Made For Any Item At  Full Price, Please email The Item information And The Amount Of Your Donation to Our
Email address At: fulldonation@xcentricstyle.com,
To Ensure You Receive The Correct Item For Your Donation.

Our Solar Panel Designer Clip's come In Different Size's specific to Each Smart Phone.
Please Include Your Smart Phone Models In Your Email At: fulldonation@xcentricstyle.com,
To Ensure You Receive The Correct Phone Model for your Designer Clip.

We Have 5 Email Addresses That Apply To Your Donation In Our Crowd Funding Campaign:
(1).fulldonation@xcentricstyle.com
(2).12referrals@xcentricstyle.com
(3).1referral@xcentricstyle.com
(4).perk15@xcentricstyle.com
(5).perk25@xcentricstyle.com

Attention:
If You Make A Full Donation At Our Crowd Funding Price Use: fulldonation@xcentricstyle.com
If You Refer 12 Friends To Make A Donation Use: 12referrals@xcentricstyle.com
If You Refer 1 Friend To Make A Donation Use: 1referral@xcentricstyle.com
If You Make A $ 15.00 Donation Use: perk15@xcentricstyle.com
If You Make A $ 25.00 Donation Use: perk25@xcentricstyle.com

Risks & Challenges

If Our Crowd Funding Goal Is Not Met The Contributors Who Made A Full Donation For An Item At Our Crowd Funding Price Will Get A Refund Minus The Percentage We Have To Pay Indiegogo. The Remaining Of the Funds Will Be Use To Pay For Our Patent's and manufacturing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute, no problem. Give us a shout on social media, or refer a friend.

story:
Kalinka Motivation to Create a New Concept

Olga Zubko, Designer, Inventor and CEO of Kalinka International Schools, Extension Eyelashes Institutes and Worldwide Patent Eyelashes Products,  created a new innovated product line of eyelashes extensions different of traditional ones in the market. Additional Olga has a medical diploma and has been in the Healthy and Beauty market for more than 10 years.

Why patent and Innovation?

Vertically positioned two or three false eyelashes in double or three layers.

The new name on the market - Kalinka HD and Kalinka DS.

Provide an advantage for beauticians worldwide – easy, efficient, top quality and fast to work and for customers – Double or triple lashes volume with natural and classy look.

Your contribution will fund Olga's idea to create new opportunities of work to beauticians. Create "Kalinka-Klub" and "Kalinka TV" to exchange worldwide experiences and knowledge for eyelashes extensions. 

Definitively, every support you provide to this project will be very much appreciate and always thankful to make Olga's passion and devotion to help people a reality.

Kalinka Fundraising and Benefits

Why Kalinka needs your support:

  • Kalinka has 4 patents and after extensive work and real market experience the products proved to be the best in the market. You can find testimonials in all my conferences, schools, beauticians and most important very satisfied customers. Now, Kalinka brand needs to expand out of France and offer the products worldwide. In order to grow Kalinka needs to produce massive with extraordinary quality and affordability. Provide beauticians worldwide with Local schools to be trained and acquire the best qualifications to do the best eyelashes extensions. 

What you will receive supporting Kalinka

  • Your support will turn 100% in products that will help a beautician to try and start to see the benefits of Kalinka products.
  • Opportunity to be in your country a provider of training, Kalinka International School and/or establish your own Eyelashes Extension Institute supported 100% by Kalinka  and be part of exclusive Kalinka-Klub. All business opportunity will include an excited credit to buy a complete line of Kalinka products and accessories to start your new endeavor. 
  • Even your simple support will establish a connection for the future opportunities.
  • If Kalinka cannot reach the goal Kalinka will invest the supported money to complete any perks ordered and continue to provide Worldwide conferences to transfer knowledge and new opportunities to existing beauticians and new ones.
  • Kalinka is very thankful for your support !!!! Thanks.

 

The Impact of your support to Kalinka

Kalinka campaign will fund:

  • Production in mass of Kalinka HD and Kalinka DS product lines.
  • Expand worldwide Free Conferences to beauticians
  • Create an Innovate Kalinka TV  to provide online training and information about eyelashes extensions techniques, best practices, FAQs, ...
  • Established Accredited International  Schools Worldwide based on 3 successful schools, Cannes, Waterloo and Paris.
  • Offer opportunity to create worldwide Kalinka Eyelashes Extension Institutes. New owners can be trained in a real Kalinka Institute experience in Cannes, the original one created and operated by Olga Zubko.

 

Other Ways You Can Help Kalinka campaign

Today if you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please, get the word out and make some noise about Kalinka campaign. Maybe you know someone interested to Eyelashes Extension business opportunity !!!!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and help Kalinka campaign to be at right hands

Thank you very much for your support and hope to hear from you soon !!!
story_txt:
Kalinka Motivation to Create a New Concept
Olga Zubko, Designer, Inventor and CEO of Kalinka International Schools, Extension Eyelashes Institutes and Worldwide Patent Eyelashes Products,  created a new innovated product line of eyelashes extensions different of traditional ones in the market. Additional Olga has a medical diploma and has been in the Healthy and Beauty market for more than 10 years.
Why patent and Innovation?
Vertically positioned two or three false eyelashes in double or three layers.
The new name on the market - Kalinka HD and Kalinka DS.
Provide an advantage for beauticians worldwide – easy, efficient, top quality and fast to work and for customers – Double or triple lashes volume with natural and classy look.
Your contribution will fund Olga's idea to create new opportunities of work to beauticians. Create "Kalinka-Klub" and "Kalinka TV" to exchange worldwide experiences and knowledge for eyelashes extensions. 
Definitively, every support you provide to this project will be very much appreciate and always thankful to make Olga's passion and devotion to help people a reality.


Kalinka Fundraising and Benefits
Why Kalinka needs your support:
Kalinka has 4 patents and after extensive work and real market experience the products proved to be the best in the market. You can find testimonials in all my conferences, schools, beauticians and most important very satisfied customers. Now, Kalinka brand needs to expand out of France and offer the products worldwide. In order to grow Kalinka needs to produce massive with extraordinary quality and affordability. Provide beauticians worldwide with Local schools to be trained and acquire the best qualifications to do the best eyelashes extensions. 
What you will receive supporting Kalinka

Your support will turn 100% in products that will help a beautician to try and start to see the benefits of Kalinka products.
Opportunity to be in your country a provider of training, Kalinka International School and/or establish your own Eyelashes Extension Institute supported 100% by Kalinka  and be part of exclusive Kalinka-Klub. All business opportunity will include an excited credit to buy a complete line of Kalinka products and accessories to start your new endeavor. 
Even your simple support will establish a connection for the future opportunities.
If Kalinka cannot reach the goal Kalinka will invest the supported money to complete any perks ordered and continue to provide Worldwide conferences to transfer knowledge and new opportunities to existing beauticians and new ones.
Kalinka is very thankful for your support !!!! Thanks.

Expand worldwide Free Conferences to beauticians

Today if you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please, get the word out and make some noise about Kalinka campaign. Maybe you know someone interested to Eyelashes Extension business opportunity !!!!
Use the Indiegogo share tools and help Kalinka campaign to be at right hands

Thank you very much for your support and hope to hear from you soon !!!

story:
When I was a child, I would design bridal gowns for other people. I loved being creative and allowing friends conceptualize their dream dress. It was a youthful hobby that transpired into a passion. After six years of bridal sales experience, my favorite aspect of the job is helping clients feel beautiful, confident, and empowered.

While other retailers might focus on the "pitch" or the "sale," my personal emphasis as a consultant has always been about asking questions. Bridal is not about selling a dress; it is about finding THE dress and selling the experience. I want all of my clients leaving the boutique with one of two things: a dream dress or knowing what they want in their dream dress.

The goal of the bridal boutique is to offer an all-inclusive experience through providing quality inventory, membership discounts, in-house vendors, gift bags, one-on-one consulting, key partnerships, exclusive designers, and much more. It will be a one-stop-shop. Additionally once the business grows, it is my personal ambition to offer connections and resources for all of the "first" in customers' lives after the wedding such as first house and first child.

As for financing, all of the funding will go towards obtaining a SBA loan. SBA loans require 20% of the loan upfront similar to purchasing a house. The loan amount I will be requesting is $120,000, which means I will need at least $24,000 in capital. Already, I have been denied four times by financial institutions for a variety of reasons: lack of collateral, lacking 20% down, lacking enough personal equity, and the business does not exist yet. The objective of the Indiegogo Campaign is to obtain enough capital to help finance a larger portion of my loan in hopes it will be more readily approved.

Instead of searching for investors or simply asking people for money, I developed a reward system that allows everyone to receive a perk equivalent to their contribution. My two personal favorites are the pound of coffee and VIP appointment!

To review my professional career and experience, it is based around business development, sales, and customer service. To provide some examples, I helped start up a physical therapy clinic, which now has grown to two facilities under my management; I also worked with two other local businesses to help them develop with marketing, branding, and sales to generate more revenue. Now, I am consulting remotely for two startup businesses by creating and executing a marketing plan. As for my educational background, I graduated from Hope College with a degree in Spanish and Sociocultural Anthropology in 2012. In 2015, I graduated from Cornerstone University with a Masters of Business Administration.

Although the local market is saturated with bridal shops, The Market Bridal Boutique will be a unique brand and business structure to the area. The business model will be exactly how it sounds, a market. We will be emphasizing relationships rather than retail to provide more for our clients, offer a trusted network, and support the local community as well.

Please share our vision and support The Market Bridal Boutique!

story:
The NXHale Particulate Filtration System isn't a mask. NXHale is a respirator that offers full filtration of all inhaled and exhaled breath. NXHale is produced in Canada by the Dinosaur Recycling Group (DRG). DRG  is based in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. The world is becoming more complicated. Breathing, communicating and expressing yourself shouldn't be.

 

With so many options of personal protective equipment how is NXHale different? 

 

Over the past few months we have all missed human interaction and connection. The transparency of the NXHale Respirator allows us to get back to (literally) seeing those we've missed! For individuals with hearing loss or in noisy environments NXHale allows for visual communication such as facial gestures and lip-reading. Get back to clearly seeing those you've missed! 

With the support from this campaign, we are able to offer the NXHale respirator in 3 sizes. See below for the sizing diagram and a sizing tool to find your perfect fit.  

 

Find My Size

The quickest way to size yourself is to measure as shown in the image below.  We've included both millimeters and inches. If you can measure in millimeters, you will get a more accurate result. You can also download, print and have some arts & crafts fun with our downloadable sizing tool further below. In any case, if you have concerns over sizing please reach out. Typically small fits children over 10 and small adults, medium fits women and smaller men, while large fits most men. We will be offering an extra small and extra large at a later date. 

 

How to use the Sizing Tool

You can download our sizing tool here: Download Sizing Tool

When printing the sizing tool, ensure 'Scaling' is turned OFF in your pdf viewer. If you have trouble with the sizing tool, please contact us and we can help!

PPE & Environmental Impact

The amount of personal protective equipment (PPE) waste that has been generated in the past few months is staggering. By purchasing reusable PPE that can be effectively cleaned and reused, you can help reduce the waste generated by non-reusable products. 

We have designed the NXHale Respirator around four key pillars: Safety, Appearance, Sustainability and locally available Manufacturing. Although it can be more expensive to manufacture in Canada, we believe that reinvesting in our home country not only has positive effects for Canada, but shows that Canadians are as hearty and resilient as we claim. 

 

 

 

 

 

Our filters are different than other vented masks and respirators. Why? Because we filter both your inhaled breath AND your exhaled breath. This dual-filtration offers protection to both the wearer and those around them. 

Additional filter replacements are available through this campaign and will also be available by subscription service on our website soon. For the Single, Duo and Family Perks, discounted filter subscriptions can be added during check out. But, how many filters might you need? Check out the table below to find out. 

 

How to Clean

NXHale is easy to take apart and clean. Simply pop off the filter housing, remove & dispose the filter fabric then using one of the four cleaning processes below sanitize your respirator. Once dry, replace the filter media and the filter housing. All parts of the respirator (excluding the filter fabric) can be cleaned in any of these methods. Filter fabric is not recommended to be cleaned and should be thrown away when it is time to replace.

 

We've been busy since March and aren't letting up anytime soon! As this campaign is running we will continue working and making progress towards production. Watch the "Updates" section for all that we are up to. With your backing we can reach our goals, both on launching our newest product and helping to protect all of us from airborne contaminants. 

Just like our product, our product development team is also Made in Canada! The Product Development Team from the Dinosaur Recycling Group Canada is proud to present the nxhale respirator! See below for the faces and names behind this latest product. 

We look forward to working with all our supporters to deliver an exceptionally made product we can be proud of. 

We look forward to your support and working with you towards our dream!

story:
The #1 Eco-Friendly Sunglasses Designed in Italy

We have designed a high-quality product and realized it with the lowest-polluting materials available. We are very proud to say that BRERA are the best sunglasses you will ever find at an accessible price point.

Where style and functionality meet sustainability.


Nowadays, the sunglasses industry is monopolized by 4 main multinational companies, which control around 90% of the market. Therefore, they have full control of pricing and they took their advantage of the situation by turning sunglasses into a luxury product. 

However, things are starting to change thanks to brands like AUDERE, that are offering the same high-quality product at a groundbreaking accessible price. In AUDERE we produce, distribute and sell on our own. Cutting intermediaries out allows us to reduce costs and, more importantly, to do things our own way.

We’re proud to introduce you our New Eco-Friendly Model: BRERA!

It’s made of best high-quality recycled materials and comes in 4 different colorways. But we have to warn you: Choosing only one is not an easy task!

As we said, BRERA sunglasses are made from eco-friendly materials.

Our frames are made from high resistance recycled plastic, an ultra-lightweight material that is extremely tough and flexible at the same time, and offers resistance to impact and high temperatures.

Our lenses, on the other hand, are POLARIZED, category 3 UV400, and will protect you against 100% of the sun's UV rays. Using the best filters in the market was a crucial matter to us, as we want to make sure that your eyes are completely protected while you are enjoying your favourite activities.

Furthermore, thanks to FACE ID Recognition feature, you can use your phone without needing to take your sunglasses off!

We have spent many hours working on our design, making sure we have something that matches every face shape and every fashion preference. 

We were inspired both by the iconic Italian style and latest trendy contemporary designs. 

The final result is a balanced, clean, timeless and comfortable model.

 

BRERA sunglasses are produced with recycled plastic, which makes them very respectful with the environment. Moreover, all our suppliers are audited, and have ISO9000, ISO14000 and SEDEX certifications, giving them quality certificates in health and safety for their workers, freedom of association, right to collective bargaining, remuneration and working hours compliant with laws.

Our Goal is to find a balance between fashion and sustainability.

More than 1,000 kg of plastic ends up in the ocean every five seconds. As a result, 40% of the earth’s ocean areas have already been taken over by plastic. Even if we are still not able to truly know what the long-term consequences will be, we must take responsibility and start changing this disastrous situation. 

We love our planet, nature and the ocean. That is why we decided to produce sunglasses that have an extremely low impact on environment.

Our sunglasses will be made out of recycled plastic!!!

But what does that mean?

· We give a second life to a material that’s not biodegradable and would otherwise end up in landfill or in the ocean.

· Performance and durability, including high strength and functional versatility of recycled plastic is the same as traditional one, but off course with a lower environmental impact.

· It doesn’t require new petroleum to produce our sunglasses, thus we are lowering the demand for new petroleum extraction and reducing overall carbon footprint.

We know that this is just a very small action that won’t save the planet by itself, however we firmly believe that it could be a POSITIVE example to inspire others to do the same. 

All of our backers will receive their BRERA sunglasses together with a beautiful re-usable box and a matching cloth to keep your sunglasses looking fresh.

We truly believe in our products, and in the high-quality materials that we use to produce them. That is why we offer Lifetime Warranty* to all of our backers during this initial phase.

*BRERA’s Lifetime Warranty is applicable to any product that after going through our quality check present manufacturing issues once purchased.

We want you to enjoy your BRERA sunglasses anywhere in the world, that is why we offer worldwide shipping. We promise we will do everything in our hands to produce as soon as possible once our campaign finishes so you can wear your BRERA sunglasses in your next adventure!

Make sure to take a look at our TIMELINE below!

Life is never the same, so live it to the best!

That's why Audere Milano strongly believes in the importance of finding the perfect accessories to wear!

How are you feeling today? Urban chic, elegant, casual, rocker?

Wear your personal AUDERE BRERA and you won’t be ignored!

DARE WITH STYLE! 

 

Pietro, Matteo & Giacomo

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The real challenge begins now, both failure and success are in the hands of our backers.

We have invested our hours, days and months to get everything ready for this moment. Countless meetings, trips, visits, samples, and challenges... All of our efforts have been put into developing what we consider the perfect pair of sunglasses.

We are ready to face everything that comes our way with enthusiasm and dedication. Our team is eager to start working and our factories are ready to produce as many AUDERE sunglasses as you wish!

We are going to focus all of our energy into making this experience amazing for each one of our backers. We will try as hard as we can to make it on time, so you can enjoy your AUDERE as soon as possible, hoping that you will love them as much as we do.

We are ready to face everything that comes our way with enthusiasm and dedication. Our team is eager to start working and our factories are ready to produce as many AUDERE sunglasses as you wish!
We are going to focus all of our energy into making this experience amazing for each one of our backers. We will try as hard as we can to make it on time, so you can enjoy your AUDERE as soon as possible, hoping that you will love them as much as we do.

story:
Short Summary

Fashion passionate, Paris resident and a big consumer. That's me! Perhaps you, probably others! I am also an International Business graduate with sense of people's needs as well as an empathy for what makes people's lives better, more pleasant, happier and more rewarding. 

The main belief behind the FashionIT concept is that fashion really should be affordable and enriching to anyone. Clothes are still very expensive if we're looking for quality and there is a general lack of affordable easy to find and reliable consultancy on this. Fashion is associated with elite, expensive brands and skinny models. We can't leave things as they are!

FashionIT describes a universal platform of online profile matching  (full size photo, skin color, height, weight and weight distribution, individual traits), a mobile application with the capacity to rapidly match colors and clothes combinations that can give you a rapid glimpse of what you could look like in real life ....with a little help. Nothing will be Photoshoped, just real affordable clothes combinations for which you get quotations and discounts when downloading the application. 

If you believe you know who you are, wait to see how we see you! We aim to reveal people's potential and will not settle for anything less.

And yes, image does count and does buy and we all get one regardless of how we care about it or what we do about it!

HELP US REVEAL HUMAN BEAUTY IN EVERYONE!

What We Need & What You Get

We need 25.000 § to finance the application set up, building the matching database and hosting it, marketing and advertising our business to retail fashion chains to get them interested in offering important benefits to users, implementing IBeacon technology and being able to support higher server expenses. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea and would like to contribute and you can't, beyond a big thank you for good intentions, here is how you can help us in other ways:

  • Get the word out and mention our campaign to your friends, family and business related that you think could be interested in the idea and would benefit from its cause
  • Feel free to use Indiegogo share tools, Facebook, Twitter and any other platform that can spread out the word

Thank you and may we all find our most beautiful alternative of life!

    Other Ways You Can Help If you like our idea and would like to contribute and you can't, beyond a big thank you for good intentions, here is how you can help us in other ways:  Get the word out and mention our campaign to your friends, family and business related that you think could be interested in the idea and would benefit from its cause Feel free to use Indiegogo share tools, Facebook, Twitter and any other platform that can spread out the word   Thank you and may we all find our most beautiful alternative of life!

story:
·Smart wearing devices are popular but fall short of expecatation in 2015. 

·We are wondering: who need the smart device most?

·Baby！

·The one who can't tell us his need in words.





            Why Smart pee-pee


-No Red asses and diaper rash
-No urine, wetness and poop on the baby’s diaper area anymore Keep the baby’s    delicate skin dry and comfortable.
-Reminder in time in the night guarantee a good sleeping for baby and parents.
-Magic sticker makes it available for all the diaper.
-Safe and nickel free material will avoid any allergy, and make it safe for baby to  wear 
-If you’re ready for toilet training for your child, pee pee regularity in APP will help  you
-Help new parents to become baby care expert quickly! 
-compatible with IOS and Android system


Press


Thin and Light

Thin in thickness, light in weight, baby feels free to wear anywhere. Round size makes the germ fee and easy to be clean. We managed to keep the Smart Pee Pee design clean and simple, stylish and practical. 

             Smart-- 24-hours  nanny

Waterproof sensor tracks the wetness and temperature  of diaper, and data is synchronized with smart phone in real time. When paper nappy is wet or soiled, with moisture and temperature increasing, phone alarms and remind you “change the diaper”. It's really a good Nanny for baby, especially in the night.


              Potty training assistant

Pee-pee record  will be kept in the phone automatically and calculation system will expect pee-pee time accordingly. What’s more, when the baby is ready for potty training, the pee record will give you a big favor.



          Goodness and Safety

                      

                      Spec

·Size: 26mm (diameter), 7.4mm (edge)
·Weight: About 6.6g
·Battery: continuous working about 1500 hours
·Compatibility: iOS and Android
·Waterproof : IP67




              How we started?

The story of Smart pee-pee began more than a year ago when Tom  got his angel - the little boy Jerry. Once the paper nappy went wet, Jerry would keep crying and had a  bad sleeping especially in  the night. As new parents, Tom and wife were exhausted to take care of the little baby in the day and it was really hard for them to check the diaper frequently in the midnight . Jerry’s crying really made them heart-breaking and they become drawn for it. 

So Tom came up with an idea.What if there’s any device which monitors the diaper and reminds for changing automatically? It'll surely make difference. This is where we start to design the smart pee-pee.



       How Smart Pee-pee works

                    

                   Our Team

                 

                     Timeline




              Funds Breakdown

We're trying to makes funds breakdown transparent. Thanks for your supporting, 


               Why indiegogo

Smart pee-pee has finished the prototype and design. But, we still can't carry on the mass production and  bring it to more people for not enough capital. Thus, we fund in the indiegogo for material and production fees, and hope for your supporting. Any comment for the smart pee-pee will be sincerely appreciated by us to improve the item. 

                         Perks



                        FAQ

What is included in the early bird pledge?

An early bird pledge means you’ll save $34USD off $45USD retail price. First 20 supporters will get smart pee-pee by 1$USD.

Will I get charged right away if I pledge now?

Yes. Contributors are charged at the time of the transaction, however, if we fail to reach our goal by the end of the campaign, your transaction will be refunded.

When will smart pee-pee be delivered? 

It is expected to send to you on November, since our samples has been ready and we've contacted with a manufacture with 5 year history in Shenzhen. The mass production process will be quick. 

How will you know where to send my stuff?

Your shipping information and address will be collect during the check-out process. If you need to upgrade your shipping address, please email sales@ancam-tech.com.

Do you ship to the EU?

Yes, international shipping is available.

How will shipping be handled internationally?

The shipping cost for worldwide will be $10USD, no matter how many items do you order in one time.

When will the product be on the market after the campaign is over?

Once we have shipped smart pee-pee to all of our backers, we will prepare to release the product to the public.

Can the batteries be replaced?

Tools will be delivered out with smart pee pee to replace battery

Will there be continued support/updates for the app?

Yes, we will continue to updated the app for more features and better function.

How long shall we change the battery？

Normally a battery works for 3 moths. Low battery warning will be showed by APP or red light signal.

Can we turn on smart pee-pee at anytime？

Slight shaking will wake up it at anytime. Put aside for more than 6 hours, it will shut off automatically. 

Can we install the app in all the smart phone？

Apple phone: above IOS 7.0 version; above BT4.0

Android phone: above Android 4.3 version; above BT4.0
Otherwise it can’t be connected and works.

Yes, we will continue to updated the app for more features and better function.

story:
Cotton being the most preferred fabric it’s susceptibility to water and other common liquid-stains and odor is now a thing of the past with ZeroW.

Imagine getting ready for work or for play without having to worry about the after-effects of spills and liquid stains, wrinkles or odor from ruining your chances of a good day !

ZeroW gives us the confidence to remain oblivious to a spill of orange juice, soy-sauce or coffee in addition to perspiration stains and wrinkles to always remain perfectly presentable either at work or at play. 

Contemporary and minimal designs that form the basis of everyday use, ZeroW’s next gen liquid and stain proof apparel is 100% PURE COTTON allowing you to feel the softness and enjoy the comfort and breath-ability of the fabric. With the benefits of the basket weave structure of OXFORD, the lustrous aspect of the garment is also maintained making it a popular fabric for a dress shirt.

Aesthetic natural soft cotton clothing in combination with tested hydrophobic technology is the hallmark of ZeroW cutting edge offering in the world of upcoming apparel for the future.

 

Cotton is the most preferred fabric of all time but is also well known to be susceptible to water and all kinds of liquid stains. Addressing these problems with traditional solutions always involved a degree of degradation in regards to the overall quality of the fabric, feel and usability.

The ZeroW collection is made with an additional layer of encapsulated cotton fibers to form a protective coating capable of repelling all kinds of liquids like water, coffee, wet-dirt stains etc. and maintaining all the original qualities of cotton that we all admire so much !

 

             

                          1)                      COFFEE STAINS 

 

                           

 

                     2)                     COLOR WATER

                          

                    3)                     HONEY

 

                         

 

           

           

            

 

            

           

 

           

 

            

 

 

         

 

         

 

 

          

 

 

          

The following care instructions are recommended for maintaining the original properties of the fabric. Not adhering to the same affects the fabric’s 'liquid repellency' in the long run.

  • ALWAYS machine or hand- wash in cold water
  • ALWAYS only steam iron the fabric and DO NOT use high-heat irons.
  • ALWAYS tumble dry low
  • ALWAYS turn the garment inside-out before washing
  • ALWAYS wash with like colored garments to prevent external coloration.
  • DO NOT bleach the fabric or laundry dry-clean
  • DO NOT use a fabric softener on the fabric

Some strong detergents may affect the overall effectiveness of fabric so please test the same before washing. We recommend using an organic detergent

For best results, allow spills to roll off the garment; if any remains, a small amount of water will wash it away.

Q. Which stains will not work with the fabric ?

A. Although the technology will mostly always repel water-based liquids, it’s still not impervious to dirt and oil-based stains. Hot liquids may also result in increased staining.

Q. How long will the original repellent effects stay?

A. The original repellent properties last longer the less you wash the clothing. Normally, the fabric should easily last through 15-20 washes provided the care instructions are followed diligently.

Q. Is this fabric coating ‘certified-safe’ ?

A. Our coating technology is ISO Certified, PFOS-free, and PFOA-free and absolutely safe

Q. How can the wrinkles be smoothed ?

A. Ironing on a high heat may affect the fabric but using a steam iron on a low setting will remove any wrinkles.

Q. What is the composition of the garment?

A. 100% pure natural cotton

IMPORTANT WARNING

This fabric is washable but still susceptible to strong chemical-detergents. If you do not use an organic detergent, the water-repellent coating may be damaged in the washing process. Please follow the care instructions for best results and maximum durability.

 

 

SUPPORT US

If you like what we’re doing, please support us in this campaign and like, share, or re-tweet our activity

Please spread the word with #ZeroW

RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

MANUFACTURING
We are in the process of continuous evolution in terms of setting up infrastructure capable of mass productions of apparel. As such for orders above 1000 pieces there could be an additional delay in the production/dispatch times.

FULFILLMENT

We try our best to ensure seamless and error-prone dispatching and shipping but are also limited to a small team handling multiple facets of the business. We would certainly try our best to resolve any issues that arise due to possible inadequacies FROM OUR END including shipping reimbursements.

DELIVERY

All orders are shipped via Priority International Shipment.  

Errors or issues with shipping companies is common and usually out of our control, however, in case of problems like stolen, lost or damaged shipments we certainly would be able to file an insurance claim with the shipment agencies, but not cover the cost of replacement if applicable.

OUR FABRIC
We are dedicated to continuous improvement and quality assurance in regards to our products and services, however, it is still imperative that the recommended care and usage instructions be followed for best results. Although the fabric is washable it is still susceptible to strong chemicals like softeners and color preserving agents. Please ensure that an organic detergent is always used to ensure that the liquid-repellent coating is not damaged in the washing process. Please follow the care instructions.

***************************************************************

story:
Using ecologic products is a good start, but it's not enough. We all need to do something else, remember, there isn't a Planet B. 

Some of today's problems include endangered species, deforestation and human issues. These are just three of many global issues and the ones I want to be focus to.

For your support you will get a T-shirt, a Hoodie or a Legging, made with the best 100% certified organic cotton in the market.

Our cotton fiber is certified by Control Union (formerly known as SKAL) as well as other certification bodies recognized by the USDA NOP. 

                                      

                                  Don't just talk about what you can do; make it happen!

         

              

The objective of this project is to raise funds to start a movement, a creation of a minded community, targeted to help the earth with the three issues described before. Through a website, t-shirts and other products we're going to raise awareness and participation, and it's actually with these products that a 30% of the profits are going DIRECTLY to their respective environmental foundations.

Basically there are three goals that I try to achieve once this project is funded:

• Create awareness through the displaying of the message on the t-shirts. 

• Encourage participation and change minds through our products message.

• Support foundations. A big percentage, 30% of the profit will be donated to two renowned environmental foundations, WWF and Children international.

You can contact me if you need to know more details about these foundations and how the donations collected will be distributed.

                       

My name is Danny, I'm a graphic designer who's passionate about t-shirts. You can check some of my designs and learn more about me at www.dannyartstudio.com 

I'm also an environmental activist.  While many people might become stalled when faced with the question, "How much good can one individual do?" we, activists believe that one dedicated and persistent person can make a difference.

I'm an active member and long time donor of Children International.  I've been helping children through this foundation.

All the sales of t-shirts or hoodies with the KID design will make a donation to children international of 30% of the profits, this is not a small donation, and this is what these movement is targeted to, to help and in the process we help ourselves.

                                                      

                                     

                                    You can visit their website at www.children.org

I'm also a member of WWF, the leading organization in wildlife conservation and endangered species

The sales of the GORILLA, TIGER, PANDA and TREE will be helping this foundation with these specific causes with a 30% donation. This organisation offers a symbolic adoption choice through donations, that's why our designs said I adopted a tiger, a gorilla or a Panda, because thanks to your donation it become possible.

If you buy a t-shirt with a TIGER design, 30% of the profit collected it will be donated to the TIGER movement, and you will get a t-shirt that it will proudly display your support. If you buy a t-shirt with the Tree design your donation will go to the forestation movement, and so on.

              

                                                    You can visit their site at www.worldwildlife.org

               

I’ve already put in a lot of my time and money into planning the first run of products, website, branding and community movement. But to actually put them into production, I need your help. That’s where you and your friends and family come in! With your help, I can produce these products and ship them out to you. The funds collected in Indiagogo is going to the production of the  t-shirts, the creation of the website, 30% of the profit go to the foundations, and there are many other expenses like advertising, shipping materials, and service fees.

EVERY purchase will generate a donation, therefore the more it sells, the more it helps.

I'm gonna updated every step of the project with detailed information and pictures. 

        

You will get your rewards as soon as JANUARY 2017! and is FREE SHIPPING IN THE U.S.A!

REMEMBER, These designs are limited ONLY for Indiegogo backers, once the project gets funded new designs will come, but these are the very first ones!

I already have the designs ready to print, the printer company ready to start, and the apparel company has these clothing stocked in a warehouse ready to send out.

         

         

         

         

          

          

         

         

There are many steps needed to bring this project alive, and they cost money, like a website creation, buying clothes, printing them, advertising, shipping and more. I can't do this alone. This is an unselfish project where the main beneficiary won't be myself, it'll be the Earth and as an added value, we, the ones that live on it and our sons and daughters. 

        

I already bought the domain ihelpedtheearth.com to guarantee the movement name will be available and to start my commitment. The website is not running yet, it will be develop once the project is funded. 

        

    High quality soft Organic T-shirts, screen printed with high quality ecological ink.

 

          

                                                            Also printed on the back.

 

          

                                        These t-shirts make a statement, and look fashionable.

 

           

                                                           Also fitted for the Ladies.

 

                             

                                              Proudly display what you stand for.

 

           

                 Keep fashion and ecological mind together with these Organic Leggings.

 

          

Stop wearing Hoodies displaying brand names that gives you nothing in return, with this hoodie, you know you have done something for the Earth and for yourself.

       

 Authentic organic fabrics and clothing can help the environment in a number of ways, such as:  

•No synthetic pesticides are used.  

•Organic cotton farming produces far less CO2 emissions. Organic farming takes 1.5 tons of CO2 per acre per year out of the atmosphere.

•Organic cotton farming uses up to 60% less water than conventional farming methods.  

•Pesticide or herbicide residues are not entered accidentally into the environment.  

•Humans and animals are not exposed to chemical pesticides or herbicides.  

•When the fabric is discarded, pesticides and herbicides are not returned to the earth in landfill, or enter into recycling process.

Risks and challenges

I already started making originals and samples to minimize the risks and to be sure I can deliver in the time promised. 
I plan to use the same printer company that I've been using before and they're ready to start. 
I also already bought the domain name Ihelpedtheearth.com in preparation for this project. 
All the materials needed are available for me to order them and start production. 
But there are always some risks in manufacturing, like busy production lines or out of stock fabrics that may cause delays. I have done my best to foresee these probable issues and have added some time to the the delivery date.
story_txt:
Using ecologic products is a good start, but it's not enough. We all need to do something else, remember, there isn't a Planet B. 
Some of today's problems include endangered species, deforestation and human issues. These are just three of many global issues and the ones I want to be focus to.
For your support you will get a T-shirt, a Hoodie or a Legging, made with the best 100% certified organic cotton in the market.
Our cotton fiber is certified by Control Union (formerly known as SKAL) as well as other certification bodies recognized by the USDA NOP. 
                                      
                                  Don't just talk about what you can do; make it happen!
         
              

The objective of this project is to raise funds to start a movement, a creation of a minded community, targeted to help the earth with the three issues described before. Through a website, t-shirts and other products we're going to raise awareness and participation, and it's actually with these products that a 30% of the profits are going DIRECTLY to their respective environmental foundations.
Basically there are three goals that I try to achieve once this project is funded:
• Create awareness through the displaying of the message on the t-shirts. 
• Encourage participation and change minds through our products message.
• Support foundations. A big percentage, 30% of the profit will be donated to two renowned environmental foundations, WWF and Children international.
You can contact me if you need to know more details about these foundations and how the donations collected will be distributed.

                       
My name is Danny, I'm a graphic designer who's passionate about t-shirts. You can check some of my designs and learn more about me at www.dannyartstudio.com 
I'm also an environmental activist.  While many people might become stalled when faced with the question, "How much good can one individual do?" we, activists believe that one dedicated and persistent person can make a difference.
I'm an active member and long time donor of Children International.  I've been helping children through this foundation.
All the sales of t-shirts or hoodies with the KID design will make a donation to children international of 30% of the profits, this is not a small donation, and this is what these movement is targeted to, to help and in the process we help ourselves.
                                                      
                                     
                                    You can visit their website at www.children.org
I'm also a member of WWF, the leading organization in wildlife conservation and endangered species
The sales of the GORILLA, TIGER, PANDA and TREE will be helping this foundation with these specific causes with a 30% donation. This organisation offers a symbolic adoption choice through donations, that's why our designs said I adopted a tiger, a gorilla or a Panda, because thanks to your donation it become possible.
If you buy a t-shirt with a TIGER design, 30% of the profit collected it will be donated to the TIGER movement, and you will get a t-shirt that it will proudly display your support. If you buy a t-shirt with the Tree design your donation will go to the forestation movement, and so on.
              
                                                    You can visit their site at www.worldwildlife.org
               I’ve already put in a lot of my time and money into planning the first run of products, website, branding and community movement. But to actually put them into production, I need your help. That’s where you and your friends and family come in! With your help, I can produce these products and ship them out to you. The funds collected in Indiagogo is going to the production of the  t-shirts, the creation of the website, 30% of the profit go to the foundations, and there are many other expenses like advertising, shipping materials, and service fees.EVERY purchase will generate a donation, therefore the more it sells, the more it helps.I'm gonna updated every step of the project with detailed information and pictures.         You will get your rewards as soon as JANUARY 2017! and is FREE SHIPPING IN THE U.S.A!REMEMBER, These designs are limited ONLY for Indiegogo backers, once the project gets funded new designs will come, but these are the very first ones!I already have the designs ready to print, the printer company ready to start, and the apparel company has these clothing stocked in a warehouse ready to send out.                                                                           There are many steps needed to bring this project alive, and they cost money, like a website creation, buying clothes, printing them, advertising, shipping and more. I can't do this alone. This is an unselfish project where the main beneficiary won't be myself, it'll be the Earth and as an added value, we, the ones that live on it and our sons and daughters.         I already bought the domain ihelpedtheearth.com to guarantee the movement name will be available and to start my commitment. The website is not running yet, it will be develop once the project is funded.             High quality soft Organic T-shirts, screen printed with high quality ecological ink.                                                                       Also printed on the back.                                                   These t-shirts make a statement, and look fashionable.                                                                       Also fitted for the Ladies.                                                                            Proudly display what you stand for.                             Keep fashion and ecological mind together with these Organic Leggings.           Stop wearing Hoodies displaying brand names that gives you nothing in return, with this hoodie, you know you have done something for the Earth and for yourself.        Authentic organic fabrics and clothing can help the environment in a number of ways, such as:  •No synthetic pesticides are used.  •Organic cotton farming produces far less CO2 emissions. Organic farming takes 1.5 tons of CO2 per acre per year out of the atmosphere.•Organic cotton farming uses up to 60% less water than conventional farming methods.  •Pesticide or herbicide residues are not entered accidentally into the environment.  •Humans and animals are not exposed to chemical pesticides or herbicides.  •When the fabric is discarded, pesticides and herbicides are not returned to the earth in landfill, or enter into recycling process.Risks and challengesI already started making originals and samples to minimize the risks and to be sure I can deliver in the time promised. I plan to use the same printer company that I've been using before and they're ready to start. I also already bought the domain name Ihelpedtheearth.com in preparation for this project. All the materials needed are available for me to order them and start production. But there are always some risks in manufacturing, like busy production lines or out of stock fabrics that may cause delays. I have done my best to foresee these probable issues and have added some time to the the delivery date.

story:
Hello Everyone,

thank You for checking this project. My name is Simon David Kobel and I am the founder of Integrity Rising (IR) and Flock of Love (FoL). I want to develop two clothing labels that stand out due to what they stand for and therefore I want their clothes to be a deliberate statement by whoever is wearing them. As their names imply, they stand for integrity and for love. The definitions of these terms refer to the philosophy I call integritism. Which claims integrity to be the ultimate purpose of life and love to be the genuine concern for the integrity of others and eventually all.

Integrity generally describes a state of being whole. But what does being whole mean when it comes to humans? How do I become whole?

I claim, by living up to who I am. To who I wholly am. 

That means in order to gain integrity, I need to know who I am. Otherwise I don't know what to live up to.

That's where integrity starts. 

In case You want to hear or read more about integrity and love. Please watch the project video or follow Integrity Rising and Flock of Love on Instagram.

 

 

THE SYMBOLS

With IR and FoL I want to introduce two iconic symbols. I call them the Wheel of Integrity (or the Wheel of 9) and the Lovebird.

The Wheel of Integrity is a sunwheel which consits of nine 9's. 9 is the number of Integrity. Therefore it is directly referring to "Integrity" and also to "Rising".

The Loverbird is a bird whose torso depicts a heart. Therefore it is directly referring to "Flock" and also to "Love". 

Integrity is regarded as the direction and Love as the path. Both is combined in the metaphor of a flock of birds flying towards the sun.

 

SO FAR

In the past year, I have started a first attempt to offer T-Shirts, Longsleeves and Hoodies with the woven Lovebird Patch on them. All garments are sourced from Earth Positive and the patches are sewed on by a local tailor.

 

NEXT STEP

For the next step of FoL and IR I want to produce white and black T-Shirts and Longsleeves, which will be made from customized cutting patterns. The blank clothes will be the same for both IR and FoL. Once an order is placed they will either be screenprinted by myself or patches will be sewed onto them by a local tailor. 

Therefore one part of the funding will be used to create the cutting patterns and to produce:

 - 150 white T-Shirts (100% cotton / 180 GSM single jersey / sizes XS-3XL)

 - 150 black T-Shirts (100% cotton / 180 GSM single jersey / sizes XS-3XL)

 - 150 white Longsleeves (100% cotton / 180 GSM single jersey / sizes XS-3XL)

 - 150 black Longsleeves (100% cotton / 180 GSM single jersey / sizes XS-3XL)

All T-Shirts and Longsleeves will have woven neck labels with the IR and FoL Logos. They will also have the woven L2L label at the bottom left. Which stands for "learn to live" and "learn to love".

Sizing

The specifications are only indicative and may differ slightly from actual clothes. The Longsleeves will be the same length as the T-shirts but slightly slimmer.

All garments will be produced by Kipepeo Clothing in Tanzania and Kenya. Besides their own clothing, they also offer to produce clothing for other labels. Kipepeo only uses organic cotton from Tanzania and they guarantee fair working conditions to support the local economy.

Here is a beautiful documentary about Kipepeo. It gives You an insight into every step of their production process. In this documentary You can see how their own clothes are made; the clothes for IR and FoL will be produced in the same process.

 

Another part of the funding will be used to produce all the necessary labels and patches. Such as the neck labels with the Logos, the labels for the washing instructions and the L2L labels. But also the Lovebird Patches and the Wheel of Integrity Patches. The WoI Patches will be woven and laser cut like the Lovebird Patches in the picture below. Both patches are sewed on by a local tailor. All labels and patches are OEKO TEX certified.

 

Another part of the funding will be used to acquire professional screen-printing equipment. So I can set up a studio to print all clothes on demand by myself and also to be able to offer further prints whenever I want. The Equipment I want to acquire includes:

- a multicolor printing press

- several screens

- an exposure unit

- a flash dryer

- water based ink (several colors)

- several squeegees

- several ink knifes

- emulsion

- organic cleanser

and other minor supplies

 

Other things the funding will be used for are the packaging, hang tags and stickers. The packaging and the hang tags will be made of recycling materials and the stickers will be eco-friendly.

Stickers

CLOTHES

I want to offer many different prints and patches. The following designs are already available, but I constantly develop more and add them to the selection. I will also post some more on instagram during this crowdfunding campaign. @integrityrising @flockoflove 

 T-Shirts

 

Longsleeves

 

Pricing

The T-Shirts will cost between 27€ and 33€. The Longsleeves between 33€ and 39€.

 

FUTURE PLANS

My aim is to establish IR and FoL and to offer further products such as hoodies, sweatshirts, caps, beanies, shoulder bags and more. I want to offer all clothes, all patches and all prints in 9 or maybe even more different colors, so everyone can choose from those and pick the color combination she or he likes. Once an order is placed the clothes will either be screenprinted by myself or the patches will be sewed on by a professional tailor. 

I also want to offer special editions on special occasions or in collaboration with other artists.

Any excess money from this crowdfunding campaign will be used to produce further colorways or further clothes. 

 

LAST WORDS

In case You like what You see and hear, I would be very grateful for anyone who contributes to this project and anyone who shares it.

To make sure that all backers benefit from this crowd funding, I reward any contribution with a voucher in the amount of the contribution.

You can redeem it for all IR and FoL products from this and all future collections.

Bless and Thank You

story:
We are engaged in the production of products from genuine leather. All that we produce exclusively handmade. We need help to expand our production, which will open up new opportunities for us. It will allow you to create exclusive models that will delight our customers in the future.

Men's shoulder bag is one of our works.

Specifications:

 

  • Color: Black (other colors are possible)
  • Material: Leather.
  • Weight: 200 grams
  • Size: 17 * 18 * 7 centimeters.
  • Internal pocket for the phone.
  • Side pocket with zipper for your small things.
  • The bag contains things necessary in everyday life: documents, wallet, keys.

Another of our works, universal wallet that is suitable for both women and men.

Specifications:

 

  • Color: Light brown (other colors are possible)
  • Material: Leather
  • Weight: 100 grams
  • Size: 17 * 10 * 3
  • Zip pocket for coins.
  • Department under the paper notes.
  • Division under the cell phone.
  • Two departments under the card.

Every week we will add one item, now a great blue backpack is on the way, you will definitely like it.

 

Timeline

The project will end on December 13, 2018, a two-week period for processing funds and ordering material and in January 2019 we will be able to send our first order.

Risks

We value and respect our customers so all orders will pass on time just as we promise.

story:
The Goldfinch Jacket is the most comforting thing you’ll ever wear. Our meticulously designed, ultra soothing weighted jacket channels the power of deep touch pressure to give you a hug that lasts all day.

Our signature Anxiety Armor weighted inner vest distributes deep touch pressure across the upper torso, bringing you immediate therapeutic effects with only a fraction of the weight of a weighted blanket.

The Goldfinch Jacket is now available in two options: the classic bomber and the cozy zip hoodie. Both are packed with features designed to enhance your anxiety relief experience. They include ergonomic front-closure and pocket zippers, a fitted rib knit collar and cuffs, and giant soft pockets for discreet fidgeting. The Anxiety Armor inner vest is attached to the outer jacket with easy-to-use hidden zippers and snaps.

The fleece outer jacket is super soft to the touch, with a smooth, cool cotton lining. As soon as you put it on, you feel a comforting weight across your shoulders, chest, and upper back that feels like a gentle hug – reassuring, but not constricting. Like swaddling a baby, the Goldfinch Jacket provides instant relief that stays with you even after you take it off.

 

Everyday life is packed with stressors. According to the National Alliance on Mental Illness, 1 in 4 Americans reported suffering from a stress or anxiety related disorder in 2018. Now in 2020, we’re facing an unprecedented global pandemic that has created immense and sudden lifestyle changes for everyone in the world. 

Adapting to a new way of life is stressful, and uncertainty is even worse. Panic, stress, and anxiety are everywhere, and it can be difficult to find even a moment of relief.

Chronic stress doesn’t just affect your emotional experience – it can contribute to long-term health problems like heart disease, diabetes, and even cancer.

The most effective treatment methods for stress and anxiety are medication and therapy, but those options aren’t accessible to everyone. Even those who have achieved a good balance with their treatment sometimes need a little extra support. That’s why we’re here to bring you the perfect anxiety relief tool – one that can bring you instant comfort no matter where you are or what you’re doing.

 

Deep touch pressure activates the parasympathetic nervous system, which is responsible for calming the body down after stress. Essentially, it creates the opposite of the fight or flight response, allowing your body to rest and reset.

Like weighted blankets, the calming effects of weighted wearables are helpful for everyone. Deep touch pressure has been scientifically proven to naturally and immediately decrease perceived levels of stress and anxiety in many populations, including college students, children with sensory processing difficulties, and anyone who finds comfort in a hug.

Care centers use weighted wearables to help calm patients’ anxiety and promote focus and relaxation. On top of that, studies show that weighted wearables also increase your ability to cope with daily stressors.

The Goldfinch Jacket can be used to bring relief to any stressful daily task, including commuting, shopping, studying, working, or cleaning your home. It’s also the perfect tool for increasing relaxation during your downtime, especially during naps, meditation, or even just hanging out on the couch.

No matter what you’re doing, putting on the Goldfinch Jacket brings you an immediate reduction in stress and anxiety, and an increase in comfort and calm.

 

The Goldfinch Jacket is more than just the science behind it. From design to materials sourcing, our goal was to create a jacket that looks and feels so comforting that it can provide you with anxiety relief even without the added weights.

Our design references classic, timeless clothing styles to create a jacket that will keep you stylish for a lifetime. Its water-resistant outer shell will keep you looking great in any weather, making it the perfect multifunctional addition to your wardrobe.

When you put the Goldfinch Jacket on for the first time, you’ll notice how comforting our thoughtfully sourced fabrics feel. The outer jacket is made from a luxurious, ultra-soft recycled fleece, and detaches from the Anxiety Armor inner vest for easy machine washing. The jacket lining and the Anxiety Armor inner vest are made from a light, breathable organic cotton sateen, keeping you comfortable in any weather.

 

The Goldfinch Jacket features weights made of high density silicone. Our silicone is custom blended to be extra heavy while retaining enough flexibility and softness to conform easily to the shape of your body.

Silicone is non-toxic, washer and dryer safe, and resilient to temperature changes, making it perfect for use in a weighted wearable.

This is a jacket made for your body, not just any body. The Goldfinch Jacket’s weight distribution is designed to be customizable to your needs. 

Different people like to feel deep touch pressure in different places, so the weights in our Anxiety Armor inner vest can be added or removed to suit your preference. We’re also offering two different sets of weights, one heavier than the other, to accommodate different sensory needs.

 

 

After a year of trial and error, we’ve arrived at a prototype that our beta testers love. Right now, we’re in the process of making final design tweaks in response to our beta testers’ feedback. By the time this campaign ends, our manufacturing partners will be ready to go!

To get started on manufacturing, we need to meet our factory’s minimum order requirements. Through the pre-orders you place here on our Indiegogo page, we will be able to meet that minimum while offering an exclusive launch-only discount to you, our loyal community of backers.

All we need to get production started is your support! We can’t wait to introduce a whole new form of anxiety relief into your everyday life.

 

Based on our past experience with organizing a production run during the covid-19 crisis, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders of the Goldfinch Jacket within three months of beginning the manufacturing process. However, as we know from previous global pandemics, there’s always the possibility that another wave of disease cases will slow down our manufacturing process. To that end, we’re cushioning our fulfillment goal by an extra month to account for possible timeline changes.

 

For more information, visit our website at goldfinchanxiolytics.com. To hear from our beta testers, check out our Instagram @goldfinchofficial. Follow us there or on Facebook @comfortyoucontrol to join our self-care community!

 

Thank you so much for your support! This mission is really personal to me. Like so many others, I’ve been struggling with stress and anxiety for as long as I can remember. The Goldfinch Jacket is the culmination of all of my lived experiences and the product of everything I learned during my years studying textiles and design. With your help, I’m going to bring this dream into reality – and in the process, you and I will be changing people’s lives for the better. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart. I couldn’t do this without you.

Mercury

The outer jacket is made from a luxurious, ultra-soft recycled fleece, and detaches from the Anxiety Armor inner vest for easy machine washing. The jacket lining and the Anxiety Armor inner vest are made from a light, breathable organic cotton sateen, keeping you comfortable in any weather. The Goldfinch Jacket features weights made of high density silicone. Our silicone is custom blended to be extra heavy while retaining enough flexibility and softness to conform easily to the shape of your body.Silicone is non-toxic, washer and dryer safe, and resilient to temperature changes, making it perfect for use in a weighted wearable.This is a jacket made for your body, not just any body. The Goldfinch Jacket’s weight distribution is designed to be customizable to your needs. Different people like to feel deep touch pressure in different places, so the weights in our Anxiety Armor inner vest can be added or removed to suit your preference. We’re also offering two different sets of weights, one heavier than the other, to accommodate different sensory needs.  After a year of trial and error, we’ve arrived at a prototype that our beta testers love. Right now, we’re in the process of making final design tweaks in response to our beta testers’ feedback. By the time this campaign ends, our manufacturing partners will be ready to go!To get started on manufacturing, we need to meet our factory’s minimum order requirements. Through the pre-orders you place here on our Indiegogo page, we will be able to meet that minimum while offering an exclusive launch-only discount to you, our loyal community of backers.All we need to get production started is your support! We can’t wait to introduce a whole new form of anxiety relief into your everyday life. Based on our past experience with organizing a production run during the covid-19 crisis, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders of the Goldfinch Jacket within three months of beginning the manufacturing process. However, as we know from previous global pandemics, there’s always the possibility that another wave of disease cases will slow down our manufacturing process. To that end, we’re cushioning our fulfillment goal by an extra month to account for possible timeline changes. For more information, visit our website at goldfinchanxiolytics.com. To hear from our beta testers, check out our Instagram @goldfinchofficial. Follow us there or on Facebook @comfortyoucontrol to join our self-care community! Thank you so much for your support! This mission is really personal to me. Like so many others, I’ve been struggling with stress and anxiety for as long as I can remember. The Goldfinch Jacket is the culmination of all of my lived experiences and the product of everything I learned during my years studying textiles and design. With your help, I’m going to bring this dream into reality – and in the process, you and I will be changing people’s lives for the better. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart. I couldn’t do this without you.Mercury

story:
Cooper Submaster Automatic on stainless steel bracelet


COOPER MILITARY SUBMASTER AUTOMATIC DATE SM8017 5517

The Submaster has some special design details that make it truly unique as a vintage dive watch. The two most noticeable differences are in the hands and bezel insert. The Submaster lacks a traditional Mercedes hour hand and instead has a broad and stubby sword hand, and the bezel insert has individual minute markers going all around the bezel, rather than just from 0-15. The other more subtle details are a full shoulder lug bars for use with nylon straps. Solid stainless steel case with automatic movement, black dial, screwdown case back, screwdown crown, 20mm lugs. The Submaster takes the classic Bond-approved styling of the Submariner and tacks on some sportier and more aggressive features designed to maximize visibility for military usage. No box, manuals or papers are provided with this watch.

Broke, But In Love With Cooper Watches?

If you are on board, but don't have the money to spare, you can still be a part of our watch making story!

SHARING IS CARING

It only takes one moment to like our Facebook page, Tweet, or Instagram our project; EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS!!
