story:
THE INSPIRATION

“Fines for throwing cigarette butts on the ground”, this piece of news finally made me decide to do something about what I’ve always felt was a social problem, hoping that the time was right and that people were ready to make a change, with minimal daily effort, a solution could be found to a problem with enormous ramifications.


THE CONCEPT

With 2 trash we wanted to create an item of compact dimensions, with a stylish ergonomic design, a vivid range of colours that could be an essential accessory that you can carry around easily in your handbag or coat, like a wallet, make-up kit or smartphone. Simple and elegant, with a secure screw top and an internal stainless steel piece where you can comfortably put out your cigarette butts, it will come to be a distinctive part of your style. Secure in your handbag, completely odourless and machine washable once emptied it offers repeated use and will become a standard part of your daily items.

Colours

Five colours, three colorful and two in more sober tone to please everyone's taste! All of them are Makrolon, top brand in Polycarbonate material.



Models
Smooth or Personalized, choose the model you prefer!! Simple and linear, with an extremely perfect design. It could become unique adding our logo and/or something personal with laser technology. 2Trash is made of Polycarbonate the most fine thermoplastic material. 
Size: cm 14,7 x cm 3 approx. (inch 5,8x1,2). Lenght measure between an iphone6 and 6plus.
Weight: 50 gr. approx.. (0,11 lb)
101% Made in Italy

*For special edition contact previously by mail (only stock order to be defined).


THE FEATURES

Portable means solid, secure, handy, easy, good looking, customizable….these are the main features we've put in 2Trash.

THE AIM

As a result of your contribution, once we reach our fundraising threshold we’ll have the necessary funds to build the mold and start a mass production. Choose your favourite colour, insert a customized phrase if you want and contribute to being the architect of a profound cultural change. Be the first to adopt this new style among your friends.

Smoking is dangerous for the environment, let’s do our part to reduce cigarette butts pollution!!

HOW TO ORDER YOUR 2Trash

Select and order a perk!!

Later send us a message with these informations:

  • Colour name
  • Writing and logo: in case of personalized model. Up to 20 characters including spaces (font Calibri). The sign will be copied as reported in double quotes.
If you have doubt about the colour or the sign to put on it, don't worry!! Order your 2Trash now and then think about the options. You have time until the end of the campaign to decide about the colour and the sign. 
For stock order or any enquiry conctact us by e-mail. We'll be glad to answer all your questions.
ENJOY IT!!

Links on the topic "pollution and cigarette butts":

Institutions

http://www.unep.org/
http://www.cigwaste.org/   
http://universe.sdsu.edu/sdsu_newscenter/news_story.aspx?sid=71209


Some of the articles and research

http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3088407/
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2697937/
http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0117393

story:
TORQ Pickleball – Starting an Evolution

For the fastest growing sport in the US, TORQ has created a new concept in Pickleball design - quiet performance in a patented, high tech and customizable Pickleball paddle. Carbon Fiber edge guard with interchangeable inserts and handle shapes lets players build the perfect paddle for every playing condition.

TORQ – High Tech Materials, Quiet Performance

The “Quiet” TORQ Racquet with polyurethane construction and gel tape around the insert and inside the solid edge guard.

Graphite TORQ consisting of a USAPA approved graphite cover and aluminum honeycomb.

The TORQ Racquet Series can be disassembled with quick turn screws allowing new inserts, handle shapes and grips to be swapped out.

Special gel tape (shown in blue) applied to the insert becomes compressed within the edge guard frame to dampen noise and vibration.


Technical Drawings:


Use of Proceeds:

A little about us:


THE TORQ TEAM – Innovative minds

Tom O’Rourke - CEO  20 years in the start-up world and creator of the TORQ Racquet System.  Past Director of Product Development for the company who invented the game.

Mark Nakagawa – Head of Product Development  Mark invented the interchangeable paddle idea together with Tom O’Rourke.  He has invented other breakthrough products in sports apparel and ski design and has seen how innovations can change the sports world, from tennis racquet technology, to revolutionary bat handle design.  

THE MARKET NEED:  A Lack of Innovation

Pickleball is the fastest growing sport in the US, having grown from 450,000 players to almost 2 million over the past ten years.  It is expected to reach 4 million players by 2020.

The sport is 50 years old, but it has been mostly a cottage industry until three years ago. 

The last breakthrough idea happened in the 1980s when commercial airplane flooring composite replaced wood as a new paddle material.  Since then every new paddle has been based on that same idea.

Now the best players are people coming from other racquet sports.  They expect space age/carbon fiber “racquet” design, and are accustomed to playing with - and paying for - truly high-quality equipment.  Tennis, racquetball and squash blogs are full of stories of Pickleball, and how people have added Pickleball to their routines, or switched entirely to this new, less injury prone sport.

TORQ Sports Group has found a way to create a new evolution in the sport, to help it grow to levels of high expectation and performance that other sports like tennis and racquetball already enjoy. TORQ has invented and patented a new paddle design that delivers higher performance, simpler manufacturing, less expensive updates and replacements, and allows the entire industry to participate in its success.

Who we are:

TORQ Sports Group is a Seattle based company made up of experts in the Pickleball and racquet sport industry.  Its vision is to introduce new innovative designs and sales development techniques to this rapidly growing sport. 

The sport of Pickleball began in the late 1960s as a diversion for a family in Bainbridge Island to keep the kids busy during the summer months.  The first games were played with wooden paddles and a whiffle-ball found in a garage.  The family quickly made up rules and gave structure to a court sport that was fast, energetic and, most importantly, fun.

The evolution of today’s Pickleball equipment:

For years the game was played with wooden paddles cut out of simple plywood sheets.  Soon handle forms were added and lighter types of wood were found.  But not till the mid 1980s did a new paddle concept arrive when a Boeing engineer took airplane flooring material, made up of light composite honeycomb cores and graphite surfaces, and used it as a wood substitute.  Its light weight yet sturdy construction provided the first real breakthrough in the sport.  Suddenly paddle design began to be a major factor, creating significant advantages to players and changing the make-up of the market.

Since that time, all manufacturers have built their paddles with the same construction methods and concepts.  Not one significant new paddle idea has appeared.

The TORQ Sports Group was created to change all that.


How You Can Help:

1 – Contribute to our campaign and get the first TORQ Racquet Series off the assembly line.

2 - Spread the word on social media.  We need everyone interested in the TORQ Racquet Series to share our campaign with as many people as possible. Sharing our campaign is easy - just select from the share buttons at the top of this page or embed our video and campaign link into as many blogs, news feeds and web pages as possible.  

3 – Become one of our Player Reps!  We need people in each city around the world to spread the word about TORQ.  You can learn about our programs by contacting us directly at tor@torqinc.com.

4 - Check your inbox for email updates as the campaign progresses and find out what you can do to spread the word.

5 – And don’t forget to ask questions and give us your feedback.  We need your input!  Thanks!


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!  It takes bold, fearless people to create a breakthrough product, and even more fearless supporters.  We can’t thank you enough for helping us grow the sport of Pickleball through innovation.

We promise to always design and build the best in high tech sports products, and keep finding new ways to improve performance and skill.

TORQ Sports Group Team
tor@torqinc.com

story:
The idea
 

Are cryptocurrencies too cryptic for you? We make them real! 

Imagine an accessory that works for you. Asides from making you look more stylish, it keeps your digital assets safe, enables you to transfer (crypto/digital) cash and connects you to algorithmic trading software - making you money owning it.  Truely, a 21st century gem. 

First it will serve as access key to the major crypto exchanges (so you can safely access your different wallets simultaneously). 

Then it will function as membership key to use algorithmic trading software - you know the one that Wall Street uses and is hitting the masses at the speed of a turtle on steroids.

Finally it will function as payment system, because in our vision of the future we won't have plastic cards or paper cash. 

Are you new to blockchain and crypto? Getting started is not that hard. Get your first crypto's at Coinbase/Lykke/... And get this accessory!

 

The products
 

Our wearables connect you to our custom software, safely.

 

RING 
 


 

BRACELET 
 

 

KEYCHAIN

The Plan


We came up with this idea while working on our algorithmic trading software. 

STEP 1

create viable user base & start-up funding running this campaign

STEP 2

introduce accessories as extra safe key to crypto wallets (of major exchanges)

STEP 3

introduce algorithmic trading as extra feature of accessory

STEP 4

introduce mobile payment system as extra feature of accessory

STEP 5

introduce new generation of accessories
 

The outcome of this campaign will enable completion of STEPS 1 to 3. 

STEP 4&5 will require further adoption of blockchain in general and extra funding for global scale marketing & implementation. These steps are outside of the scope of this crowdfunding campaign.

 

The Team 


Christophe Van Doninck, 31 yo, engineer/entrepreneur/NFCpioneer/dancer

"I just love this idea and I can't wait to make it happen. I have always been interested in tech and its applications. Recently I have been studying blockchain. After studying engineering I started experimenting as an entrepreneur. One of the projects I started was an NFC-based matching algorithm. It worked but lacked funding. This idea connects the dots for me!"

Wim Bastenie, 31 yo, trader/carpenter/coder/kitesurfer

"It's been my dream setting up an ambitious business like this. Can't wait to crack this."

More to be announced as we go. Plenty of candidates to say the least. We don't want to rush building our dream team. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need money to (pay the bills while we):

  • Develop custom software
    • connecting accessory to wallets from major exchanges as access key
    • trading algorithm (like it's rocket science)
    • payment system 
  • Bulk purchase accessories
  • Grow our team
  • Set up marketing

By purchasing our accessories we can continue developing. Once we finish the basic functionality of using the accessory as a key we will start shipping. After that, we will continue selling accessories and developing its functionalities.


The Impact


Payments have become digital. With the upcoming blockchain technology this will only increase. BlockChain Accessories enables an extra layer of safety to your digital assets, liquidity and algorithmic trading; thereby creating the ultimate user experience concerning modern day money and spending. 


Risks & Challenges
 

We have minimized the risks by planning step-by-step.
Our minimum viable product is close to reality and so is its first upgrade. That functionality would already be of great value to lots of people. Our biggest challenge will be in scaling it to the next step, which is why it is important that you support and share this campaign! Help us get off to a good start! 

 

*We could have organized this as an ICO but feel this campaign on this platform will help grow the adoption of blockchain by the masses. An ICO might still happen in the future. Our backers will be the first to know.

story:
Are You Ready for Adventure?

Every day, there are people who lunge toward adventure, letting nothing stand between them and all of the fun and thrills they know are out there. When they hear that there is an opportunity to explore or a destination they can visit, they are all in. Without hesitation, without question, they jump forward, flying or sailing or driving to someplace new – seeing all there is to see in the world and making the most of life.

Is this you?

If so, then we are right there by your side.

At GRID Watches, we are adventurers, explorers, and dreamers ourselves. We never tire of seeing the world, pushing ourselves to uncover all of its mysteries and learn all that we can learn. Often, we look back on the memories that we have made, thinking back lovingly of the grand places that we have visited and the incredible times that we have shared together.

To keep this sense of wonder and adventure always with us, we created a quaility watch – something new, something unique.

Welcome to GRID Watches.

On every watch, we aim to capture the inspiration and sense of adventure and travel, while offering an exclusive quality for professionals alike. 


About the Watches

Our watches are stylish and world-class, featuring:

  • Multi-layered City Grid Dial
  • Japanese Quartz Movement
  • Luminous hands and markers
  • Stainless Steel Case and Bracelet
  • Detailed Engravings
  • Quickchange Bracelet and Bands
  • And More! 

That is not all, though. What makes your GRID watch unique is that the case comes engraved. On the layered face, printed and made out of 3D steel, there is a unique design, something that will remind you of all your adventures and encourage you to seek out even more.

Inspired by adventure and developed by travelers just like you, a watch from GRID Watches stands for the courage to venture into the unknown.

Are you ready to upgrade your style and take your sense of adventure to the next level?

You’re ready. So are we.

Let’s do this together.
 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are pre-selling GRID watches for a limited time only so that we can raise the capital we need to cover part of the first order and support the brand long term. Our goal through this campaign is $29,000, which, when partnered with our personal investments, will cover all of the costs that we are facing as we work to go to market. The more that we raise, the smoother the next few months will go for us, and if we raise anything over our funding goal, we will divert the remainder into support and advertising, bringing GRID Watches to an even larger audience.

If you want a watch that says adventure and travel, yet is modern & professional, you have found it.

Contribute to this campaign and claim yours today!
 

The Impact

 

As both travelers and entrepreneurs, we created GRID Watches because we wanted a watch that speaks to us on a personal level. We’ve researched what else was out there, and we felt the need to go our own way. After all of the places that we have experienced and every adventure that we have encountered, our creative side took over and we put together the design that would turn into the first GRID watch.

Your contribution is, in a real way, helping us bring our dream to life. For that, we are very thankful. We want GRID Watches to be more than just a watch, your support will help us launch as a brand as well brining future great watches to the world. 
 

Risks & Challenges

Over the past year we have put significant effort into the planning of the pre-production process and launch of the GRID Watch series. Although we cannot prepare for every contingency, we are confident that we can ship your GRID watch to you in a timely manner, following up on manufacturing and the supply chain diligently. We will also keep you updated every step of the way, sending out regular updates about all of the progress that we are making. You can count on us for complete transparency and customer service.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for GRID Watches by sharing a link to the campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and spread the word about GRID Watches to everyone you know, especially anyone who appreciates travel and adventure as much as you do.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.
 

More Information 

 

The Grid watch backing highlights the fundamentals of the piece and embraces the Grid watch logo with our hometown in the background.

 

 

LA is a city with rich culture and great diversity. We chose this location to capture just that. It highlights the most iconic neighborhoods and most famous shores.

 

New York is one of the most well-known cities in the world. It never sleeps and it shines all night. This face features some of the most famous streets and bridges in the city.

This face showcases the River Thames flowing through Central London. Where the most well-known and historical architecture stands today. 

We did not compromise on the Premium Italian leather straps with our logo elegantly engraved
 on the buckle.

We set out to accomplish two goals for our fellow enthusiasts with our watch bracelets. First, establish a timeless yet professional style and look while still providing focus to comfort. The result is an elegant oyster style bracelet with uncompromising comfort. Our Stainless Steel bracelets taper from 20mm wide down to 16mm wide to provide an impressive look and comfort whether on an adventure, night out or during the working day.
story_txt:
Are You Ready for Adventure?
Every day, there are people who lunge toward adventure, letting nothing stand between them and all of the fun and thrills they know are out there. When they hear that there is an opportunity to explore or a destination they can visit, they are all in. Without hesitation, without question, they jump forward, flying or sailing or driving to someplace new – seeing all there is to see in the world and making the most of life.
Is this you?
If so, then we are right there by your side.
At GRID Watches, we are adventurers, explorers, and dreamers ourselves. We never tire of seeing the world, pushing ourselves to uncover all of its mysteries and learn all that we can learn. Often, we look back on the memories that we have made, thinking back lovingly of the grand places that we have visited and the incredible times that we have shared together.
To keep this sense of wonder and adventure always with us, we created a quaility watch – something new, something unique.
Welcome to GRID Watches.
On every watch, we aim to capture the inspiration and sense of adventure and travel, while offering an exclusive quality for professionals alike. 
About the Watches
Our watches are stylish and world-class, featuring:

Multi-layered City Grid Dial
Japanese Quartz Movement
Luminous hands and markers
Stainless Steel Case and Bracelet
Detailed Engravings
Quickchange Bracelet and Bands
And More! 

That is not all, though. What makes your GRID watch unique is that the case comes engraved. On the layered face, printed and made out of 3D steel, there is a unique design, something that will remind you of all your adventures and encourage you to seek out even more.
Inspired by adventure and developed by travelers just like you, a watch from GRID Watches stands for the courage to venture into the unknown.
Are you ready to upgrade your style and take your sense of adventure to the next level?
You’re ready. So are we.
Let’s do this together.

story:
Beautiful Wooden Boxes

We are a small business and trying to survive during the worldwide pandemic. Our company started on 2019 with a big dream for growing. 

We are making this beautiful wooden box with a green natural fluorite pendant for the Christmas. 

What is this ?

We beleive that people will love these beautiful wooden boxes with natural green fluorite pendants. The patten design was chosen carefully in this prototype. It indicates to the nature and flowers. 

We are very excited to start producing more from these boxes. The material is a very good wood and natural fluorite crystal. The chain is made from stainless steel.  

We aim to collect more orders here before we start producing this. 

We still need your help

Your contribution will help us to pay our small business expenses and save jobs. We will be able to continue to produce these boxes and also arrange for natural fluorite pendants.

story:
Our Mission:

Creating sustainably-made fashion for an environmentally-conscious world

We are Hoodini. Hoodini was founded by a group of six students passionate about textile wastage and the environment. Umar Qamar, who envisioned the idea, grew up in Faislabad, Pakistan- one of the biggest textile hubs in the world. After witnessing first hand how much fabric was going to waste in the factories around him, he came up with the idea of Hoodini. Hoodini uses leftover fabrics to make high-quality clothing. Most environmentally-friendly products are deceptive and overpriced, however, we believe that each and every one of us should have the opportunity to have great quality sustainable clothing. Hoodini allows sustainably-made clothing to be available and affordable for everyone! However, we need your help to make this happen. Help us make the world a better place one garment at a time and contribute to our indiegogo campaign.

Hoodini's Timeline

What You Get and What We Need:

What happens when you buy a Hoodini?

o  You save 18KG’s of Carbon emission

o  You save 8100 litres of water

o  You support a company devoted to sustainable fashion

o  You support ethical employment of people in the textile industry

o  20% of your contribution will be used to train women workers


If we do not raise the funds, we will not be able to launch Hoodini. We will return all the money back to our contributors.

Why we need your Help:

Breakdown of Hoodini Funds

Sustainability with Style:

                


Meet the Hoodini Team!

Anna, Ria, Saba, Ksenia, Sevil, Umar

Find us on Social Media!

www.facebook.com/hoodinis

https://twitter.com/Hoodiniclothing

instagram: @hoodini_apparel

If you have any questions or concerns please email at riatalsania@gmail.com!

story:
My name is Bianca Midboe, I'm a 24 year old Norwegian-American, currently living and studying in Southampton, UK. Currently studying MA Visual Communication at Southampton Solent University. Previously BA (hons) Graphic Design. 

As a environmentalist I hate plastic bags and they are destroying the planet (not alone of course), but we need to cut down our plastic bag usage. I personally have about 20 reusable bags and only remember to bring them when doing my weekly large grocery shopping. I always have a small reusable bag in my purse, but I never bring that anywhere either. I needed to find a way I could always have a reusable bag with me. The only thing i always have with me is my phone.

It is my pleasure to introduce to you; 

The Eco Tote Phone Case! 

A revolutionary product that is first of it's kind.

A phone case with a pocket on the back that fits a custom reusable bag inside.

What I have per now is a 3rd generation homemade prototype. I have spent a lot of time making this prototype. But I am a designer, I have a team behind me who deals with the official prototype and all the business. Defining the prototype and making everything manufacturer ready takes time and resources, that's what I need help with. As well as manufacturing and shipping costs.

If you can not contribute yourself, please feel free to share my project on social media and help me in any way you can.

story:
Greetings from the Wood'n Leather family !

Our story began 6 months ago when we, university students, were dreaming of having a company of our own. But we've never thought going this far !
This dream became an idea, and this idea became those products that we propose to you here.. the fruit of months of hard work. 
Our products combine two of nature's most precious and prestigious gifts.. wood and leather. We've carefully chosen our materials, and quality was, and still is, our main concern.
The originality of the concept made us confident in this idea and in the support that we'll eventually get from you. 
But the road is still long and risky, and your support is now most needed, for us to continue this exciting journey.


Now.. How much do we need to make it come a reality ?

Not a lot actually.. Already having a small workshop, we are willing to acquire new machines to launch the mass-production, as well as to open a salespoint to meet the demand of the market.

What do you get in return ?

The originality of our products will make you different. It has the elegance that you expect, and the practicality that you need. We are a unique startup by its ambition, with an authentic touch unequaled by our competitors. 

But that's not all of it, you'll get to be part of the Wood'n Leather story.. the Wood'n Leather family.

So, if you believe in us and want to help us taking this to the next level, we invite you to support us and choose your product below !

Don't forget to spread the word !

Thank you for your time and your trust !

story:
I designed Yuxa thinking about modern day women who is on the go but still stylish.  Women travel more than ever before, whether it is for work, family or vacation. With Yuxa you can travel light and be stylish at the same time. You can fit different styles of shoes in your carry-on easily because Yuxa takes very little space. Yuxa can be used as a flipflop or as a sandal.  We know that fashion and styles change quickly. Buying every new pair of shoes that you like might be costly. Yuxa offers a solution to that problem too.

 

 

 

 

 

                     

                    

 

You can transform Yuxa using its accessories. Yuxa is economical. Instead of buying multiple shoes or handbags to match each outfit, you just need to buy accessories that you like and combine them with the shoes base and the bag base you have.

I try to be eco-friendly. I am very picky about the materials I use. For example, I prefer using cork leather, which is considered as the best natural alternative to animal leather. I put non-recyclable papers and fabric into a good use by combining them with PVC and using them in the soles of some models. I use a special packaging for Yuxa, which can be transformed into a cool bag. This way packaging waste would also be eliminated.

Yuxa has 2 different bags with two different bases. The base of the bag comes as the packaging of the shoes’ base. You can buy different handles according to your taste and according to your style, and change the bag’s handle as you wish.

 

                    

                                                                         Cork base

 

 

Yuxa has different accessories for different occasions (night wear, daily wear, beach wear, club, artsy…). You can always find an accessory that suits your style… It will suit future trends too…In most models, water resistant materials are used, so that you can wear Yuxa near the beach or the pool.

 

 

 

It is very easy to change the accessories. X is the symbol of the logo, x is also at the end of the accesories.

 

 

                   

 

Yuxa has two different bags complementing different shoes bases. You can change the handle of the cork bag. With the transparent bag, you can change both the handle and the cover. You can buy different color covers to match your bag with different outfits.

Yuxa’s bag can also be used as a tablet cover, its size is chosen to fit standard size tablets.

 

                    

 

 

Yuxa is a legendary creature, Shape Shifter. According to popular beliefs, every 100-year- old snake is transformed into YUXA. In fairy tales, Yuxa is described as a beautiful mysterious damsel.  As the name suggests Yuxa is a shapeshifting product.

 

 

 

I am a product designer, graphic designer and illustrator. I love to create new things and make things better every day. Thanks to my formal education, I am very knowledgeable about production techniques and materials. Moreover, my work experience made me develop and refine my graphic design and illustration skills. All those skills proved to be useful when I created Yuxa, whether it was for the logo creation or the choice of materials or even the final look of the sandals. 

I’ve worked on all types of projects, from advertising to packaging and furniture designs and many more,  some of each I was granted awards for. 

I love to travel and take pictures of every discovery I make while keeping a stylish look. But limited space in my luggage makes difficult to match the perfect shoes to every outfit. That’s how I created Yuxa, a single pair of sandals that can transform into any look you want.  I am the first user of Yuxa and know that it will make the life of so many women less complicated.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

During the process of designing Yuxa, I made several experiments to make it comfortable and easy to use. I asked many people to try it on and share with me all their feedbacks. Based on the comments received, I kept improving Yuxa until I obtained a final product that I totally believed in. There is certainly a chance of delays in the manufacturing process. But, I promise  that I will keep you updated at every stage.

 

Thank you so much for taking your time to meet YUXA and for supporting me in trying to make our lives slightly easier.

Special Thanks To:

Model: Gunsu Aydinlilar

Voice: Sarah Chatta

Text Editor: Aycan Koksal

Thanks to my mother and father for their great support and help.

story:
INTRODUCING TANGJA : THE ULTIMATE TOTE BAG FOR WOMEN-ON-THE-GO.

| Photo Image : Tangerine/Black with Black Strap |

You are a woman on the go. With a full day ahead of you, you need a fashionable bag that can accommodate everything in your urban lifestyle requires. Keys, makeups, wallet, laptops, and cell phone charger, etc. Say bye to clutter. Versatile compartments will make your bag inside organized more than ever. You can personalize with your own initials.

 

TO BE PRACTICAL? OR TO BE ELEGANT?

YES,.. BE BOTH!!!

 

| Photo Image : Grey/Black with Pink/White Dots Strap |

Introducing TANGJA : Crafted out of the highest quality material, it is sturdy yet light-weighted. But don't forget this is a fashionable bag. Stay active. Stay fashionable. The ultimate tote bag for women-on-the-go. 

 

CHOOSE YOUR TANGJA !!

 STEP 1.   PICK ONE FROM 7 BODY COLORS ! 

| Tangerine/Black with Black Strap (*Metal Color: Rose Gold) |

| Yellow/Black (*Metal Color : Brushed Silver) |

| Burgundy/Black (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| Denim/Brown (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| Grey/Black with Black Strap (*Metal Color : Brushed Silver) |

| Beige/Brown (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| All Black (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

 STEP 2.   PICK YOUR SHOULDER STRAP !

 STEP 3.   NAME AFTER YOU ! (Personalized Initials)

Select your type (of initials) at Indiegogo website. BUT please TELL US YOUR 3 LETTERS by sending us an e-mail to tangja@wonderboyz.com

     ex))  Indiegogo ID : ChelseaWelsh / 3 letters : C.W

SWITCH STYLES

| Photo Image : Beige/Brown |

SUPREME QUALITY :

A TRUE 'HANDBAG'

  • Materials : Body: Premium Linen (Water-repellent) + Trim: Neoprene Trim

  • Manufactured in : a special factory in Seoul, Korea who has '30-years-of-experience' exporting to the fashion companies in U.S., U.K., Italy, France, Canada, Germany & few other countries.

  RISKS & CHALLENGES

This is our first crowdfunding campaign, and we know that manufacturing a product always brings challenges such as quality control, delivery in time, etc. However, the manufacturer has the 30 years of experience exporting to all around the world. We feel confident we will be able to produce the bag and have it shipped to backers by May – 2018. We have the full support of the manufacturer and all parties involved are set and ready to go.

The funds raised are going directly into the production/manufacturing of the bag. Even though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production and fulfillment. If this were to occur, we will always be 100% transparent with you and communicate this to you right away. Our goal is to get you an gorgeous, high-quality bag you are excited about, and we will do everything we possibly can to make that happen. 

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the shoulder strap included in a perk?

Yes, in any perks, the strap is included free of cost. You also have options to choose.

Is the shoulder strap completely detachable?

Yes, there are clasps at both ends of the strap that it is completely detachable. 

What is the quality of material used on personalized initials? 

It is not a hand-painting. For instance, few brands like LV bags, GYD bags do hand painting. It costs extremely high, plus takes 2~3 months solely for the initializing work. We have chosen to go 'cost & time-effective'. The way we accomplish the personalized initials is printing on the fabric. We put your initials in design program and do the computer print out on the fabric. Imagine a beautiful t-shirt print. That is it. The difference is that... we make it personal. 

If you have selected TANGJA tote with initials, you MUST tell us your initials (3 letters) by sending an e-mail to tangja@wonderboyz.com. Even though we may be located at the opposite side of the world, we will stay quick & kind to reply your e-mails as early as possible.

Must include in e-mail -->>  Indiegogo ID: ChelseaWelsh   /   Initials: C.W

What are the shipping costs?
Shipping varies from country to country. There is just a small surcharge applied at checkout. Simply click on the pledge and select your delivery country, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are for your selected country.

What is the weight of the TANGJA totebag?

The weight of the bag is 875 grams. 

What is the content of the TANGJA totebag?

The bag will hold up to 20.9L at full capacity.

Is the bag water-repellent?

Yes!! *Body fabric = Water-repellent / *Trim fabric = Neoprene (=Scuba diving suit) 

This means that in normal rain conditions, you should be safe and all your items will stay dry. However, the bag is not intended to protect your valuables when thrown in a pool, body of water or to be in a full rain pour for about an hour.

Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my order?

Normally we expect no duties/VAT to be occurred with the price range of our campaign. But we have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged in your country. Any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer.

If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your perk, please get in touch with your local post office.

There is also a handy tool online available to calculate these costs. Please note that this is an external online partner, so we cannot be held accountable for differences between the actual cost and what is mentioned on this website: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a....

The bags will be shipped from Republic of Korea (South Korea), this will help you to calculate the costs.

Can I get a refund if I change my mind? 

Product purchased through TANGJA's Indiegogo campaigns are non-refundable. 

If you find a manufacturing defect, please send an e-mail within 14 days. We will exchange for a new one after checking. We will constantly look for ways to improve our products to better meet the needs of our customers, so we'd love it if you send an email to tangja@wonderboyz.com and share your feedback with us.
story_txt:
INTRODUCING TANGJA : THE ULTIMATE TOTE BAG FOR WOMEN-ON-THE-GO.

| Photo Image : Tangerine/Black with Black Strap |
You are a woman on the go. With a full day ahead of you, you need a fashionable bag that can accommodate everything in your urban lifestyle requires. Keys, makeups, wallet, laptops, and cell phone charger, etc. Say bye to clutter. Versatile compartments will make your bag inside organized more than ever. You can personalize with your own initials. 
 
TO BE PRACTICAL? OR TO BE ELEGANT?
YES,.. BE BOTH!!!
 
| Photo Image : Grey/Black with Pink/White Dots Strap |
Introducing TANGJA : Crafted out of the highest quality material, it is sturdy yet light-weighted. But don't forget this is a fashionable bag. Stay active. Stay fashionable. The ultimate tote bag for women-on-the-go. 
 
CHOOSE YOUR TANGJA !!

 STEP 1.   PICK ONE FROM 7 BODY COLORS ! 

| Tangerine/Black with Black Strap (*Metal Color: Rose Gold) |

| Yellow/Black (*Metal Color : Brushed Silver) |

| Burgundy/Black (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| Denim/Brown (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| Grey/Black with Black Strap (*Metal Color : Brushed Silver) |

| Beige/Brown (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

| All Black (*Metal Color : Rose Gold) |

 STEP 2.   PICK YOUR SHOULDER STRAP !



 STEP 3.   NAME AFTER YOU ! (Personalized Initials)
Select your type (of initials) at Indiegogo website. BUT please TELL US YOUR 3 LETTERS by sending us an e-mail to tangja@wonderboyz.com
     ex))  Indiegogo ID : ChelseaWelsh / 3 letters : C.W



SWITCH STYLES



| Photo Image : Beige/Brown |

SUPREME QUALITY :
A TRUE 'HANDBAG'


Materials : Body: Premium Linen (Water-repellent) + Trim: Neoprene Trim
Manufactured in : a special factory in Seoul, Korea who has '30-years-of-experience' exporting to the fashion companies in U.S., U.K., Italy, France, Canada, Germany & few other countries.




  RISKS & CHALLENGES
This is our first crowdfunding campaign, and we know that manufacturing a product always brings challenges such as quality control, delivery in time, etc. However, the manufacturer has the 30 years of experience exporting to all around the world. We feel confident we will be able to produce the bag and have it shipped to backers by May – 2018. We have the full support of the manufacturer and all parties involved are set and ready to go.
The funds raised are going directly into the production/manufacturing of the bag. Even though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production and fulfillment. If this were to occur, we will always be 100% transparent with you and communicate this to you right away. Our goal is to get you an gorgeous, high-quality bag you are excited about, and we will do everything we possibly can to make that happen. 



FAQs
Frequently Asked Questions
Is the shoulder strap included in a perk?
Yes, in any perks, the strap is included free of cost. You also have options to choose.
Is the shoulder strap completely detachable?
Yes, there are clasps at both ends of the strap that it is completely detachable. 
What is the quality of material used on personalized initials? 
It is not a hand-painting. For instance, few brands like LV bags, GYD bags do hand painting. It costs extremely high, plus takes 2~3 months solely for the initializing work. We have chosen to go 'cost & time-effective'. The way we accomplish the personalized initials is printing on the fabric. We put your initials in design program and do the computer print out on the fabric. Imagine a beautiful t-shirt print. That is it. The difference is that... we make it personal. 

If you have selected TANGJA tote with initials, you MUST tell us your initials (3 letters) by sending an e-mail to tangja@wonderboyz.com. Even though we may be located at the opposite side of the world, we will stay quick & kind to reply your e-mails as early as possible.

The bag will hold up to 20.9L at full capacity.

The bags will be shipped from Republic of Korea (South Korea), this will help you to calculate the costs.

Product purchased through TANGJA's Indiegogo campaigns are non-refundable.

We will exchange for a new one after checking. We will constantly look for ways to improve our products to better meet the needs of our customers, so we'd love it if you send an email to tangja@wonderboyz.com and share your feedback with us.

story:
FEATURED IN

 

After a successful year, we are back again to introduce our second watch. Thanks to you, the Haldor Abissi is now enjoyed by many people all over the World. In more than one year we learned a lot, improved some techniques and now we are ready to impress you again. After a market research, we started developing the new concept. We also received many emails with customer's desires about our next model. In the basis of this, the conclusion was made: "Let's make a professional tool watch for everyday use." Below we will explain what a professional tool watch is.

 

Haldor Armis is an automatic professional tool watch capable of withstanding water pressure up to a depth of 2000m/6600ft, equipped with a Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 automatic movement. It is still a dive watch, but we called it "tool watch" because if its special features.

 
A SHORT HANDS ON REVIEW OF THE ARMIS 

 


The Haldor Armis 2000m will be produced also in limited DLC edition 50 pcs worldwide. 

Each piece will have its serial number engraved on the case like 01/50 and so on. The watch has same specs as the hard coated Armis. The only difference is that instead of HHC treatment on steel we did the black DLC (Diamond-Like Carbon coating).  It also provides excellent scratch resistance. DLC is made with a chemical vapor deposition technique. The chemicals are deposited in a vacuum environment with the help of an inert gas that places the carbon atoms on the surface. They form a thin layered plating of diamond crystal mixed with carbon atoms.

 

In partnership with our Italian supplier known for producing high quality rubber diver straps for many of the world's most famous watchmakers. The rubber strap is fitted with hard coated sandblasted 20mm pin buckle. The pieces length are 133mm/75mm excluding buckle. Thickness for 5,5mm (lug end) to 3,7mm. Lug width 22mm, buckle width 20mm.

The new bracelet is designed to perfectly fit your wrist. It is 4mm thick, 22mm wide and 200mm long (including the buckle). With additional set of screwdrivers it is very easy to adjust the size. 

Case dimensions: the diameter is 42mm (excluding crown), lug-to-lug of 50mm, thickness of 14.9mm and 22mm wide drilled lugs.

 

The Swiss SuperLuminova BGW9 is applied to the hands, dial marking and bezel triangle. It is very strong, easy to read by night and long lasting. Please look at the following video to see what happens with the lume after 5 mins. The results are fascinating.

 

 

THE MOVEMENT

     

Like in our previous model, inside the Armis is a ETA 2824-2 Swiss automatic movement adjusted in 5 positions what makes the movement precise like a COSC Chronometer. Thanks to our Swiss manufacturing company we were able to adjust the movement from keeping time from -+15 sec per day, to +4 sec per day! By doing so, the movement will keep time like a Top Grade or a COSC Chronometer. 

 

You can see the accuracy of Haldor Armis is about +3,9s/d with a maximum daily variation of 7sec. The results are fascinating, and we are proud of it. Each watch supplied by Haldor Watches will pass the quality control and water pressure tests. Every single watch will be adjusted in 5 positions to obtain the max accuracy possible, which will come with its technical data of accuracy shown like on photo. We guarantee out of the box accuracy of about +4s/d. 

 

Magnetic fields are one of the most common factors negatively affecting the accuracy of a mechanical watch. Metal internal watch parts can become magnetized when introduced to these fields. That's why we have protected the the movement with a Faraday cage, that attracts the magnetic field lines, leaving the movement itself unaffected. The watch movement is protected up to 4.800 ampere per meter (A/m).

 

THE DESIGN

Our engineers have not only worked on the design of the Armis, but have turned their attention to the very fabric that is used for the construction of it and its components. 316L Stainless steel is considered to be among the best materials available for the construction of dive watches. The case and bracelet shape are designed to perfectly fit your wrist. We have set the date and crown position at 4 o'clock and protected it by crown guards. This will also keep it from digging into the wrist or hand. It also keeps the overall width of the watch down when measuring from side to side. 
The dial is very simple and easy to read, also by night thanks to the thick printing of the Swiss Superluminova BGW9. The unidirectional rotating bezel is 60 minutes fully marked. This will enable you to read the minute-by-minute count down when diving. You can can use it also for other everyday things like workout time, cooking time, stopwatch,...
The drilled lugs make you easier to change the bracelet/strap thanks to additional set of screwdriver included in the watch box. 
We have spent a lot of time making the buckle with a diver extension mechanism. At the end we were very satisfacted with the results. It really works perfectly, without any problems and keeps your watch safe by falling from your wrist, because it opens only by pressing both security buttons in. 

 

THE METAL

However even the toughest Marine Grade Stainless steel is prone to scratches. We’ve all experienced that dreaded moment when your new diver receives its first knock or scratch. 

If you wear your dive watch like it’s supposed to be worn – for diving and such, then it’s only a matter of time before the rigors of an active life take their toll on it. This is why we have developed the hard coating technology.

The watch is built from stainless steel 316L treated in a special way. We called it HHC - Haldor hard coating. This process creates a hardened barrier about 25microns deep on the upper layer of the metal, so the upper layer of the metal becomes much harder. We can reach about 1800Hv (vickers) for the stainless steel (that's 7 times harder than the normal stainless steel!). The process consists of depositing on the surface of the watch, a hard but thin dense layer of metal consisting of steel, titanium, ceramic and an alloy of the nickel-copper family. The coating provides long lasting protection against the inevitable scratches and wear marks that affect the aesthetic appearance of the watch. It also provides excellent resistance to corrosion.

 

 

WATER RESISTANCE

The watch passed all pressure and water resistance tests made in the Swiss lab. 

 

 

 

What do you get by buying the Haldor Armis watch? We called it "The most perfect tool watch". What makes the watch better than others? Let's focus on the details.

Watches like this costs from 1500USD and up. There are very few brands in the World producing similar watches at our price point, because the technology is very advanced, our markup is very low, and only few factories are capable to do this.

 


How we made it?

 

 

 

 

We have lowered the final price of our product by having a very low markup. If you buy a Swiss made watch from a famous brand in a retail shop, the markup is much higher. There are many brokers in between like the wholesalers, distributors, retailers... Each of them have their own markup, that is why the final price of the product if significantly higher at the end. In our case there is no need to do so! Our watches are sold directly to you, avoiding all the extra costs incurred. 
The most famous brands in the World have a long tradition. When you purchase those watches, you definitely pay extra money for the brand's image. This is one of the reasons why the final price of our competitors is much higher. By purchasing a Haldor watch, you are not charged for the "brand's image". 
Thanks to our Swiss manufacturing company, which is able to supply us the Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 at a very competitive price, we were capable to lower the final price of the product. This is our great advantage compared to other microbrands in watch industry. 

By doing so we could manufacture a high-end Swiss made watch for a very interesting price and offer to you the best value for money! 

Another competitive advantage is definitely the Swiss-Origin. The watches are manufactured in Switzerland according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, from the preliminary stages to the assembly of each component, quality and technical controls. There are many microbrands claiming to be Swiss Made, but actually they just use Swiss movements. This is not enough to pass the criteria of Swissness.  

Haldor Armis meets al the Swissness criteria to determine the geographical origin of the watch. So we can legitimately claim to be of Swiss origin.

You can read more about the requirements here: http://www.fhs.swiss/eng/swissness.html

                                   

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

 

         

Our exclusive satisfaction guarantee makes it easy, convenient and safe for you to pre-order a watch from our campaign. Our watches are manufactured at the highest quality standards, but they cannot always fit everyone.If you feel that the watch did not meet your expectations, simply contact us and we will send you a 100% refund of the watch cost. Please note all the shipping and customs cost must be covered by you in case you return the watch back to us. You will get the refund once we receive the watch back. 

The watch is covered by a 2 year guarantee against manufacturing or material defects. We will, within two years from date of purchase, repair or replace the movement of your watch free of charge if the movement proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use. The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration, service or repair performed by any party other than Haldor Watches. 

You will receive the watch in a high-quality water resistant and shock proof plastic box. We will send you by email the PDF file with the testing results of the watch accuracy.  

The box will include: 

  • Haldor Armis 2000m watch 
  • Rubber strap
  • 2x screwdrivers
  • 2x 29mm spring bars with screws for band replacement
  • Warranty card
  • Stretch goal items if reached the goals

The Haldor Armis Limited Edition comes with same items included. The only difference is the rubber strap DLC buckle.

 

 

SHIPPING

The watches will be shipped and insured by TNT Express Courier and DHL. It is scheduled for June 2018 (second part). Once shipped you will receive the tracking number to track your watch. The shipping fee is fixed to all countries in the World. Do not forget - free shipping for first 30 backers!

 

Our story begun in 2009 when we started searching for right partners to create our own watch brand. It took us 4 years to find and sign all agreements for cooperation with external companies and partners. In 2013 we formalized our commitment with the incorporation of the company and started working full time on the project.

We knew from the beginning that the level of expertise and professionality of our partners have to be top notch. Our demands were very high and the whole process was no walk in the park. We queried over a dozen of companies to identify the best fit for our project. They host the manufacturing for the most famous Swiss and German brands.

By »Swiss Made« we are not limited to the Swiss movement. We mean that all our products will have Swiss-Origin certificate. So, our watches are manufactured in Switzerland according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, from the preliminary stages to the assembly of each component, quality and technical controls.

What to tell more? We made a Swiss Made automatic watch with a technical specification like high-end brands at price level interesting both for enthusiasts and more demanding customers. So, we at Haldor Watches are extremely confident the Haldor Armis will meet your needs. 

 

YOUR SUPPORT

The Armis has been prototyped and fully tested. Now everything is set up to start the production. This time our campaign has a fixed goal, so we will only receive the funds if at least 40.000USD is raised by the deadline. Otherwise you will automatically receive a full refund by Indiegogo.com once the campaign ends. Reaching the goal will help us to start the production, because we have to pay the initial order fee. By pledging you are not just buying the watch, you are supporting our project and helping us to make it a reality.  

There are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  Thank you! :)

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Manufacturing an item is not an easy walk in the park. Especially when you want to make it different and better than others. That's why sometimes things go wrong. We didn't want you to risk when contributing, so we already set the basis and everything is prepared to start the production. There are no risks for you or any doubts about the product quality. Since the watches are exported from Switzerland to Slovenia, please be aware that there may be unexpected circumstances that may lead to late delivery. During the pre-order period we will keep you posted about the production process and delivery time.

The Haldor Armis Limited Edition comes with same items included. The only difference is the rubber strap DLC buckle.  SHIPPINGThe watches will be shipped and insured by TNT Express Courier and DHL. It is scheduled for June 2018 (second part). Once shipped you will receive the tracking number to track your watch. The shipping fee is fixed to all countries in the World. Do not forget - free shipping for first 30 backers! Our story begun in 2009 when we started searching for right partners to create our own watch brand. It took us 4 years to find and sign all agreements for cooperation with external companies and partners. In 2013 we formalized our commitment with the incorporation of the company and started working full time on the project.We knew from the beginning that the level of expertise and professionality of our partners have to be top notch. Our demands were very high and the whole process was no walk in the park. We queried over a dozen of companies to identify the best fit for our project. They host the manufacturing for the most famous Swiss and German brands.By »Swiss Made« we are not limited to the Swiss movement. We mean that all our products will have Swiss-Origin certificate. So, our watches are manufactured in Switzerland according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, from the preliminary stages to the assembly of each component, quality and technical controls.What to tell more? We made a Swiss Made automatic watch with a technical specification like high-end brands at price level interesting both for enthusiasts and more demanding customers. So, we at Haldor Watches are extremely confident the Haldor Armis will meet your needs.  YOUR SUPPORTThe Armis has been prototyped and fully tested. Now everything is set up to start the production. This time our campaign has a fixed goal, so we will only receive the funds if at least 40.000USD is raised by the deadline. Otherwise you will automatically receive a full refund by Indiegogo.com once the campaign ends. Reaching the goal will help us to start the production, because we have to pay the initial order fee. By pledging you are not just buying the watch, you are supporting our project and helping us to make it a reality.  There are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  Thank you! :) RISKS & CHALLENGESManufacturing an item is not an easy walk in the park. Especially when you want to make it different and better than others. That's why sometimes things go wrong. We didn't want you to risk when contributing, so we already set the basis and everything is prepared to start the production. There are no risks for you or any doubts about the product quality. Since the watches are exported from Switzerland to Slovenia, please be aware that there may be unexpected circumstances that may lead to late delivery. During the pre-order period we will keep you posted about the production process and delivery time.

story:
My friend is a war vet.  When I called upon him to help me with my campaign like always he was there for me. (He is a photographer)   I wanted to do more for him so I told him that I was going to give him a percentage of the funds that come in to help him out.  

Now him being the kind of man that he is said that he was going to give a percentage of what I gave him to the war vets (PAWS FOR VETERANS, INC.).  Particularly the ones in need of support dogs like him that experience PTSD.

So the campaign took on an added goal and that is to raise money for these men that need service dogs to help them deal with PTSD.

So we are raising money to start this company and we are also giving to a great cause in helping vets that need it to help get and have service dogs trained.

story:
The EverDry WATERPROOF sock:  The Ultimate in All-terrain Winter footwear

 

The EverDry socks provide an answer to an age-old problem: WET FEET! 

Now, we don't have all the answers of the universe, but this is one that we have the solution to.

The EverDry socks are All-terrain multi-functional footwear that combine technology with fashion. They are your soggy foot solution.

Winter is always round the corner.  These socks are the ideal companion for all the family.  We all remember those wonderful times playing in the snow with the family or little ones jumping in puddles.  

These memories are precious.  

Keep your family wrapped up warm this winter with these waterproof thermal socks.  

The technology behind EverDry

Water repellant membrane

 The central layer is an intelligent membrane that doesn't let water pass, keeping your feet dry. 

Intelligent membrane allows your feet to breathe

Think of it like a mosquito net.  Air can pass through but pesky insects can't.  It's the same principal.  The central membrane lets air particles through but are too small to let water pass.

These EverDry socks are comfortable and suitable for All-terrain.

EverDry socks are comfortable for Hikers

 We support the troops and are offering an EXCLUSIVE discount for any servicemen.  Please only select the offer if they are going to help one of our nations bravest. 

  

 

Testing the EverDry sock with the sock of a mere mortal we can see how it fairs in a water challenge.  Long story short, it's in another league! 

The EverDry socks are ideal for those snowy days

We thank you so much for your support!  Please share and get the EverDry word out there! 

Risks and challenges

Your pledge will help fund our first batch of production. We can not do this without your support. We work hand-in-hand with an advanced technologies wearables company based in Shanghai, China. They will be the manufacturers for our EverDry socks. 

Once funding is completed, production will begin. As long as there aren't any unexpected delays with our manufacturers, our socks will be delivered in time for the beginning of the New Year.

FAQ

1.  If the water doesn't come in, does that mean that sweat can't get out?

Oh no.  Not at all.  That is the beauty of the central layer.  Excess heat can still escape keeping your feet regulated at a comfortable temperature.  The merino wool also wicks away moisture to maximise comfort.

2.  How long will they last?

It obviously depends on the extremity of use.  It is one of our goals to provide a durable product that not only feels great but lasts a long time.  We estimate socks to last within the range of 3-5 years before functionality begins to become compromised.

 

3.  If they are waterproof, how can I wash them?

You can wash them like any normal sock.  They should be washed at 40'C and should not be ironed.  Hang them on the line and let them dry naturally.

story:
Listen to more than 35,000 radio stations worldwide at best quality. With our market-leading partner vTuner, you will not miss any radio station.

"It's a big world out there, and vTuner has it covered."

You want to hear your favorite music? Connect Badio via Bluetooth to stream any content from your smartphone or tablet and use it like a usual Bluetooth Speaker!  






If you have to get out of your bed in the night, you don't want to see bright light or hear loud music. At daytime, you don't like dimmed light and quiet music. That's why Badio gives you the possibility to preset the volume, brightness and light color to each time of the day.  

The music playback turns automatically on and off with the light by tripping the light switch. This is just as practial as that your car radio turns on with your car. 

Badio is the only fully integrated solution to hear music in your bathroom without any structural alteration works. It is as easy to install as any other ceiling light. Screw it to the ceiling, connect to your Wi-Fi and enjoy.

No cables, no space wasted on your shelves. Because Badio is mounted on the ceiling, it smoothly integrates into your bathroom. 

Two excellenct speaker drivers, integrated in the housing made of high quality materials, give Badio the sound of a HiFi speaker. 

Particulary in the bathroom where water easily gets to where it shouldn't, electrical appliances represent a major hazard. Not with Badio! It is fixed at the ceiling, thus ensuring your secure music experience. 





4 interchangeable LED Matrixes 

Brightness: 500 - 2800 lumen (dimmable)

Light Color: 2700 - 5600 kelvin (changeable)


Weight: 1.68 kg (3.7 lb)  

Wireless:  

Wi-Fi (2.4 and 5 Ghz), 802.11a/b/g/n compatible

Bluetooth 3.0

Materials:

Mounting Plate: High quality, ABS plastics

Diffusor: High quality, translucent polycarbonate

Electrical requirements:

Line voltage: 100 to 240 Volt AC

Frequency: 50 to 60 Hz

Stretchgoal 200.000 €

Larger choice of colors! Sandy Beach, Grass Green and Sky Blue! 


 First Prototype!

Made of wood. The diffusor glass on the lower side is missed. 

 Second Prototype!

A dome shape with a ring LED and a single speaker driver  

Final Prototype!

The final two-waves-design with four LED stripes and 2 speaker drivers

Main Circuit Board Prototype  

Heiner Woll | Founder & CEO

Passionate Badiologist and Tech Enthusiast, Industrial Engineer (B.Sc.)

Matthias Hunold | Co-Founder

Student in Business Administration, Certified Event Manager,  DJ & Producer

Patrick Bergem | Photography & Presentation Director

Photo & Video Enthusiast, Certified Photographer

Linda Klein | Chief Marketing Officer

Dog, cat, mouse, horse, are you still reading? Don't waste your time reading this and buy your own Badio!




KWT/WuT GmbH | Saarland University

"Students and graduates with entrepreneurial spirit can implement their business ideas under the best possible conditions at the start-up centre, in close proximity to research and teaching activities. [...]

The start-up centre is a model for success – so far, 259 companies have implemented their business ideas (as of 02/2014) and are now operating successfully on the market."

www.kwt-uni-saarland.de


FAQs:
When will the different colors be avaivable?
The Stretch Goal is set at 200.000 €. If we reach this amount, you will have the possibility to choose your favorite color in the after-sales-service.

Does Badio have any problems with steam in the Bathroom?
Because Badio is especially made to use it in the Bathroom, it has no problems with steam. The housing is closed and the speakers got moistured cones.

When will Badio be delivered?
In February 2017.

How long does Badio take to play music, after tripping the light switch?
Badio needs +-3 seconds to start the music playback. The light starts instantly.



Impressum/Disclaimer: http://www.badio.de/disclaimer

story:
Introducing the SafelyTag from GoSafely™

We built our SafelyTags to make safety simple. Designed after our founder was sexually assaulted as a freshman in college, our team spent almost a year developing and finetuning our devices. The goal of our product was to make safety accessible without escalating the violence of a situation, pepper spray, loud alarms, and campus emergency phones all added a potential for escalation.

The SafelyTag is simple to use and does not require the use of a smartphone to send an alert. Whether you want to let your family know you made it home safely or you need to nonverbally get help with your exact location and pertinent medical information, we believe that help should be easy to get. As our first batches of product are ordered, we need your help to bring our life-saving technology to the keychains, backpacks, and bike racks of millions. 

How does it all work?

The SafelyTag is easy to use in all situations, simply press the button and your location is sent to loved ones or law enforcement. In cases where law enforcement is contacted we also save the live audio securely in our app. 

 

 

How is this different than what is out there?

How do you GoSafely™?

Clip the SafelyTag anywhere you wish! Our sleek and discrete design lives with you. Our tags to easily blend into any outfit, regardless of gender. Our durable clip is built into the device making it sturdier and the sleek design makes it unobtrusive. We believe our devices easily work for people in all walks of life, with careful consideration for those from middle school to senior age, we want to ensure safety for all.

 

Hardware Features

With almost 10 months of design time, we have spent countless hours perfecting the SafelyTag. The grippy outer texture and braille nubs make it easy to slide the casing covering the button-- even in the dark while eliminating the risk of accidental triggering. Our devices run on simple batteries that can be replaced by a user after about a year of use. No phone is needed to activate your device, simply press the button and a call is placed to your local police with your exact location and any pertinent health information that is saved in your user profile. 

  • Cell-Based
  • Grippy Matte Finish
  • Durable Clip
  • Water Resistant
  • Replaceable Battery  
  • Allows Direct Non-verbal Communication with 911
  • Allows Safety Check-ins With Contacts

Colors Available

We are offering our tags in three colors, all inspired by the places you can GoSafely. 

Mobile App

Our mobile app allows users to set up their device after receiving it, from inputting emergency contacts to listing important medical information, the app handles it all. The app also allows users to send alerts to family and friends or call 911, non-verbally or verbally. 

  • Android/iOS Compatible
  • Allows Disabling of Alert With 4 Digit Code 
  • Allows User to Send Alerts
  • Saves Health Information 
  • Shows Activity Hotspots
  • 911/Loved One Toggle 

Our Track Record 

We have been lucky to recieve awards and recognition thus far and we plan to put those contacts, resources, and experiences to work as we roll out our final product to the world this winter.

Our Team

Our team is made up of a fabulous group of people. We started this company, initially, to serve a need in our colleges and developed our product as students, for students. As we expand into e-commerce we are committed to providing a superior product, built with the newest and best technologies. We are survivors, allies, friends, engineers, and developers and to us this company is a project of passion.

Founders:

Mentors:

Joey Womack

Brendan McGuire 

When Can I Expect My Device?

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal from now until March, and beyond, is to make sure that you receive your SafelyTag on time and in perfect working order. We have anticipated the rush of the holiday season and have multiple plans for our manufacturing and sourcing. We have also been working closely with a global manufacturing consultancy to ensure we deliver on time. It is our goal to provide consistent and timely updates on progress.

Any questions can be sent directly to hello@gosafely.io  

Other Ways You Can Help

Not sure if you want a device but still want to give? Purchase a device and donate it to someone in need!

  1. When purchasing your device make sure to select the donate option.
  2. We will ship your device to someone in need with your first name inside the card. 
  3. You receive a note letting you know where your device was donated. 

FAQS

Do I need a phone to send an alert or to set up my device?

Absolutely not! Our devices rely on their own cell connectivity and will default to either wifi or Bluetooth only in a situation where cell service is not available, this three layer approach helps ensure an accurate location. Users who do not have smartphones can still use their SafelyTag and register it using our website. 

Who should use a SafelyTag?

SafelyTags are perfect for people of all ages, especially middle through college-aged students, city dwellers, travelers, those with disabilities, and senior citizens seeking more independence.   

Are there monthly fees?

No! We believe that safety shouldn't have a huge price tag, simply pay for your device, and we will take care of the rest.

Are you always tracking my location?

No, locations are only recorded when a button is pressed or an alert is made through the app.
