story:
The Y behind UNITY

Mission: To create a mindful fashion brand focused on unifying humanity.

Vision: To build awareness of our similarities and create oneness, regardless of gender, age, race, ethnicity, faith or sexual orientation, and support non-profit organizations that align with the principles of unifying humanity.

“You must be the change you wish to see in the world”  is, perhaps, one of our favorite quotes of all time. A quote that not only inspires us to do our part and join efforts with those around us aiming to unify humanity, but also the basic impetus which drove the decision to create UNITY.

So, before we acted, we asked ourselves two questions:

  1. How can we help unify humanity?
  2. How can we help make unity a habit?

While these questions may not seem too complex on the surface, history has proven that unifying humanity is no easy task. The Smithsonian Museum of Natural history has stated that all modern humans living today share 99.9% of the same DNA…aka, we are 99.9% similar! But, despite our 99.9% DNA match and thousands of years on earth being fully aware that humanity presents itself in a multitude of ways, we continue to struggle to unite.

Rather than seeking to understand each other, we get caught up in passing judgement for reasons like who we voted for in the last election, the religion we practice, who we kiss goodnight, material possessions, etc. When we forget how to understand one another, we create barriers between each other. Because we as humans have created these barriers, we are optimistic that we as humans can break them down. But, this involves making a conscious decision to change how we behave and change how we approach our common problems.

Einstein could not have been more accurate when he said, “we can’t solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them.” (Thanks, Einstein!).

The scope of a project to unify humanity is so large that we realized that we need help. In our search for like-minded people, we found many organizations already working toward the same goals. These organizations have a pre-existing network of people who need more resources to help expand their influence and build unity.

So, to answer question 1…. How can we help unify humanity?

We will build a brand that shares revenue and influence with organizations whose missions align with unifying humanity and run counter to building barriers. Simply put, if we can join forces with organizations and people who believe in building on our similarities rather than our differences, we can then uplift the human condition and gain traction. 30% of all profits will be shared with organizations vetted by Charity Navigator.

To answer question 2… How can we make unity a habit?

We will work to instill a mindset in others of seeking first to understand our similarities and then finding ways to align those same similarities to create unity. If we can make this a daily mindset among our neighbors, then by default, unity will become a habit.

Sounds simple, right? It most certainly can be...

 

30% of Profits Given

Charity Navigator is the largest expert charity evaluator in America. Their mission is to make impactful philanthropy easier for all and they do so by providing data on 1.7 million nonprofits and in-depth analysis of over 8,500 charities. More than 7 million people - including donors, nonprofit leaders, researchers, the media, and policymakers. We utilize Charity Navigator (www.charitynavigator.org.) to identify charities with goals that align with UNITY and meet key criteria in fundraising, expenses and distribution.

 

UNITY Mindful Fashion - We're Authentic!

Unfortunately, in today’s world, finding first hand and second hand copy products is very easy. Fake products can be created to look so authentic that one can often not tell the difference between a genuine and a fake. In order to provide evidence to the members of our commUNITY that all of our products are authentic, we have created the perfect Certificate of Authenticity which is sequentially numbered, with no duplication.

** This number is unique to each member in the commUNITY. Keep the Certificate handy as it will be used in future commUNITY projects.

 

 

Our First u.n.i.-gear: the u.n.i.-tee

(It's as close as we could get to your heart without physically touching you)

All shirts are sourced from a manufacturer with Platinum accreditation from WRAP (Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production), which certifies based on (1) Human resources management, (2) Health and safety standards, (3) Environmental and eco-friendly practices and (4) Legal compliance including import/export and customs compliance and security standards.

 

Our renowned, ultra-soft, Flowy Poly-Viscose fabric in a unisex style. Featuring our signature retail fit, this classic crew neck is all about the drape. 

Features: Retail fit. Side-seamed. Unisex sizing.

Fabrication: 65% polyester, 35% viscose

 

You won't want to take off this best-selling tee, featuring a uniquely soft tri-blend heather fabrication, modern feminine fit, crew neck and short sleeves.

Features: Side-seamed. Semi-relaxed fit.

Fabrication: 50% poly 25% combed and ring-spun cotton 25% rayon

 

 

This go-to unisex hoodie features a modern fit, hood, front zip, and kangaroo pocket, designed with a refined ribbed tri-blend fabric specially engineered with a flat surface ideal for printing.

Features: Side-seamed. Retail fit. Unisex sizing. No drawstring. 1x1 smooth ribbed fabric.

Fabrication: 50% poly 25% combed and ring-spun cotton 25% rayon

 

 

This must-have unisex tank is updated with a modern fit, featuring a rounded neck and designed with superior combed and ring-spun cotton that acts as a blank canvas for printing. Available in a variety of solid, color-blocked, neon and tri-blend colors.

Features: Side-seamed. Retail fit. Unisex sizing. Available in two-tone color options.

Fabrication: 50% poly 25% combed and ring-spun cotton and 25% rayon

Deep Heather w/ Black Trim: 52% combed and ring-spun cotton 48% poly

 

 

This must-have style is designed with our exceptionally soft poly-viscose fabrication that softly drapes around curves. The modern elongated armholes and curved bottom hem make it perfect for layering.

Features: Side-seamed. Relaxed, drapery fit. Low cut armhole. Curved bottom hem.

Fabrication: 65% poly 35% viscose

Black Marble: 91% poly 9% combed and ring-spun cotton, 40 single 3.5 oz.

 

 

This youth tee fits like a well-loved favorite, featuring a crew neck, short sleeves and superior combed and ring-spun cotton that acts as a blank canvas for printing.

Features: Side-seamed. Retail fit. Unisex sizing.

Fabrication: 50% poly 25% combed and ring-spun cotton 25% rayon
story_txt:
The Y behind UNITY
Mission: To create a mindful fashion brand focused on unifying humanity.
Vision: To build awareness of our similarities and create oneness, regardless of gender, age, race, ethnicity, faith or sexual orientation, and support non-profit organizations that align with the principles of unifying humanity.
“You must be the change you wish to see in the world”  is, perhaps, one of our favorite quotes of all time. A quote that not only inspires us to do our part and join efforts with those around us aiming to unify humanity, but also the basic impetus which drove the decision to create UNITY.
So, before we acted, we asked ourselves two questions:

How can we help unify humanity?
How can we help make unity a habit?

While these questions may not seem too complex on the surface, history has proven that unifying humanity is no easy task. The Smithsonian Museum of Natural history has stated that all modern humans living today share 99.9% of the same DNA…aka, we are 99.9% similar! But, despite our 99.9% DNA match and thousands of years on earth being fully aware that humanity presents itself in a multitude of ways, we continue to struggle to unite.
Rather than seeking to understand each other, we get caught up in passing judgement for reasons like who we voted for in the last election, the religion we practice, who we kiss goodnight, material possessions, etc. When we forget how to understand one another, we create barriers between each other. Because we as humans have created these barriers, we are optimistic that we as humans can break them down. But, this involves making a conscious decision to change how we behave and change how we approach our common problems.
Einstein could not have been more accurate when he said, “we can’t solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them.” (Thanks, Einstein!).
The scope of a project to unify humanity is so large that we realized that we need help. In our search for like-minded people, we found many organizations already working toward the same goals. These organizations have a pre-existing network of people who need more resources to help expand their influence and build unity.
So, to answer question 1…. How can we help unify humanity?
We will build a brand that shares revenue and influence with organizations whose missions align with unifying humanity and run counter to building barriers. Simply put, if we can join forces with organizations and people who believe in building on our similarities rather than our differences, we can then uplift the human condition and gain traction. 30% of all profits will be shared with organizations vetted by Charity Navigator.
To answer question 2… How can we make unity a habit?
We will work to instill a mindset in others of seeking first to understand our similarities and then finding ways to align those same similarities to create unity. If we can make this a daily mindset among our neighbors, then by default, unity will become a habit.
Sounds simple, right? It most certainly can be...
 
30% of Profits Given

Charity Navigator is the largest expert charity evaluator in America. Their mission is to make impactful philanthropy easier for all and they do so by providing data on 1.7 million nonprofits and in-depth analysis of over 8,500 charities. More than 7 million people - including donors, nonprofit leaders, researchers, the media, and policymakers. We utilize Charity Navigator (www.charitynavigator.org.) to identify charities with goals that align with UNITY and meet key criteria in fundraising, expenses and distribution.
 
UNITY Mindful Fashion - We're Authentic!
Unfortunately, in today’s world, finding first hand and second hand copy products is very easy. Fake products can be created to look so authentic that one can often not tell the difference between a genuine and a fake. In order to provide evidence to the members of our commUNITY that all of our products are authentic, we have created the perfect Certificate of Authenticity which is sequentially numbered, with no duplication.
** This number is unique to each member in the commUNITY. Keep the Certificate handy as it will be used in future commUNITY projects.

 
 
Our First u.n.i.-gear: the u.n.i.-tee

(It's as close as we could get to your heart without physically touching you)

All shirts are sourced from a manufacturer with Platinum accreditation from WRAP (Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production), which certifies based on (1) Human resources management, (2) Health and safety standards, (3) Environmental and eco-friendly practices and (4) Legal compliance including import/export and customs compliance and security standards.

story:
Before the story: Being sweaty could be awful sometimes. Men get sweaty easier than women do. It can be really uncomfortable and embarrassing during important datings, job interviews, or even walking in the street.

Why you need it: Summer is coming soon, are you still fighting to get rid of your sweaty back. Here we are, ACOOL bag is able to help people in summer, especially for those who are always worried about getting a sweaty back. That’s what we do, moving fast as a snake, but keeping our body cool as a snake.

How it works: Simply plug in your own power bank inside the bag and turn the bag on, you are good to go. It will automatically turn on the highest level of the wind. Within a few seconds, you can feel the coolness from you back and your body temperature will drop. The fan is at the bottom, so there is no worry that the entry of the wind will be blocked. 

 The Power Of The Cooling System: There are three strong turbo fans in the bottom of ACOOL backpack which are triggered by 5V/1A power bank. In order to balance the power cost and the wind level, we test thousand times to ensure that the backpack can keep working for one-day use.

What makes it different: A sweaty back could be embarrassing in some important scenarios, such as interviews, datings or meetings. ACOOL bag brings you the coolest summer ever. Your body surface temperature can be maintained around 25°C by using  bag while the environmental temperature is 38°C. Three wind levels: low, medium and high. Choose the one you like.

Every detail is important to us: We set only one zipper for the bag, so it can carry plenty of stuff. The hidden fan support structure can hold up to 44lbs, and the fans will be working properly under the pressure. 
Water Proof Exterior Nylon: The exterior of ACOOL bag consists of waterproof nylon that avoids any water seepage into the backpack, protecting everything that is in it whether it rains, snows, gets muddy, or dusty.

Inner Water Bottle Pocket: Leaving the water bottom inside will keep the bag nice as one. 

Strong Hidden Fan Support structure: The hidden fan box can not only well protect the fans, but also provide enough support for the items inside. 

Multi-functional Front Pocket: The laptop store pocket and the inner store pocket are designed in the inner front side. Therefore, the storage room can be flexible.

Open And Pack Like a Suitcase: With the single zip design which ensures all the stuff can be packed nice and clean, packing stuff can never be easier.

Carry-On Sleeve: ACOOL bag has a hidden carry-on sleeve, so it can stay on your luggage stably. The carry-on sleeve can be hidden while not in use.

School And Office Ready: With dedicated spots for different items inside, ACOOL bag can carry a 13’’ to 15’’ laptop, a couple of books, a cord organizer, cards, a power adaptor, pens and a water bottle altogether in an organized way. Moreover, it can carry a pair of shoes, extra clothes and a whole toiletry set, which makes it an ideal backpack to keep business travelers organized on the go. 

Thicken Fresh Foam Handle: The bag's handle is covered by premium weave nylon with thicken fresh foam inside, which brings extra comfortable feeling while holding it.

Microfiber Leather: The strap is crafted with microfiber leather. We prefer to use animal friendly material to decorate ACOOL bag. 

Premium Weave Nylon:  The surface of ACOOL bag is built with light weight waterproof weave nylon.

Breathable Mesh Cloth: Our premium mesh cloth ensures the wind can reach your back easily.

Front Mosaic Switch: The adjustable controller is mosaic design and the wires are hidden in the shoulder strap by special sewing skill.

Use Your Own Power Bank: Use your favorite power bank to get the fans to work from inside. The cable inside can be plugged into any standard USB port.  

Low Power Cost: We tested our improved fans by certified 10,000mAh power banks, and the fans worked up to 8 hours. We highly recommend the users use certified power bank so the fans can work functionally.

Factory visiting: It took months to look over the best production line, material list and due time, but we found the best one for ACOOL bag production after we visited dozen of factories.

Prototype Development: There came to a problem with the prototype: How to put all parts together? After several prototypes development,  we develop the proper prototype for ACOOL. 

Quilty control and production timeline: In order to ship our ACOOL bags with fine standard, we required our third-party QC partner to check every detail of the bag. 

ACOOL Car Seat Cover

ACOOL car seat cover is designed for people who need coolness all the way. It is powered by DC 12V so it can be easily used during driving. The attached anti-slide dot-pad helps to hold the car seat cover in place, and the wind generated by the powerful fan can be activated and start blowing on your back in seconds. While driving during the summer, your back might get sweaty when you lean on a seat made up of leather that is not air-permeable. However, with ACOOL car seat cover, such trouble is no longer present.

Getting Coolness In Seconds

ACOOL Car Seat Cover provides strong wind flow with single turbo fan. With 12V DC input, the wind goes through bottom to top in seconds.

For Product

What are the dimensions of ACOOL Bag?

The dimensions of ACOOL bag are H 17'' x W 11'' x D 6'' or H 44cm x W 29cm x D 15cm.

How ACOOL Bag can help on defeating sweaty back in summer?

ACOOL bag can be connected to your own power bank and keep delivering wind on your back.

How many stuffs can ACOOL Bag carry?

An ACOOL Bag can hold up to 6 shirts, a pair of shoes, a laptop, charging cores, a pair of glasses, a water bottle and any other traveling items.

What size of laptop can fit in ACOOL Bag?

ACOOL Bag fits 15'' laptop easily. We make the laptop pocket thicker so it can fit larger laptops and provide more protection for laptops.

Does ACOOL Bag has more than one colour?

ACOOL Bag only has the classic business black, we will develop more colours if there is more needs in the future.

Does ACOOL Bag come with a battery pack?

We encourage people to use their own power banks, so you don't have to spend extra money while purchasing ACOOL Bag.

What's the difference between Early Bird and Regular Backing?

For Early Bird, Only limited consumers can get a discount for their early backs. But Regular Backing is also a fine price compared to the later marketing price.

Shipping And Tax

Similar to most other campaigns, our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes. It is very difficult to include tax in the price because of the vary tax systems from different countries. For non-Canada customers, they will receive a confirmation email about the payment of customs in their countries. 

We apologize for any inconvenience, but there is no proper way to solve such problem.

The package will usually delivery to your address. If there is any other situations, please follow the instructions from the local post offices.

Return Policy

We will follow indiegogo return policy:

"For campaign backers: Backers can process a refund for their transaction made to a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo, provided a campaign is live and not ended, the perk claimed has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to the campaigner.

For InDemand backers: Backers can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the transaction provided the InDemand page is live, the perk has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to the campaigner."

If the period if past, we will not refund or return the items in accordance with Indiegogo's Terms of Use. Our service service@tecsnake.com will be helping you on your questions.

This is the first time for our product to launch crowdfunding on Indiegogo. We are fully passionate about designing and developing our product to make it in a perfect way. Last year, we visited tons of factories in order to get the best partners. Finding a proper supply chain is not easy. We have to test the quality of material, the supply due time and other production issues. We will stay closely with suppliers once the campaign gets started, so we can solve all the product issues in time. We are confident to deliver our high-quality cooling ACOOL bag to you on time.

There is only one goal with ACOOL Bag: release the press for sweaty people in summer. Walking fast as a snake, feeling cool as a snake.

story:
OUR MISSION

Brightening minds, one puzzle at the time.

Sparking our children's creativity. 

Here at Margareta we believe that within every child lies a mind with unbelievable potential. We think of our toys as a spark to ignite their creative potential.


                                              INTRODUCING MARGARETA

Margareta is a Croatian brand that produces educational, high quality, handmade, and Eco-friendly toys for children.

Margareta is a set of wooden multicolored geometric shapes that are didactic puzzles. They can be converted into 3D shapes such as trees, houses, mountains, etc.



Margareta toys are made of lightweight, high-quality linden wood, and are painted with environmentally safe non-toxic paints. 

They come in a recyclable cardboard box along with instructions.

                                                        HOW DOES IT WORK?

Children ages two and up will enjoy balancing shapes, while the older children can arrange pieces in a cardboard box as instructed. Margareta toys develops logical thinking, visual perception, improves concentration, helps learning the basic colors, and also provide great entertainment for  the whole family. 

PINES

HOUSES

TREES

MOUNTAINS

HOUSE&PINES

                                                                  WHY INVEST?

Behind Margareta toys hides me, academic sculptor Margareta Lekic. After years of artistic and pedagogical experience with children of different age I decided to combine a love for art and logic which resulted as educational toys for children. 


I make toys in a small workshop with old tools. Now, I would be happy to move to a slightly bigger factory and buy some new saws, sanding machines, packaging and paint, don't forget the paint! ;) This is why I'm here, to give children beautiful childhood moments of happiness.
These simple but yet so beautiful and classic toys need to stay out of boxes at all cost, don't you think?
I need 12,500 $ for all this to happen.
So now you know me, my brand and what I want to do. Help out and spark up our children's minds!!!  :)

Ho ho ho! Great news! Margareta toys could be ready just in time for Christmas!

story:
(Deni Bechard, courtesy of Mountain2Mountain)


We love bikes. We love skirts.

Most times, these two don’t mix. Despite being a small barrier, it does prevent women from making the most of their two-wheeled adventures.   

What started out as a simple idea using a penny and a rubber band quickly grew into a worldwide sensation. Women in cities all over the world were throwing on their favourite skirts, popping in their pennies, and cycling the streets worry free! Read more about the amazing story of how we started.


New and Improved Penny in Yo' Pants!

While the penny and rubber band are simple and cheap - women were telling us that it's aggressive on the fabric and isn't always graceful to put in.   Our new and improved Penny in Yo' Pants puck makes it even easier and more stylish for you to wear your skirts on your bike. 

We’ve handcrafted Penny in Yo' Pants to fit neatly into your bag or pocket.  The puck is faux leather with an aluminium coin that fits neatly in between the slot on the puck. The two snap together when you aren't using them - you can also use them as a brooch or scarf clasp.  If you lose the special penny, don't worry! It can be replaced with any currency coin.



How it works

Using Penny in Yo' Pants is super easy - just follow these steps.

  1. Put on your most favourite skirt.

  2. Place the puck against the front of the skirt and hold in place.

  3. Behind your skirt, push the penny through both layers of skirt and through the puck.

  4. Adjust the penny and fabric so it sits comfortably.

  5. Now throw your leg over the saddle and you are off!



You can even use your Penny on your scarf or as a lovely brooch.


Penny for Good

We feel very strongly in power of the bicycle, especially for women. For every Penny in Yo' Pants you buy - we will donate 5% of the sale to support the Afghanistan Women’s Cycling team.  This amazing group of women are defying repressive tradition by getting on their bikes and competing for their country.

(Deni Bechard, courtesy of Mountain2Mountain)

With more support – they can train and compete regularly which will create more awareness for their cause and more opportunities for other women.

We are collaborating with Shannon Galpin and the American nonprofit Mountain 2 Mountain who have been working closely to help develop the team.

Each time you wear your Penny in Yo’ Pants, you will be supporting women who are changing their country one ride at a time.  

We want to help women feel confident in the streets - in Scotland, Afghanistan and all over the world!


Get yours today!

With your support, we can produce Penny in Yo' Pants on a large scale and we want you to get the first batch!  We have created quite a few perks including the actual product with options for retailers and charities. 

ALL CURRENCIES WELCOME! The contributions are quoted in pounds, but we accept other currencies as well. REMEMBER TO ADD SHIPPING IF NEEDED - extra costs are added in perk details.


We have some amazing perks available for you!

PENNY IN YO' PANTS PRODUCT


PENNY IN YO' PANTS WATER BOTTLE


PENNY IN YO' PANTS T-SHIRT


PENNY IN YO' PANTS UNDERWEAR


FOR DISTRIBUTORS AND RETAILERS


From all of us at Penny in Yo' Pants, thank you!

Don't forget to share your Penny stories using #pennyinyopants on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram! You can also keep updated on our mailing list - sign up here!
story_txt:
(Deni Bechard, courtesy of Mountain2Mountain)We love bikes. We love skirts.Most times, these two don’t mix. Despite being a small barrier, it does prevent women from making the most of their two-wheeled adventures.   What started out as a simple idea using a penny and a rubber band quickly grew into a worldwide sensation. Women in cities all over the world were throwing on their favourite skirts, popping in their pennies, and cycling the streets worry free! Read more about the amazing story of how we started.
New and Improved Penny in Yo' Pants!
While the penny and rubber band are simple and cheap - women were telling us that it's aggressive on the fabric and isn't always graceful to put in.   Our new and improved Penny in Yo' Pants puck makes it even easier and more stylish for you to wear your skirts on your bike. 
We’ve handcrafted Penny in Yo' Pants to fit neatly into your bag or pocket.  The puck is faux leather with an aluminium coin that fits neatly in between the slot on the puck. The two snap together when you aren't using them - you can also use them as a brooch or scarf clasp.  If you lose the special penny, don't worry! It can be replaced with any currency coin.

How it worksUsing Penny in Yo' Pants is super easy - just follow these steps.
Put on your most favourite skirt.
Place the puck against the front of the skirt and hold in place.
Behind your skirt, push the penny through both layers of skirt and through the puck.
Adjust the penny and fabric so it sits comfortably.
Now throw your leg over the saddle and you are off!

You can even use your Penny on your scarf or as a lovely brooch.Penny for GoodWe feel very strongly in power of the bicycle, especially for women. For every Penny in Yo' Pants you buy - we will donate 5% of the sale to support the Afghanistan Women’s Cycling team.  This amazing group of women are defying repressive tradition by getting on their bikes and competing for their country.(Deni Bechard, courtesy of Mountain2Mountain)With more support – they can train and compete regularly which will create more awareness for their cause and more opportunities for other women. We are collaborating with Shannon Galpin and the American nonprofit Mountain 2 Mountain who have been working closely to help develop the team.Each time you wear your Penny in Yo’ Pants, you will be supporting women who are changing their country one ride at a time.  We want to help women feel confident in the streets - in Scotland, Afghanistan and all over the world!Get yours today!With your support, we can produce Penny in Yo' Pants on a large scale and we want you to get the first batch!  We have created quite a few perks including the actual product with options for retailers and charities. ALL CURRENCIES WELCOME! The contributions are quoted in pounds, but we accept other currencies as well. REMEMBER TO ADD SHIPPING IF NEEDED - extra costs are added in perk details.We have some amazing perks available for you!PENNY IN YO' PANTS PRODUCTPENNY IN YO' PANTS WATER BOTTLEPENNY IN YO' PANTS T-SHIRTPENNY IN YO' PANTS UNDERWEARFOR DISTRIBUTORS AND RETAILERSFrom all of us at Penny in Yo' Pants, thank you!Don't forget to share your Penny stories using #pennyinyopants on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram! You can also keep updated on our mailing list - sign up here!

story:
Do you remember the "Pet Rock"craze? That was a silly/crazy idea, but a very successful one for that dude. Well, the "Billionaire Booger-Picker Roach-Clip Toothpick" Combo MIGHT be just as silly if not more.

Here's a little bit about me

  • I'm a 72-years-young, retired old Hippie Dude, with a lot of time to think of silly as well as serious things/subjects/causes/dreams/etcetera. I'm an artist, writer philosopher. My primary website/blog is almost at one million visits from approximately 179 countries. People enjoy reading my essays. If you like to read, go to www.tcsblog.net. My art is on a separate website at www.silverstrandstudios.com
  • I have a desire to create this item, to be able to eventually leave a bit of $$ for my two "adult" children and my Grandson (for college).
  • Investors that enjoy a good laugh every now and then, and who invest in this project, will help get this silly item manufactured, and distributed/marketed.

I'm NOT expecting to be on "Shark Tank" any time soon, so this crowdfunding will fund the following

  • Manufacture of a working prototype and the packaging
  • Selection of a suitable manufacturer
  • Partnership/Contract with a major Giftware/Novelty Item Distributor
  • Advertising Campaign
  • I'm not sure just how much will be required in terms of needed funding. I believe that whatever funding is received through this venture will assist in funding the patent application (even though it IS a novelty item). The funds received will also be used to hire the right consultants to find the right manufacturer, and to find the right distribution companies/channels, and to fund the overall advertising and marketing campaign,
  • Perks? I would think that being part of the "Larger than the Pet Rock" novelty item, from initial start-up to seeing them sold everywhere, will be a real trippy thing. You either got to love it, or hate it

Risks & Challenges

There are ALWAYS risks in EVERYTHING we do in life. Join me and let's deal with the risks together..

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, NETWORK! Tell your Billionaire/Millionaire/Rich Uncle Billy that he absolutely NEEDS to help fund the manufacture of the, "Billionaire Booger-Picker Roach-Clip Toothpick".

  • Please help this go viral as an IndieGoGo Crowdfunding Campaign by sharing. You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

story: .

ZK No.2 CHRONOMETER WATCHES

 

WHO IS ZAHND & KORMANN? A BRIEF INTRODUCTION

Lets take it step by step and give those who do not know us yet a short heads up:    

We, that's Roger Zahnd & Florian Kormann, are two friends from Bern, Switzerland, aiming to make our lifetime dream come true and create our own swiss watch brand... together with you.

Back in 2017 we started our journey with the ZK No.1, a Swiss Made Automatic Chronograph with full calendar and moon phase, powered by the legendary ETA 7751 automatic movement, which we sold over 250 times through crowdfunding on Kickstarter and Indiegogo.

But what is our motivation and why should you get a watch from a young, upcoming but mostly unknown Swiss Brand? For us this is not about the fast money. If it comes over night that's of course ok for us. But the goal of our project is to create a sustainable watch brand, to offer quality, to learn and to improve with every new timepiece we create.

On the one hand, the Z&K automatic watches are the perfect introduction to the world of mechanical watches for watch newbies and on the other hand they are a great addition to the existing collection for watch enthusiasts.

And it is also the story of taking a once in a lifetime chance in order to realize a dream. This is how we came up with our slogan "Time is YOURS!".

Now we are back with our second watch the ZK No.2 a Swiss Made Automatic watch powered by a chronometer certified automatic movement. The watches are available in two versions: As a diver watch and as a GMT watch.

All designs you will see on this campaign page are limited to 50 pcs only! Each watch is numbered and will come with an official and numbered certification from the chronometer Institute in Le Locle, Switzerland.

 

HOW DOES THIS CAMPAIGN WORK?

The goal of this campaign is to ensure the production of ZK No.2. The campaign runs for a total of 40 days. The goal is to collect CHF 113'000.00 during this time, which means selling a little more than 100 watches.

When scrolling further down we will first introduce you to the diver watch version of the ZK No.2 and right after the GMT including technical specifications and scope of delivery.

 

HOW TO ORDER A WATCH?

On the right side of this window you can find the perks we are offering. Starting with the lowest priced perk for the diver watch followed by the GMT's further down below. Choose the best available perk for the version of the watch you like.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: Your credit card will not be charged until we have reached our campaign goal and the campaign is over. In the meantime, you can cancel or change your order at any time.

 

WIE FUNKTIONIERT DIESE KAMPAGNE UND WAS IST UNSER ZIEL?

Das Ziel dieser Kampagne ist es, die Produktion der ZK No. 2 sicherzustellen. Die Kampagne läuft insgesamt 40 Tage. Ziel ist es, während dieser Zeit CHF 113'000.00 zu sammeln, was den Verkauf von etwas mehr als 100 Uhren bedeutet.

Wenn du weiter runten scrollst, werden wir dir zuerst die Taucheruhr-Version der ZK No.2 und gleich danach die GMT-Version mit technischen Spezifikationen und Lieferumfang vorstellen.

 

WIE BESTELLE ICH EINE UHR?

Auf der rechten Seite dieses Fensters findest du unsere Angebote. Angefangen mit dem niedrigsten Preis für die Taucheruhr, gefolgt von den GMT's weiter unten. Die Angebote sind limitiert. So gibt es vom günstigsten Angebot zum Beispiel nur 25 Stück. Sind diese ausverkauft, so steigt der Preis. Der schnellere gewinnt. Wähle also das für dich günstigste Angebot aus. Einfach drauf klicken, Angaben hinterlegen und schon hast du eine Uhr bestellt.

WICHTIG: Deine Kreditkarte wird erst belastet, wenn wir unser Kampagnenziel erreicht haben und die Kampagne vorbei ist. In der Zwischenzeit hast du jederzeit die Möglichkeit deine Bestellung zu stornieren oder zu ändern.

 

LET'S GET STARTED... LOS GEHT'S

 

 

THE DIVER

Thanks to Sellita's SW 200-1 COSC certified chronometer movement, which is set to the highest precision, you'll never show up too late. Whether you're going for a dive or on your next date.

The materials used, such as Ceramic, Sapphire Crystal or Titanium (also available in black PVD coated), guaranteeing maximum robustness and durability.

The case, which is resistant up to a depth of 60 ATM / 600 meters, is super compact and tested under highest pressure, to ensure that no drop of water comes too close to the automatic movement of your watch. Further our all-round carefree package also includes a 5-year warranty and personal, uncomplicated service. Worldwide shipping is included in the price.

The Diver watch will accompany you whether you are out in the nature, river rafting, having a dip in the pool, meeting friends and family or at a business dinner.

 

THE DIVER WATCH DESIGNS

Your new watch convinces through watchmaking craftsmanship with a sporty and elegant design, available in eight different color combinations.

 

THE DIVER SPECIAL DESIGNS

 

THE DIVER

SPECIFICATIONS AND SCOPE OF DELIVERY

 

  • Movement: Sellita SW200-1 chronometer certified
  • Case: 44mm titanium case with helium release valve
  • Deviation: +/- 3 sec per day*

    *This is an avarage value and the official numbers stated by Sellita.
     
  • Waterproof up to 60 ATM / 600 meters
  • 22mm titanium bracelet with quick release system and
    size adjustable ratcheting folding clasp
  • 38 hours of power reserve
  • 26 jewels
  • Total watch height: 14.9 mm
  • Lug to Lug: 51 mm
  • Screw-down crown
  • 120 clicks unidirectional Rotating Ceramic Bezel
  • Dial: Teak pattern dial
  • Illumination: BGW9
  • Sapphire crystal front and back: Inside AR coated
     
  • Limited series of only 50 pcs per design
  • 5 years of international warranty
  • Free shipping worldwide is included (regular mail)

    How to order the vintage leather strap?
    The leather strap must be ordered separately. Click on the perk you would like to get. Choose the color and after that click the "choose the payment button". Now you can add the leather strap as an add on perk.

*Sellita sample picture. All rights reserved by Sellita.

 

THE GMT

Of course, as well as the Diver, our GMT version also impresses with a high-precision COSC chronometer movement, the Sellita SW 330-1. T

The high-quality materials such as the Ceramic Bezel, Stainless Steel, Titanium, the Sapphire Crystal as well as with Water Resistance up to 600 meters depth and the sporty elegant design are available in eight different color combinations.

BUT it gets even better!...


 

Another highlight is added: The GMT function! The GMT function, i.e. the display of a Second time zone, will not let you lose sight of your home town. No matter where you are in the world, with the GMT version you have time under your control.

 

THE GMT WATCH DESIGNS

Same as the Diver version the GMT watches come in eight different sporty and elegant designs.

 

THE GMT SPECIAL DESIGNS

 

GMT

SPECIFICATIONS AND SCOPE OF DELIVERY

  • Movement: Sellita SW330-1 chronometer certified
  • Deviation: +/- 3 sec per day*

*This is a avarage value and the official numbers stated by Sellita.

  • Second time zone indication
  • Case: 44mm titanium case with helium release valve
  • Waterproof up to 60 ATM / 600 meters
  • 22mm titanium bracelet with quick release system and
    size adjustable ratcheting folding clasp
  • Additional Nato Strap
  • 42 hours of power reserve
  • 25 jewels
  • Total watch height: 14.9 mm
  • Lug to Lug: 51 mm
  • Screw-down crown
  • 120 clicks unidirectional rotating ceramic bezel
  • Dial: Teak pattern dial
  • Illumination: BGW9
  • Sapphire crystal front and back: Inside AR coated

 

  • Limited series of only 50 pcs worldwide per design
  • 5 years of international warranty
  • Free shipping worldwide is included
     

How to order the vintage leather strap?
The leather strap must be ordered separately. Click on the perk you would like to get. Choose the color and after that click the "choose the payment button". Now you can add the leather strap as an add on perk.

* Sellita sample picture. All rights reserved by Sellita.

 

SWISS MADE AND CERTIFIED

What makes these watches really special, next to the super cool design, is the fact that the watches are powered by chronometer movements, which are certified by the COSC institute in Le Locle.

Less than <3% off all movements produced in Switzerland are chronometer certified. And each ZK No.2 comes with one of those.

As the name suggests, the COSC issues quality certificates for chronometers based on a standardized measuring procedure according to NIHS 95-11 / ISO 3159. This test of the movement lasts 15 days, during which the movement's rate is determined in five different positions at three temperatures.

Each movement certified by the COSC is individually numbered and will come with an official certificate.

 

IN THE NEWS

 

 

     

    RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    If we would tell you that crowdfunding is without risks and easy, then this would be a lie. And believe us, we know what we are talking about. Unfortunately we had to overcome some obstacles in the past.

    One year ago we tried to get the production of the ZK No.2 funded on Kickstarter. We did reach our funding goal but unfortunately we had to make a detour due to short-term adjustments from suppliers. Thats why we are back on Indiegogo to finally reach our goal. To do so we need to sell a little more than 100 additional watches. And thanks to your support we will get there.

    So as you can see we allready went through the highest highs and the lowest lows. The biggest risk is that we are a small company and are depending on our suppliers. If they get an order from a big player, we for sure will be priority two, three or five. Means that there is always the risk of delays and changes in the schedule. But due to the fact that we are already experienced, we do not get into panic mode. We do adapt and keep going until we reach our goal. 

    This is our lifetime dream and we do our very best that it comes true. And you know what? So far we allways delivered.

     

    Thank you very much for your trust and your support!

    Florian & Roger

story:
A bag that responds to the pace and urgency of contemporary life. 
Work, shopping, gym, travel, leisure are some of the activities that are already part of the daily routine of many of us, to which SAKO aims to respond for its adaptability and minimalist design.

 

 

>> Simple design >> 100% waterproof >> Adaptable to one's style >> Multifunctional >> 100% recyclable >> 100% made in Portugal

 

- Waterproof  -

SAKO is totally waterproof. Made of the same material as fishermen's suits.

Keep your laptop, and your documents save from the water. 

 
 
SAKO has two pockets, a small one for papers and wallet, and another one for your laptop.
 

 
 

- Quick Fit Straps -

You can easily change your webbing for another color or change the way that you carry your SAKO, like a bag or a backpack.
 
 
 
Three available colors of handles made of car seat belt webbing:
Black, Orange and Yellow
 
 
 
 

- Quick Handles Adjustment -

The quick and easy adjustment of the handles allows you to adapt SAKO to your size quickly.
 
 
 

 

- Bellows Opening - 

Allows for easier access to the inside of your SAKO, as well as giving greater storage capacity.
 
 
Three available colors of inner bags:
Black, Orange and Yellow
 
 
 
 
 

- Laptop Pocket -

Outer pocket for the laptop. Quickly save your computer without having to open SAKO.
This compartment is fall protected and has enough space to store your computer or iPad.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

- Keychain -

Don't waste time searching for the keys in your SAKO. Here you have quick access to your
key ring.
 
 
 

 

- Magnetic Contact -

For a quick and simple adjustment of your inner lining to SAKO. 
You can change it easier for different uses.
 
 
 
 

  1. High-quality PVC fabric produced in Portugal; PVC 85% Poliester 15%; Thickness (mm) 0.45; support mass (g / m2) 80 + -8 EN ISO 2286-2; Breaking load (daN / 50mm) L: 75 T: 60 EN ISO 1421; Elongation at rupture (%) L: 18 T: 20 EN ISO 1421; Tear strength (daN) L: 6.0 T: 3.0 EN ISO 4674-1A; Adhesive coating (daN / 50mm) min.3,0 EN ISO 2411  
  2. 100% Nylon; Type Taffeta Fabric; Style: Ripstop; Technics: Woven; Density: 300T; Certification: SGS; Durable High tear resistance; Width 57/58"; Feature: Waterproof, silicone coated Durable High tear resistance; Yarn Count: 40D*40D; Weight: 55GSM; 
  3. 100% Polyester; Type: Oxford Fabric; Style: Plan; Tecnics: Woven; Coated Type: PU type; Feature: Waterproof, Tear-Resistant ; Yarn Count: 600D*600D; Density: 112X71; Width: 58/60"; Weight: 200GSM; Certification: Oeko-Tex Standard 100, SGS; 
  4. High quality safety polyester car seat belt webbing; Certificate:- ISO9001, CE
  5. Elastic straps in Polyester / Cotton; Eco-Friendly, Elastic, High Tenacity; OEKO-TEX STD 100. ISO 9100 Certification 
  6. Aluminum black buckles; Capacity: About 25-30KGS; Weight:17g

Every color has a registration like the boats. For each color, we have attributed a name related to the Portuguese tradition of the sea.

 

VASCO DA GAMA
A Portuguese navigator and explorer. Commander of the first ships to sail from Europe to India.

BOA ESPERANÇA
Portuguese caravel from the Discoveries epic. It has affirmed itself as an ideal ship to sail in unknown seas.

POSÍDON
Supreme God of the sea.

SÃO PEDRO
Patron saint of fishermen.

MADRE DE DEUS
It was the largest ship in the world of its time, built in 1589, for the Career of India.

SÃO GABRIEL
Portuguese caravel built in 1497, was one of the ships of Vasco da Gama
 
FLOR DE LA MAR
Portuguese caravel built in 1502 and wrecked on November 20, 1511 in the Strait of Malaica.
 

 

 

 

Hello, my name is Hugo Ferraz, I have two children, and I am a Portuguese architect who is passionate about new concepts and ideas that contribute to improving the quality of life. That's why I've created in 2014 Ideas Forward, an international platform for ideas competitions.

 

 

Hello, my name is Sandra José. I am a mother of two, and I am an actress, playwright and music teacher. Art and creation have always been part of my life.

 

In 2016 a show that we were part of as a set designer and actress joined us. We realized early on that a lot of things brought us together, fell in love, and rebuilt our lives.
Now we have a full house and have found the balance that only love can return.
Professionally we have involved in many other projects. 
We have already edited a book, and continue to work as a team far beyond the affective field because we have learned to organize and separate emotions.
With our dynamic professions, we felt the need to create a product that could meet the demands of our work.
Shopping trips for such a large family, classes, shows, gym, trips, among many other activities, led us to think of a bag concept that could meet all our needs.

To realize our idea, we retrieved memories of the Portuguese fishing tradition, which materialized in a contemporary object of global use.
The personalized organization, simple access, and adaptable accessories creatively.
SAKO has a minimal design and sturdy materials, inspired by the Portuguese coastal tradition, where the image of boats is admittedly present in a graphic reinterpretation that values the culture of a people.

 

Each will carry a little of our history on their shoulders to create their own.
SAKO is a 100% product produced in Portugal.

 

When the campaign ends on October 31st, will be sent to the backers a voucher of their purchase if they want do offer on Christmas.

SAKO has been running for about a year and a half from product design to final prototype. It is a 100% Portuguese product, conducted by experienced hands, in a factory that already has 30 years of existence. Its fabric is made from 15% Polyester Canvas, revised to 85% PVC on both sides. Tested for support mass, load, and strength, it has the APCER Quality Certificate Seal.

 

 

What people say about us!

 

"Beautiful and inspiring, what more can you want from a backpack?"

Joana Amaral Dias

 

"What is thought and done by us."

Rita Loureiro

 

"SAKO. Criatividade portuguesa para todos"

José Fidalgo

 

 

 

 

                           

 

All help is welcome so, if you can share it, spread it among your friends, make some noise, and get to know SAKO we will be very grateful!!!

 

For any questions please contact us for this email:

geral@sakobags.com

 

Your collaboration will mean the production of SAKO, perhaps a change of view on the concept of the Backpack.

For the total financing, we need 20 000€ for the production of the first 500 SAKO's. All production encompasses the physical production of the product and the entire parallel process of company creation, licensing, registration, and marketing. For each financier, campaign discount advantages are ranging from 30% to 40% of the final resale price.

 

A country of beaches and fishers, with a coastline of about 1860 km, SAKO, through colors, materials, and visual references, becomes a signature that reinterprets the traditions of the Portuguese people and recreates them in a bag. With materials chosen for offshore weather, it becomes a sturdy bag, while presenting an urban and modern design capable of satisfying different personalities and contexts. Due to its way of color matching among the changeable accessories, SAKO allows each one to transform it into their style and adapt to different everyday situations.

SAKO is environmentally friendly.

  • It combines multiple functions in itself through its components (thermal bag, travel bag).
  • Avoid using plastic through their inner bags.
  • Very durable material.
  • 100% made in Portugal with Portuguese materials
  • 100% recyclable


Thus came the idea of “Make your story”, a series of short films inspired by real stories. We challenge our supporters to send us their short stories that, after selection by the SAKO team, will be turned into short films.

We are aware of the risks that a lack of customer confidence can mean in product betting, and for this reason, SAKO has a two-year warranty. We bet on a product we believe in, made of high-quality materials and strength, combined with a contemporary style with a history of a people that gives it the final signature.
It's not the first time we have produced something, and we are confident of our ability to organize and deliveries on time, as they once were. In the unlikely event that something unexpected happens, we promise to communicate the situation to all our sponsors transparently.
Delays: Deliveries and shipments are not always the most straightforward or most timely process. Some unforeseen situations, such as strikes, customs problems, or delays that are not up to us, may delay the delivery of SAKO. We have already contemplated a time that can predict all of these delays, but sometimes they may be a little longer than what we accounted. We will try, however, to follow the dispatches and to communicate the delivery to each sponsor.

A very big

THANK YOU!!!
story_txt:
A bag that responds to the pace and urgency of contemporary life. Work, shopping, gym, travel, leisure are some of the activities that are already part of the daily routine of many of us, to which SAKO aims to respond for its adaptability and minimalist design.

 


 

>> Simple design >> 100% waterproof >> Adaptable to one's style >> Multifunctional >> 100% recyclable >> 100% made in Portugal

 



- Waterproof  -
SAKO is totally waterproof. Made of the same material as fishermen's suits.

Keep your laptop, and your documents save from the water. 

  
 

SAKO has two pockets, a small one for papers and wallet, and another one for your laptop.
 

 
 


- Quick Fit Straps -

You can easily change your webbing for another color or change the way that you carry your SAKO, like a bag or a backpack.
 


 

 
Three available colors of handles made of car seat belt webbing:Black, Orange and Yellow

The quick and easy adjustment of the handles allows you to adapt SAKO to your size quickly.
 

 

 
 

- Bellows Opening - 
Allows for easier access to the inside of your SAKO, as well as giving greater storage capacity.
 

 
Three available colors of inner bags:Black, Orange and Yellow

 

 

 
 
 
- Laptop Pocket -
Outer pocket for the laptop. Quickly save your computer without having to open SAKO.This compartment is fall protected and has enough space to store your computer or iPad.

story:
Overview

You know that annoying feeling when you gotta tie your shoes every single time out for leisure & in another universe you have to wear an ugly, expensive strap/velcro shoes?!

Well, forget about that now because you can get FLAMINGO for your best option.

  • Easy to wear (built for everyday use)
  • Perfect for daily lifestyle or professional setting (versatile)
  • Affordable
  • No unnecessary fanciness
  • No weird tech

 

Why We Created Flamingo At First Place?

We started FLAMINGO to refine overpriced & outdated strap shoes where most of them look ugly, childish & old to wear. While you can still find the decent one, 70% of them are expensive.

Our goal is to change the way you think about them by delivering affordable shoes that are easy to wear, look beautiful & comfy fits with your daily lifestyle.

"These could be your next option besides lace shoes while do casual activities"

Features

"Put on & take off your shoes as simple as 1,2,3"

The Materials

Vegan Friendly Leather Fabric

The faux leather we use is a vegan friendly product & 100% cruelty-free.

 

Who Are These Great For?

Flamingo look great on both men & women or maybe you just too lazy to tie your shoes or you love something new, who knows?! 

Whether strolling around cities, do leisure activities, enjoy your Starbucks or do whatever you want Flamingo designed to make your life easier.

(match with business casual)

(go well with shorts)

(rock them with jeans)

 

Collection

2 different colours perfect with your daily lifestyle 

From Sun Up to Sun Down

With comfortability in mind, Flamingo is extremely versatile. It can be paired in any get-up. Take them wherever life takes you, from your workplace to the outdoors.

 

Flamingo Is Also Backed With A Warranty

We are so confident with the quality & durability of our shoes, that if something were to happen, we hope you will send it back to us. 

Warranty does not cover: wear and tear and ageing, any damage on any part of the shoes resulting from abusive use, negligence & accidents.

 

Rewards

 

Sizing

How To Measure Your Feet

  1. Set your heel against the wall on a piece of a paper.
  2. Draw the outline of your toes.
  3. Measure the distance from the back of the paper to your big toe.
  4. Repeat on other foot & choose the best size for your shoes.

Timeline

 

How To Buy / Back This Project

  1. Click "Select A Perk" & choose available reward tier you would like to pledge.
  2. Click "Continue To Payment" & enter your payment information & complete your shipping address.
  3. Click "Submit Payment" & you're done! 

 

Help Us Spread The Word

Follow Us

Explore Our FAQ

From The Founder

Thank You. Gracias. Merci. Danke. Grazie. Terima Kasih. Xie Xie.

story:
Signup for our release news & special offers here. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us via email: team@zeluslondon.com or Whatsapp: +44 7413093772

 

In April 2019, we successfully funded the Nighthawk jacket on both Kickstarter & Indiegogo. After a year of being interrupted by the global pandemic, we are back stronger and ready to bring you something more exciting.

There are countless jackets on crowdfunding platforms that packed with features that customers might or might not need. However we have not come across one single product that is not only functional, but actually fashionable & stylish (i.e. look good).

We decide to change that.

Introducing Stormbender. Designed for city dwellers & travellers who want the extreme versatility, essential utility & waterproof performance, with the best fashionable style possible.

 

Design Thoughts

State-of-the-art storm-bending waterproof performance for all weather conditions, exceptional insulation to keep you warm and protected from the elements.

 

 

Water repellent zippers with additional button-front pad for enhanced storm-seal.

  

 

Skin-like vegan friendly fabric #SynTech, carefully designed at its weight-class to achieve the perfect balance between the best possible waterproof performance and insulation while maintaining a lightweight body for ease-of-carry by city dwellers or outdoor travellers.

 

Convertible extension side zippers to switch between slim fit & lose fit, for freedom of style & comfort of movement.

 

Perfect coat length to strike the balance between style, coverage & comfort of movement.

 

Choose between Bright or Dark Prints: choose between subtly designed reflective bright prints (for enhanced visibility in low light condition):

And dark-print to represent your own classy & understated style:

 

 

Essential #ZL signature NFC card pockets for super easy payment during commute.

All zippered pockets for maximum security of your daily essentials

Removable hood for freedom to switch between coat styles

 

 


 

Thoughtfully tailored fit & design for both men and women. We designed 2 different types of fit - with a slight design difference for male and female body types to ensure our customers get their preferred style & familiar sizing. However, we welcome gender-neutrality and welcome our female customers to choose the male fit for a slightly more masculine look & lose style if that's your personal style preference.

 

Superb craftmanship - all designed & handmade by our highly skilled inhouse designers, tailors & craftsmen with over 20 years experience.

 

 

 

Pricing

We are a 100% online brand and engage directly & personally with each and every customer of ours, hence you are not paying a penny for any cost associated with a brick and mortar store. This allows us to offer a superior product, with superb customer service at superb pricing that reflects the quality of the piece itself - not the retail markup. 

 

Backer Bonus

1. Receiving a "Aegis" Face Mask for Free

Each Stormbender backer will receive an additional bonus item - our inhouse designed & produced face covering - Aegis, a contemporary face mask by ZL.

It is a unisex & single size accessory crafted with dual layers of ultra soft, stretchy and breathable fabric. Machine-washable for easy care and features stretch-cotton lining and elastisized loops.

You will receive the facemask included in the parcel when it's dispatched.

 

2. Exclusive 'Backer-Special' Discount Code

Each backer will also receive a unique voucher code for 50% off for all items available in store. The code will be delivered immediately after the campaign ends, if the Stormbender project is successfully funded.

3. Gifting option available

We are also welcome purchases for that special person of yours - your best boy/girlfriend, your best friend, a special family member - we will make sure it's gift wrapped with your personal 'hand-written' note inserted for a special experience for that special person ??

 

 

Stretch Goal 1: New Colours

If we are able to reach our funding goal, every additional 100 units of Stormbender, we are able to unlock the following colours (in this order):

  1. Navy Blue
  2. Midnight Black
  3. Lionheart Burgundy.
  4. Topgun Green

 

Stretch Goal 2: Rainmaker

If we are able to reach our pleged goal, you will unlock and have the choice to purchase a our super lightweight jacket: Rainmaker - a shorter version of the stormbender, for those who want the minimal version without any compromise of all the essential benefits Stormbender offers. [Product images going live on 18th Oct]

 

Size Chart & How to Measure

 

*NEW* Custom-Made Add-on

Thanks to valuable customer feedback, we now offer a custom-made add-on. By pledging for an additional Custom-Made add-on, we will provide you with a measurement template in our post campaign survey, you can send us the specific measurement you want and we will make the Stormbender entirely tailored to fit your body or the person you are gifting the jacket for.

 

After campaign ends, you will receive a survey link for you to fill in your measurement details.

Measurement Method 1: measure your own body

- Sleeve: Measure from the shoulder line to the bottom of the sleeve

- Chest: Measure under the arms at the fullest part around the chest/bust horizontally.

- Waist: Measure around your waist at the narrowest part

- Hips (Sweep): With the feet together measure around fullest part.

- Find the most suitable size based on your own experience

 

Measurement Method 2:

1. Find a jacket you have that you feel fits you the best

2. Measure the below 5 places:

- Sleeves

- Length

- Chest

- Waist

- Hip (Sweep) - this is the elastic band at the bottom of the jacket

Find the closest matching size from the sizing chart:

Measurement Method 3:

In the survey link, on the "I need help with sizing recommendation" question, select 'Yes', make sure you answer all the questions included in the survey, especially the following items. Alternatively you can reach out to us via team@zeluslondon.com

- Height 

- Weight 

- Usual T-shirt size and jacket/blazer/coat size

- What best to describe your BUILD: e.g. skinny, slim, average, athletic, muscly, larger build

- *What best to describe your ARM LENGTH and SHOULDERS: e.g. "I think I have short arms, small shoulders", "I have longer arms than most people, and broad shoulders"

- What's your preferred fit: tight fit, slim-fit, regular fit, lose fit, oversized fit

- We will then recommend the best fit for you based on your description

 

PLEASE NOTE:

The illustration of the above measurement represents the actual measurement of the jacket in each location

Jackets are meant to be worn over other layers, so don’t size exactly. You'll need to leave space for wearing additional layers under the jacket, such as a t-shirt and sweater.

We will provide further sizing guidelines and examples of different sized people wearing Nighthawk jackets later on which will be sent out towards the end of the campaign.

Please don't hesitate to ask if you have a question, we are here to help!

 

 

Project Timeline

 

SHIPPING - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll receive a link via Kickstarter for a survey. The survey will ask for size choice. Please ensure this is filled out promptly once the campaign ends to avoid any delays.

RETURNS - If you receive a manufacture's defect product, or have received the wrong size, you will have 30 days to request for exchange or refund.

You can simply email us via team@zeluslondon.com. Once we have received the returned item and verified its condition, we will refund the initial purchase amount.

 

About ZELUS LONDON™

ZELUS LONDON™ is an apparel designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in London, United Kingdom. Taking inspiration from artists and thought leaders like Jiri Thyn, Ido Portal and Alan Watts, the brand stands for simplicity. All our garments are designed to create the perfect balance between function and form. Our popular t-shirts are created with Nanoflex, a bespoke performance fabric made to fit like your own skin, while being soft, stretchy and breathable.

After the success of our Nighthawk campaign on both Kickstarter & Indiegogo, we have received positive feedback and recommendations from all around the world. Now we're excited to bring you Stormbender.

We have teamed up with expert suppliers globally to craft a new, weatherproof jacket for urban living and lightweight travelling. The features of this jacket are carefully balanced between function and form allowing a tailored style without compromising on protection from the elements.

We believe that simplicity has the power to enhance your performance: there’s a reason that Einstein rotated five identical suits and Steve Jobs never deviated from his iconic black turtleneck and jeans. It has been proven again and again that the burden of decision-making wears you down. By minimising lower-order decision-making, energy is conserved for the things that really matter.

That's why all our garments are designed as functional, everyday essentials allowing you a minimal wardrobe that doesn't compromise on style or quality.

At ZELUS LONDON, we believe that simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication. That’s why we think that Apple’s chief designer, Jonathan Ives, had it right when he said that ‘design is at its best and its most empowering when it simply disappears.’

We hope that Stormbender appeals to you, the city dwellers and adventure seekers that it was created for. Your support will allow us to continue to create streamlined, innovative and beautiful clothing, including a women’s line and winter jacket.

 

 

Join the #ZLClub - Become Our Brand Ambassadors

 

[Why]

Zelus London is all about passionate, focused individuals. If you love what we do and how we do it, apply & join our brand ambassador community to ZL points, Gift Cards, Freebies and Discounts, be the first to hear about new products and earn up to 10% commission for every sale you make! Our brand ambassadors also have opportunity to be featured on our Ambassadors Stories page.

[How]

We’ve teamed up with Brandbassador to offer #ZLclub members the best possible ambassador experience. With their easy to use app, it's never been more fun to be a part of the Zelus community.

To sign up, follow the instructions on our website:

https://www.zeluslondon.com/zl-club/

Promote our campaign as an Brand Ambassador or Referral Partner

If you are interested in promoting our campaign as an ambassador or referral partner, please drop us an email team@zeluslondon.com, you can also join our ambassador programme promote the campaign and win a free Stormbender!

 

Follow Us on Social

https://www.facebook.com/zeluslondon/
https://twitter.com/zeluslondon
https://www.instagram.com/zeluslondon/
https://www.youtube.com/zeluslondon
https://uk.linkedin.com/company/zeluslondon
https://www.pinterest.co.uk/zeluslondon/

 

 

Risks and challenges

We've been developing and manufacturing high-quality men's clothing for the past 4 years. Our suppliers have been our biggest supporters since we started this journey from product templates to manufacturing processes and fabric sourcing and logistics. Of course there are risks that can arise at any moment that may lead to production delays. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce Stormbender in the timescale provided above and have taken all the necessary measures to do so.

We have all the manpower available to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know
story_txt:
Signup for our release news & special offers here. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us via email: team@zeluslondon.com or Whatsapp: +44 7413093772
 
In April 2019, we successfully funded the Nighthawk jacket on both Kickstarter & Indiegogo. After a year of being interrupted by the global pandemic, we are back stronger and ready to bring you something more exciting.
There are countless jackets on crowdfunding platforms that packed with features that customers might or might not need. However we have not come across one single product that is not only functional, but actually fashionable & stylish (i.e. look good).
We decide to change that.
Introducing Stormbender. Designed for city dwellers & travellers who want the extreme versatility, essential utility & waterproof performance, with the best fashionable style possible.


 
Design Thoughts
State-of-the-art storm-bending waterproof performance for all weather conditions, exceptional insulation to keep you warm and protected from the elements.
 

 
Water repellent zippers with additional button-front pad for enhanced storm-seal.
  
 
Skin-like vegan friendly fabric #SynTech, carefully designed at its weight-class to achieve the perfect balance between the best possible waterproof performance and insulation while maintaining a lightweight body for ease-of-carry by city dwellers or outdoor travellers.



 
Convertible extension side zippers to switch between slim fit & lose fit, for freedom of style & comfort of movement.

 

Perfect coat length to strike the balance between style, coverage & comfort of movement.
 

Choose between Bright or Dark Prints: choose between subtly designed reflective bright prints (for enhanced visibility in low light condition):

And dark-print to represent your own classy & understated style:
 
 Essential #ZL signature NFC card pockets for super easy payment during commute.All zippered pockets for maximum security of your daily essentialsRemovable hood for freedom to switch between coat styles   Thoughtfully tailored fit & design for both men and women. We designed 2 different types of fit - with a slight design difference for male and female body types to ensure our customers get their preferred style & familiar sizing. However, we welcome gender-neutrality and welcome our female customers to choose the male fit for a slightly more masculine look & lose style if that's your personal style preference. Superb craftmanship - all designed & handmade by our highly skilled inhouse designers, tailors & craftsmen with over 20 years experience.   PricingWe are a 100% online brand and engage directly & personally with each and every customer of ours, hence you are not paying a penny for any cost associated with a brick and mortar store. This allows us to offer a superior product, with superb customer service at superb pricing that reflects the quality of the piece itself - not the retail markup.  Backer Bonus1. Receiving a "Aegis" Face Mask for FreeEach Stormbender backer will receive an additional bonus item - our inhouse designed & produced face covering - Aegis, a contemporary face mask by ZL.It is a unisex & single size accessory crafted with dual layers of ultra soft, stretchy and breathable fabric. Machine-washable for easy care and features stretch-cotton lining and elastisized loops.You will receive the facemask included in the parcel when it's dispatched. 2. Exclusive 'Backer-Special' Discount CodeEach backer will also receive a unique voucher code for 50% off for all items available in store. The code will be delivered immediately after the campaign ends, if the Stormbender project is successfully funded.3. Gifting option availableWe are also welcome purchases for that special person of yours - your best boy/girlfriend, your best friend, a special family member - we will make sure it's gift wrapped with your personal 'hand-written' note inserted for a special experience for that special person ??  Stretch Goal 1: New ColoursIf we are able to reach our funding goal, every additional 100 units of Stormbender, we are able to unlock the following colours (in this order):
Navy Blue
Midnight Black
Lionheart Burgundy.
Topgun Green
 Stretch Goal 2: RainmakerIf we are able to reach our pleged goal, you will unlock and have the choice to purchase a our super lightweight jacket: Rainmaker - a shorter version of the stormbender, for those who want the minimal version without any compromise of all the essential benefits Stormbender offers. [Product images going live on 18th Oct] Size Chart & How to Measure *NEW* Custom-Made Add-onThanks to valuable customer feedback, we now offer a custom-made add-on. By pledging for an additional Custom-Made add-on, we will provide you with a measurement template in our post campaign survey, you can send us the specific measurement you want and we will make the Stormbender entirely tailored to fit your body or the person you are gifting the jacket for. After campaign ends, you will receive a survey link for you to fill in your measurement details.Measurement Method 1: measure your own body- Sleeve: Measure from the shoulder line to the bottom of the sleeve- Chest: Measure under the arms at the fullest part around the chest/bust horizontally.- Waist: Measure around your waist at the narrowest part- Hips (Sweep): With the feet together measure around fullest part.- Find the most suitable size based on your own experience Measurement Method 2:1. Find a jacket you have that you feel fits you the best2. Measure the below 5 places:- Sleeves- Length- Chest- Waist- Hip (Sweep) - this is the elastic band at the bottom of the jacketFind the closest matching size from the sizing chart:Measurement Method 3:In the survey link, on the "I need help with sizing recommendation" question, select 'Yes', make sure you answer all the questions included in the survey, especially the following items. Alternatively you can reach out to us via team@zeluslondon.com- Height - Weight - Usual T-shirt size and jacket/blazer/coat size- What best to describe your BUILD: e.g. skinny, slim, average, athletic, muscly, larger build- *What best to describe your ARM LENGTH and SHOULDERS: e.g. "I think I have short arms, small shoulders", "I have longer arms than most people, and broad shoulders"- What's your preferred fit: tight fit, slim-fit, regular fit, lose fit, oversized fit- We will then recommend the best fit for you based on your description PLEASE NOTE:The illustration of the above measurement represents the actual measurement of the jacket in each locationJackets are meant to be worn over other layers, so don’t size exactly. You'll need to leave space for wearing additional layers under the jacket, such as a t-shirt and sweater.We will provide further sizing guidelines and examples of different sized people wearing Nighthawk jackets later on which will be sent out towards the end of the campaign.Please don't hesitate to ask if you have a question, we are here to help!  Project Timeline SHIPPING - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll receive a link via Kickstarter for a survey. The survey will ask for size choice. Please ensure this is filled out promptly once the campaign ends to avoid any delays.RETURNS - If you receive a manufacture's defect product, or have received the wrong size, you will have 30 days to request for exchange or refund.You can simply email us via team@zeluslondon.com. Once we have received the returned item and verified its condition, we will refund the initial purchase amount. About ZELUS LONDON™ZELUS LONDON™ is an apparel designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in London, United Kingdom. Taking inspiration from artists and thought leaders like Jiri Thyn, Ido Portal and Alan Watts, the brand stands for simplicity. All our garments are designed to create the perfect balance between function and form. Our popular t-shirts are created with Nanoflex, a bespoke performance fabric made to fit like your own skin, while being soft, stretchy and breathable.After the success of our Nighthawk campaign on both Kickstarter & Indiegogo, we have received positive feedback and recommendations from all around the world. Now we're excited to bring you Stormbender.We have teamed up with expert suppliers globally to craft a new, weatherproof jacket for urban living and lightweight travelling. The features of this jacket are carefully balanced between function and form allowing a tailored style without compromising on protection from the elements.We believe that simplicity has the power to enhance your performance: there’s a reason that Einstein rotated five identical suits and Steve Jobs never deviated from his iconic black turtleneck and jeans. It has been proven again and again that the burden of decision-making wears you down. By minimising lower-order decision-making, energy is conserved for the things that really matter.That's why all our garments are designed as functional, everyday essentials allowing you a minimal wardrobe that doesn't compromise on style or quality.At ZELUS LONDON, we believe that simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication. That’s why we think that Apple’s chief designer, Jonathan Ives, had it right when he said that ‘design is at its best and its most empowering when it simply disappears.’We hope that Stormbender appeals to you, the city dwellers and adventure seekers that it was created for. Your support will allow us to continue to create streamlined, innovative and beautiful clothing, including a women’s line and winter jacket.  Join the #ZLClub - Become Our Brand Ambassadors [Why]Zelus London is all about passionate, focused individuals. If you love what we do and how we do it, apply & join our brand ambassador community to ZL points, Gift Cards, Freebies and Discounts, be the first to hear about new products and earn up to 10% commission for every sale you make! Our brand ambassadors also have opportunity to be featured on our Ambassadors Stories page.[How]We’ve teamed up with Brandbassador to offer #ZLclub members the best possible ambassador experience. With their easy to use app, it's never been more fun to be a part of the Zelus community.To sign up, follow the instructions on our website:https://www.zeluslondon.com/zl-club/Promote our campaign as an Brand Ambassador or Referral PartnerIf you are interested in promoting our campaign as an ambassador or referral partner, please drop us an email team@zeluslondon.com, you can also join our ambassador programme promote the campaign and win a free Stormbender! Follow Us on Socialhttps://www.facebook.com/zeluslondon/https://twitter.com/zeluslondonhttps://www.instagram.com/zeluslondon/https://www.youtube.com/zeluslondonhttps://uk.linkedin.com/company/zeluslondonhttps://www.pinterest.co.uk/zeluslondon/  Risks and challengesWe've been developing and manufacturing high-quality men's clothing for the past 4 years. Our suppliers have been our biggest supporters since we started this journey from product templates to manufacturing processes and fabric sourcing and logistics. Of course there are risks that can arise at any moment that may lead to production delays. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce Stormbender in the timescale provided above and have taken all the necessary measures to do so.We have all the manpower available to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know

story:
The Bag You'll Never Forget




The Design

Co-Create With Us!


What We Need & What You Get?

With your support, we will be able to raise £2000 to purchase high quality materials and manufacture the first ever batch of Nymodig bags.

Any contribution will help us move closer to our goal. Your support would mean the world to us! 

All of our perks are offered at discounted price and with free UK shipping.

Timeline

FAQs

Q: Can the card holder be covered/turned inside to prevent pick-pocketing?

A: Yes definitely. We have not yet finalised our design and we want you to tell us how you want your Nymodig to be. After you contribute, we will send you a survey asking which style, size, colour you think the Nymodig should be. You will have the option to vote for the best design for the card holder (displayed outside, turned inside or with a cover).  

Our Journey

This is a picture of us in the studio of our lovely designer, Tania Sutedja, creating our first Nymodig bag.

We are five friends who met while studying at Cass Business School in London. We love London’s busy lifestyle but often find ourselves struggling to carry around laptops, gym gears, and grocery, especially during hectic rush hours.

So we created products that enable you to zip away the hustle and bustle of life.

In Swedish, ‘Nymodig’ means ‘modern thinking’. We created Nymodig not to be just another bag. Nymodig was inspired by the exhilarating lifestyle of inspiring and dynamic young people of London.

Now we need your support to take this project to the next step.

Don't forget to share our campaign. Help us make Nymodig come to life!

Your support means the world to us!

The Nymodig Team
