story:
Vesper Wallet

The all-new Vesper Wallet is a stylish, classic wallet designed to be tucked into the chest pocket of any suit, offering the appearance of a pocket square.

Story

The first wallets were innovated shortly after the creation of paper currency in the 1600s. Since then, man has been slipping wallets into their pockets. For men who want to strike up a conversation with a brand-new style of wallet and carry their necessities in a new way, Vesper Wallet has been designed. 

The fresh Vesper Wallet breathes new life into a design that has been outdated for years. Men have been spending money on wallets, only to put their money into their wallets and into their back pocket. With the Vesper Wallet, men can still carry their wallets in their back pockets if they choose. If they want something a little different, the all-new Vesper Wallet offers an exciting option. 

The Vesper Wallet is designed to fit into a suit chest pocket and gives the appearance of being a pocket square. To other people, the wallet looks like an accessory of the suit - only the person carrying the wallet knows the truth. The Vesper Wallet offers high quality craftsmanship, premium materials, and a sleek appearance. It also makes for an interesting conversation piece and fashion statement.



Short Summary

Passionate about fashion and design, we wanted to create an everyday accessory with an interesting twist. 
Not easy to achieve as a lot has been done in the Fashion industry. 
The idea of Vesper Wallet came when grabbing my glasses and putting them in the inside pocket of the jacket, then putting the wallet in the outside pocket. It was showing a bit and thought it looked like a pocket square. 
That was it, we had found our twist!

With the support of Indiegogo's community we will be able to take our fashion dream to reality.


What We Need & What You Get

  • After many prototypes, we have secured a partnership with a very talented sewing contractor. The $5,000 funding goal will allow us to meet the minimum production requirement to start Vesper Wallet.
  • Vesper Wallet is manufactured out of microfiber textile; material widely used by top fashion brands and high end car interiors for its leather-like feel and appearance.
  • We have chosen a palette of color that will best complement a full range of apparel.
  • If the goal is not reached, no funds will be collected and we will go back to the drawing board to perfect our product and make sure that it will be successful next time.

The Collection

Your favorite color, you are free to choose.


The Impact

Vesper Wallet will be a great addition to your fashion accessories collection, or a smart gift for a special someone.



Risks & Challenges

  • As a common issue in the manufacturing industries, quality and deadlines can be overlooked. We have set a time frame that will allow us to stay on top of quality control as well as delivery time. 
  • We will verify and package all the Vesper Wallets in house to make sure that your Vesper Wallet is free of defects and matches your expectations.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone will be able to support financially, and even sharing this project with your friends will be of a great help. 
Remember the Indiegogo.com offers Share Tools for a quick and easy way to do so:
  • Copy the campaign URL and paste it into an email or social media update
  • Click on the Facebook, Google Plus or Twitter icons to share through your social media networks 
  • Add a widget to your blog or personal website. Click Embed and then copy and paste the widget code. 
  • Send a direct email from Indiegogo

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you so much for making Vesper Wallet a reality.

story:
QUESTIONS & ANSWERS




English - Deutsch


WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR



Our goal is to simplify daily tasks for users of our products and ideas to make them happier. This goal was the original driver behind our first product Travel-C. Travel-C is smart and simple contact lens container like no other product currently on the market. The product is designed to transport contact lenses as well as a cleaning solution in one compact container. The inconvenient need for carrying around large cleaning solution bottles or the limitations of container size restrictions due to air travel regulations is now a thing of the past (more details can be found in our product video or on our homepage).

It is important that such products are produced and tested to the highest standards to be able to guarantee top quality and a safe application. For us to be able to guarantee this quality and safety, we require a medical accreditation (RL 93/42MDD and FDA), which we can only achieve with your help. Obviously, for you to have some fun investing and also see a return, we would be honored to give you the opportunity to be one of the first users of this new and innovative product – Travel-C! All you have to do is to support us. Thank you!



THE TRAVEL-C IN PINK & BLUE 





S T O R Y S



Situation 1

Hello, my name is Steve and I am from Miami. Today, two of my best friends and I decided to spontaneously go to New York City over the weekend. We will be visiting my cousin Jonathan who just became a father of triplets. I am certain that Jonathan will take care of us and thus don’t need to bring a lot of items on my trip. All I will have to bring is a backpack, which will go through as a carry-on on my flight. Now I am ready, my friends are already waiting in front of my house. I’m just checking my bag one last time to make sure I packed everything and fortunately I saw that I forgot to pack my contact lens solution.

On the way to the airport I get upset because I just thought of the fact that I can’t bring my contact lens solution bottle onto the flight because the bottle is too large. As we know, travelers are only allowed to bring bottles with a maximum content of 100 ml per bottle and unfortunately my bottle contains three times that volume. My friends see that I am upset and ask me for the reason. I explain my frustration and Michael replied with a smile: “Just this morning I bought myself the new Travel-C, which is a device to combine both contact lenses and contact lens solution in a small and compact container. Thus, allowing you to take it with you anywhere you go.” In the mean time even Marcel got his new Travel-C out of his bag to rub it in my face. I elusively watch them how they pose with their product and how they make fun of me.


Situation 2
Hello my name is Amanda and I am from England. I am somewhat messy. I always forget things and often act without thinking. This personality trade has already ended in many disasters. However, this is who I am and my friends and family love me for that.

I have been wearing contacts for about two years now. I also travel a lot and obviously need to take my contacts with me anywhere I go and with my contacts I also have to carry a contact lens container as well as the solution to clean my contacts.

Since this morning I am officially on vacation in Spain to visit one of my good friends. We just spent a phenomenal day together but now I am just exhausted and ready to go to bed. Obviously, I won’t forget to take out my contacts and so I unpack my contact lens solution and am looking for my container. It is unbelievable but again, I most have forgotten my contact lens container at home. This is now the third time this year. My friend goes and gets her purse to show me this thing that looks like lipstick. With a questionable look on my face I open the lipstick just to realize that it is not a lipstick – it is actually a contact lens container in combination with a compartment for contact lens solution. Simply genius. On the stick I see a label called: Travel-C!


Situation 3
Hello my name is Peter and I am from Switzerland. About a year ago I became an entrepreneur and thus I am traveling for my start-up all the time. My business partner Sam is with me for most of these travels. Today, Sam and I are currently in London and we sit in some comfortable armchairs in the lobby of a large enterprise waiting for our sales pitch to start. Sam is scratching his eyes and it looks to me like he is incredibly nervous and doesn’t feel well.

Sam mumbles: “My contacts itch. I think due to the flight my contacts kind of tried up.”

I suggest taking the contacts out and just wearing his glasses. Sam response and says: I can’t – where would I put my contacts in the meantime – like anybody would carry around a contact lens container and the contact lens solution at all times.” With my right hand I grab into my jacket pocket and show him the most compact contact lens container ever invented. Travel-C is exactly the solution for Sam’s problem. One product that Sam can use in situations precisely like the one his in right now.



DONATION PERKS





SPECIFICATIONS

 

TIMELINE



WE SEEK PROVIDERS OF CAPITAL/INVESTORS



To enable us to implement our project, we are seeking a private investor. Have we stimulated your interest, or have you got questions? Then please do not hesitate to  contact us.






English - Deutsch


WAS WIR WOLLEN

Unser Ziel ist es, mit unseren Ideen und Produkten den menschlichen Alltag zu vereinfachen und damit die Anwender unserer Produkte glücklicher zu machen. Deshalb haben wir den Travel-C entwickelt. Der Travel-C ist so smart und einfach wie kein anderes Linsenprodukt. Dieses Produkt ist für das Transportieren von Kontaktlinsen auf Reisen konzipiert worden. Ein lästiges Schleppen von grossen Linsenflaschen oder die Limitierung von Flüssigkeiten für Flugzeugreisen gehören mit dem Travel-C der Vergangenheit an (genauere Details finden Sie in unseren Videos oder auf unserer Homepage). Es ist aber wichtig das solche Produkte nach höchsten Standards geprüft und gefertigt werden, um ein hohe Qualität und ein sicheres Anwenden garantieren zu können. Für diese Qualität benötigen wir eine medizinische Zulassung nach der RL 93/42MDD und FDA die wir nur mit eurer Hilfe erreichen können. Damit das Investieren in diese Projekt auch spass macht und euch auch was bringt, möchten wir euch die Gelegenheit geben die ersten Benutzer dieses genialen Produkts sein zu dürfen. Alles was ihr tun müsst ist uns zu unterstützen. Herzlichen Dank!



ERZÄHLUNGEN



Situation 1
Hallo ich bin Steve und komme aus Miami. Heute mache ich ganz spontan mit meinen besten zwei Freunden Michael und Marcel einen kurzen Ausflug über das verlängerte Wochenende. Wir fliegen zu meinem Cousin Jonathan, der gerade Vater von Drillingen wurde, in New York. Ich weiss, dass wir bei Jonathan alle gut versorgt sind und muss daher nicht viel mitnehmen. Ein Rucksack genügt und für den Flug muss ich nicht einmal ein Gepäck abgeben. Alles wunderbar. Nun bin ich bereit, meine Freunde warten schon vor meiner Haustüre. Ich kontrolliere nochmals kurz ob ich die wichtigsten Dinge eingepackt habe und prompt habe ich tatsächlich beinahe meine Kontaktlinsenmittel vergessen. Ich beeile mich und packe die Flasche mit ein.

Auf dem Weg zum Flughafen fällt mir plötzlich etwas ein, worüber ich mich ärgere. Meine Kontaktlinsenmittel darf ich gar nicht mit ins Handgepäck nehmen. Erlaubt sind nur Flüssigkeiten bis max. 100ml pro Flasche und der Inhalt meiner Flasche beträgt gleich das Dreifache. Meine Freunde bekommen meine schlechte Laune mit und fragen nach dem Grund. Ich erkläre mein Problem und Michael erwidert lachend: "Gerade heute Morgen habe ich mir den Travel-C geholt. Weil damit Kontaktlinsen, Kontaktlinsenmittel- und behälter kompakt miteinander kombiniert sind, kannst du einerseits praktisch nie mehr was davon vergessen und andererseits kannst du es überall mitnehmen." Inzwischen hat auch Marcel seinen Travel-C ausgepackt um es mir unter die Nase zu reiben. Ungläubig schaue ich meinen beiden Freuden zu, wie sie mit Ihrem Produkt posieren und sich über mich amüsieren.



Situation 2
Hallo ich bin Amanda und komme aus England. Ich bin eine kleine Chaotin. Ich vergesse viel und handle oft ohne nachzudenken. Das wurde mir schon oft zum Verhängnis, aber so bin ich eben und meine Freunde und Familie lieben mich so wie ich bin.

Seit zwei Jahren trage ich Kontaktlinsen. Ich bin viel auf Reisen und dann müssen meine Kontaktlinsen natürlich auch mit. Dazu gehören natürlich auch Kontaktlinsenbehälter und Kontaktlinsenmittel.

Ich bin seit heute Morgen im Urlaub in Spanien, wo ich eine gute Freundin besuche. Wir haben gerade einen wundervollen Tag miteinander verbracht. Jetzt bin ich total erschöpft und will nur noch ins Bett. Natürlich vergesse ich nicht vorher meine Kontaktlinsen herauszunehmen…Ich stelle das Kontaktlinsenmittel bereit und suche nach meinem Kontaktlinsenbehälter. Wo zum Teufel sind meine Kontaktlinsenbehälter?! Es ist unfassbar, aber ich habe ihn schon wieder vergessen miteinzupacken. Ich fluche…ich fluche laut. Meine Freundin eilt herbei und ich erkläre ihr, dass ich meinen Kontaktlinsenbehälter vergessen habe. Bereits das dritte mal in diesem Jahr. Meine Freundin greift in ihr Handgepäck und wirft mir
ein Lippenstift zu. Mit fragendem Blick öffne ich es und realisiere, dass es kein Lippenstift ist. Es ist tatsächlich ein Kontaktlinsenbehälter kombiniert mit Kontaktlinsenmittel. Einfach genial! Auf dem Stift finde ich die Aufschrift: Travel-C!



Situation 3
Hallo ich bin Peter und komme aus der Schweiz. Ich habe mich letztes Jahr selbstständig gemacht und bin momentan viel auf Geschäftsreisen. Mein Geschäftspartner Sam ist meistens auch mit dabei. Ich befinde mich jetzt mit Sam in London. Wir sitzen auf einem bequemen Sessel im Warteraum eines grossen Unternehmen bevor das grosse Meeting beginnt. Sam reibt seine Augen. Er scheint nervös zu sein. Wieder reibt er sich seine Augen und ich merke dass er sich nicht wohl fühlt.

Sam murmelt: "Meine Kontaktlinsen kratzen. Ich glaube sie sind durch die Luft im Flugzeug etwas ausgetrocknet und jetzt kratzt es die ganze Zeit".

Ich schlage ihm vor, seine Kontaktlinsen herauszunehmen und eine Brille zu tragen.
Sam antwortet aufgeregt: "Ich kann nicht. Wo soll ich meine Kontaktlinsen aufbewahren? Wer trägt denn eine Flasche Kontaktlinsenlösung und Kontaktlinsebehälter in seinem Anzug mit?" Ich greife mit meiner rechten Hand in meine linken Innentasche meines Vestons und bringe den kompaktesten Kontaktlinsebehälter hervor. Travel-C ist genau die Lösung für das Problem von Sam. Ein Produkt, das Sam in Situationen wie jetzt dringend nötig hat.



KAPITAL/INVESTOREN

Um unser Projekt realisieren zu können, sind wir auf der Suche nach einem privaten Investor. Haben wir Ihre Interesse geweckt oder haben Sie noch Fragen? Dann zögern Sie nicht uns zu kontaktieren.
story_txt:
QUESTIONS & ANSWERS


English - Deutsch

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR



Our goal is to simplify daily tasks for users
of our products and ideas to make them happier. This goal was the original
driver behind our first product Travel-C. Travel-C is smart and simple contact
lens container like no other product currently on the market. The product is
designed to transport contact lenses as well as a cleaning solution in one
compact container. The inconvenient need for carrying around large cleaning
solution bottles or the limitations of container size restrictions due to air
travel regulations is now a thing of the past (more details can be found in our
product video or on our homepage). 

It is important that such products are produced
and tested to the highest standards to be able to guarantee top quality and a
safe application. For us to be able to guarantee this quality and safety, we
require a medical accreditation (RL 93/42MDD and FDA), which we can only achieve with
your help. Obviously, for you to have some fun investing and also see a return,
we would be honored to give you the opportunity to be one of the first users of
this new and innovative product – Travel-C! All you have to do is to support us.
Thank you!THE TRAVEL-C IN PINK & BLUE 
S T O R Y S

Situation 1Hello, my name is Steve and I am from
Miami. Today, two of my best friends and I decided to spontaneously go to New
York City over the weekend. We will be visiting my cousin Jonathan who just
became a father of triplets. I am certain that Jonathan will take care of us
and thus don’t need to bring a lot of items on my trip. All I will have to
bring is a backpack, which will go through as a carry-on on my flight. Now I am
ready, my friends are already waiting in front of my house. I’m just checking
my bag one last time to make sure I packed everything and fortunately I saw
that I forgot to pack my contact lens solution.
On
the way to the airport I get upset because I just thought of the fact that I
can’t bring my contact lens solution bottle onto the flight because the bottle
is too large. As we know, travelers are only allowed to bring bottles with a
maximum content of 100 ml per bottle and unfortunately my bottle contains three
times that volume. My friends see that I am upset and ask me for the reason. I
explain my frustration and Michael replied with a smile: “Just this morning I
bought myself the new Travel-C, which is a device to combine both contact
lenses and contact lens solution in a small and compact container. Thus, allowing
you to take it with you anywhere you go.” In the mean time even Marcel got his
new Travel-C out of his bag to rub it in my face. I elusively watch them how
they pose with their product and how they make fun of me. 
Situation 2Hello my name is Amanda and I am from
England. I am somewhat messy. I always forget things and often act without
thinking. This personality trade has already ended in many disasters. However,
this is who I am and my friends and family love me for that.I have been wearing contacts for about two
years now. I also travel a lot and obviously need to take my contacts with me
anywhere I go and with my contacts I also have to carry a contact lens
container as well as the solution to clean my contacts.
Since
this morning I am officially on vacation in Spain to visit one of my good
friends. We just spent a phenomenal day together but now I am just exhausted
and ready to go to bed. Obviously, I won’t forget to take out my contacts and
so I unpack my contact lens solution and am looking for my container. It is
unbelievable but again, I most have forgotten my contact lens container at
home. This is now the third time this year. My friend goes and gets her purse
to show me this thing that looks like lipstick. With a questionable look on my
face I open the lipstick just to realize that it is not a lipstick – it is
actually a contact lens container in combination with a compartment for contact
lens solution. Simply genius. On the stick I see a label called: Travel-C!
Situation 3Hello my name is Peter and I am from Switzerland.
About a year ago I became an entrepreneur and thus I am traveling for my
start-up all the time. My business partner Sam is with me for most of these
travels. Today, Sam and I are currently in London and we sit in some
comfortable armchairs in the lobby of a large enterprise
waiting for our sales pitch to start. Sam is scratching his eyes and it looks
to me like he is incredibly nervous and doesn’t feel well.
Sam mumbles: “My contacts itch. I think due
to the flight my contacts kind of tried up.” 


I
suggest taking the contacts out and just wearing his glasses. Sam response and
says: I can’t – where would I put my contacts in the meantime – like anybody
would carry around a contact lens container and the contact lens solution at
all times.” With my right hand I grab into my jacket pocket and show him the
most compact contact lens container ever invented. Travel-C is exactly the
solution for Sam’s problem. One product that Sam can use in situations
precisely like the one his in right now.


DONATION PERKS















SPECIFICATIONS  
TIMELINE


WE SEEK PROVIDERS OF CAPITAL/INVESTORS



To enable us to implement our project, we are seeking a private investor.  Have we stimulated your interest, or have you got questions? Then please do not hesitate to  contact us.

English - Deutsch


WAS WIR WOLLEN



Unser Ziel ist es, mit unseren Ideen und Produkten den menschlichen Alltag zu vereinfachen und damit die Anwender unserer Produkte glücklicher zu machen. Deshalb haben wir den Travel-C entwickelt. Der Travel-C ist so smart und einfach wie kein anderes Linsenprodukt. Dieses Produkt ist für das Transportieren von Kontaktlinsen auf Reisen konzipiert worden. Ein lästiges Schleppen von grossen Linsenflaschen oder die Limitierung von Flüssigkeiten für Flugzeugreisen gehören mit dem Travel-C der Vergangenheit an (genauere Details finden Sie in unseren Videos oder auf unserer Homepage). Es ist aber wichtig das solche Produkte nach höchsten Standards geprüft und gefertigt werden, um ein hohe Qualität und ein sicheres Anwenden garantieren zu können. Für diese Qualität benötigen wir eine medizinische Zulassung nach der RL 93/42MDD und FDA die wir nur mit eurer Hilfe erreichen können. Damit das Investieren in diese Projekt auch spass macht und euch auch was bringt, möchten wir euch die Gelegenheit geben die ersten Benutzer dieses genialen Produkts sein zu dürfen. Alles was ihr tun müsst ist uns zu unterstützen. Herzlichen Dank!
ERZÄHLUNGEN

Situation 1Hallo ich bin Steve und komme
aus Miami. Heute mache ich ganz spontan mit meinen besten zwei Freunden Michael
und Marcel einen kurzen Ausflug über das verlängerte Wochenende. Wir fliegen zu
meinem Cousin Jonathan, der gerade Vater von Drillingen wurde, in New York. Ich
weiss, dass wir bei Jonathan alle gut versorgt sind und muss daher nicht viel
mitnehmen. Ein Rucksack genügt und für den Flug muss ich nicht einmal ein
Gepäck abgeben. Alles wunderbar. Nun bin ich bereit, meine Freunde warten schon
vor meiner Haustüre. Ich kontrolliere nochmals kurz ob ich die wichtigsten
Dinge eingepackt habe und prompt habe ich tatsächlich beinahe meine
Kontaktlinsenmittel vergessen. Ich beeile mich und packe die Flasche mit ein. 
Auf dem Weg zum Flughafen
fällt mir plötzlich etwas ein, worüber ich mich ärgere. Meine Kontaktlinsenmittel darf
ich gar nicht mit ins Handgepäck nehmen. Erlaubt sind nur Flüssigkeiten bis
max. 100ml pro Flasche und der Inhalt meiner Flasche beträgt gleich das Dreifache. Meine Freunde bekommen meine
schlechte Laune mit und fragen nach dem Grund. Ich erkläre mein Problem und Michael
erwidert lachend: "Gerade heute Morgen habe ich mir den Travel-C geholt. Weil damit Kontaktlinsen,
Kontaktlinsenmittel- und behälter kompakt miteinander kombiniert sind, kannst
du einerseits praktisch nie mehr was davon vergessen und andererseits kannst du
es überall mitnehmen." Inzwischen hat auch Marcel
seinen Travel-C ausgepackt um es mir unter die Nase zu reiben. Ungläubig schaue ich meinen
beiden Freuden zu, wie sie mit Ihrem Produkt posieren und sich über mich
amüsieren.Situation 2Hallo ich bin Amanda und
komme aus England. Ich bin eine kleine Chaotin. Ich vergesse viel und handle
oft ohne nachzudenken. Das wurde mir schon oft zum Verhängnis, aber so bin ich
eben und meine Freunde und Familie lieben mich so wie ich bin.


Seit zwei Jahren trage ich
Kontaktlinsen. Ich bin viel auf Reisen und dann müssen meine Kontaktlinsen
natürlich auch mit. Dazu gehören natürlich auch Kontaktlinsenbehälter und Kontaktlinsenmittel.



Ich bin seit heute Morgen im
Urlaub in Spanien, wo ich eine gute Freundin besuche. Wir haben gerade einen
wundervollen Tag miteinander verbracht. Jetzt bin ich total erschöpft und will
nur noch ins Bett. Natürlich vergesse ich nicht vorher meine Kontaktlinsen
herauszunehmen…Ich stelle das Kontaktlinsenmittel bereit und suche nach meinem
Kontaktlinsenbehälter. Wo zum Teufel sind meine Kontaktlinsenbehälter?! Es ist
unfassbar, aber ich habe ihn schon wieder vergessen miteinzupacken. Ich fluche…ich
fluche laut. Meine Freundin eilt herbei und ich erkläre ihr, dass ich meinen
Kontaktlinsenbehälter vergessen habe. Bereits das dritte mal in diesem Jahr.
Meine Freundin greift in ihr Handgepäck und wirft mir ein Lippenstift zu. Mit fragendem Blick öffne ich
es und realisiere, dass es kein Lippenstift ist. Es ist tatsächlich ein
Kontaktlinsenbehälter kombiniert mit Kontaktlinsenmittel. Einfach genial! Auf
dem Stift finde ich die Aufschrift: Travel-C!Situation 3Hallo ich bin Peter und komme
aus der Schweiz. Ich habe mich letztes Jahr selbstständig gemacht und bin
momentan viel auf Geschäftsreisen. Mein Geschäftspartner Sam ist meistens auch
mit dabei. Ich befinde mich jetzt mit Sam in London. Wir sitzen auf einem
bequemen Sessel im Warteraum eines grossen Unternehmen bevor das grosse Meeting
beginnt. Sam reibt seine Augen. Er scheint nervös zu sein. Wieder reibt er sich
seine Augen und ich merke dass er sich nicht wohl fühlt. Sam murmelt: "Meine
Kontaktlinsen kratzen. Ich glaube sie sind durch die Luft im Flugzeug etwas
ausgetrocknet und jetzt kratzt es die ganze Zeit".Ich schlage ihm vor, seine
Kontaktlinsen herauszunehmen und eine Brille zu tragen.Sam antwortet aufgeregt:
"Ich kann nicht. Wo soll ich meine Kontaktlinsen aufbewahren? Wer trägt
denn eine Flasche Kontaktlinsenlösung und Kontaktlinsebehälter in seinem Anzug
mit?" Ich greife mit meiner rechten
Hand in meine linken Innentasche meines Vestons und bringe den kompaktesten
Kontaktlinsebehälter hervor. Travel-C ist genau die Lösung für das Problem von
Sam. Ein Produkt, das Sam in Situationen wie jetzt dringend nötig hat.


KAPITAL/INVESTOREN


Um unser Projekt realisieren zu können, sind wir auf der Suche nach einem privaten Investor.  Haben wir Ihre Interesse geweckt oder haben Sie noch Fragen? Dann zögern Sie nicht uns zu kontaktieren.

story:
The Dokdo Tank is a unique experience in owning a personal aquarium.


The Dokdo Tank includes all the necessary equipment and features needed to setup, maintain, and enjoy an aquarium in your home without all the inconveniences and hassles of traditional aquariums.




The Dokdo Tank was designed to be a "smart" aquarium. What do we mean by "smart?"

Smart means we use technology to take the hassle out of managing your aquarium. Using an internet connection you're able to monitor your tank, set schedules, and manage your aquarium's environment from the Dokdo Tank mobile application.

It is a contained ecosystem that can be managed and maintained with just a few adjustments to the water level and filtration. The smart capability allows for a fun and easier way to stay updated on your aquarium.

The best part about the Dokdo Tank is that everything is included in the box. There's no need to buy parts and equipment from various vendors; Dokdo Tank has it covered.



        

       The video below shows a 2 year timespan for            which 200 clown fish were born and bred in the                                        Dokdo Tank. 


This is a school of clown fish being raised in the Dokdo Tank over a two-year period, and the water in the aquarium was never changed. We just added water when necessary to the water supply box, added activated carbon once a month and 1 bacteria ampule once a month.

Want to know more about how the Dokdo Tank can do this? The following sections provide a bit more information to help you understand why the Dokdo Tank is a "smart" aquarium.




The system sump was designed for an easier and simpler way to keep and maintain your aquarium's filtration system. All you have to do is occasionally pull out the filtration media, dump, rinse then place it back where it was. Refilling the filtration media is also as simple as taking it out, filling it up, then placing it back!


The Dokdo Tank's System Sump uses three types of filtration: biological, physical, and chemical. Below is an overview of each filtration system used in the System Sump.


Biological Filtration

 There are good bacteria and bad bacteria in aquariums. The purpose of the System Sump is to make sure that the bad bacteria are removed while allowing the good bacteria to thrive.

The System Sump uses porous filter media and bacteria amplifiers to achieve biological filtration. Want to know more about the porous filter media and bacteria amplifiers? Just look below.


Prodibio Startup amplifiers help fish adapt quickly when new water is added to the Dokdo Tank or when you first setup your Dokdo Tank. These amplifiers contain over 50 billion good bacteria that help your fish survive in their new environment.

 

Substrat Pro is developed by EHEIM, and is a top of the line biological filter. The filter helps break down excrement while allowing organic matter to pass through. A surface area of 450m2 per liter enables countless bacteria to live inside your aquarium and help it stay clean.

 



Physical Filtration

 

The System Sump also uses a nano-protein skimmer to create lots of tiny bubbles.  Our patented technology improves upon the traditional spike impeller by producing a greater amount of nano-bubbles.

The benefits of these improvements allows your aquarium's water to be more fully aerated and causes more impurities to be filtered out of your aquarium.

However, when using fresh water in the Dokdo Tank, the nano-protein skimmer is only able to provide aeration for your aquarium but not any form of physical filtration.


Chemical Filtration

Using activated carbon, the System Sump's chemical filtration process is able to keep the aquarium's water transparent and clear by removing impurities from the water. Chemical filtration through activated carbon also helps to remove any bad smells from the aquarium by eliminating unwanted and possibly toxic bacteria.



Managing aquariums comfortably through biological, physical, and chemical filtration raises the survival rate of living organisms by maintaining optimal water quality.


Don't forget that all the filtration needed for the Dokdo Tank is included!







Lighting

The Reef Monster's lighting provides a number of different color variations by allowing you to control the brightness and temperature of the lights. Through a combination of these two elements you are able to create the perfect conditions for your aquarium and an atmosphere that suits your aquarium's needs.

The Reef Monster's lighting is 50% more efficient than traditional aquarium lighting because it uses a 168-watt Cree LED lighting array.



Because of the Cree lighting array, you are able to adjust the Reef Monster's lights between 5,000 to 20,000 Kelvin. This enables you to create a natural lighting environment similar to the one found in various depths of the world's oceans. 


▲ Displays the various light wavelengths the Reef Monster can generate across the color spectrum to suit your aquarium's specific needs.




▲ Adjusting the lights using motion with the Dokdo Tank Mobile App



The TIR lenses used in the Reef Monster offer enhanced permeability. These lenses further diffuse the LEDs, enhancing the lighting to a more natural state.


The Reef Monster's Cooling System


The Reef Monster uses a heat dissipation system that expels hot air while it simultaneously intakes cool air from the outside.



Monitoring and Management


The Dokdo Tank is "smart" because of the technology built into the Reef Monster. With an optional sensor (up to 5 may be connected at a time) you can monitor and manage your aquarium's temperature, pH (acidity), ORP (oxidation reduction potential), DO (dissolved oxygen), and nitrates.

◀ The Reef Monster's touchscreen controller.


The Dokdo Tank uses a 24 gallon / 85 liter Low Iron Crystal Glass tank chosen for its clarity and visibility. The joints of the Low Iron Crystal Glass tank are secured with durable silicone joints.
The Low Iron Crystal Glass used in the Dokdo Tank gives you a front-row view into the underwater world you've created in your aquarium with the highest clarity and visibility.

◀ General glass has a greener tint and may distort the colors and view of your aquarium. Low Iron Crystal Glass provides a colorless view with optimal clarity improving your experience in enjoying your aquarium's beauty.








You can monitor and manage your smart aquarium using the Dokdo Tank Mobile App.





Monitoring


Check the status of your aquarium with the Dokdo Tank mobile app to stay updated on the aquarium's environment.

              ▲ Aquarium Status                                                             ▲ Lighting Status


                

                  ▲ Sensor Graph


Management

Adjust your aquarium's lighting, temperature and brightness, using your device's touchscreen or with a simple motion.


                 ▲ Kelvin Controller                                                       ▲ Brightness Controller


            

          ▲ Light / Wave Scheduler


You will be able download the Dokdo Tank Mobile App here:




Help support us by choosing a perk on the right. You can get a Dokdo Tank Smart Aquarium for a limited time starting at $499 as an Indiegogo EARLY BIRD SPECIAL ONLY.


Risks and Challenges:

Creator Lee Jun Sang developed the Dokdo Tank to be able to give people a new experience in having their very own fish tanks. With a deep passion and love for aquarium's himself, Jun Sang hopes to give a better understanding of the complex nature of marine life and home aquariums by using new technologies and simplifying the difficulties of common aquarium systems.

By bringing imagination into reality, Dokdo Tank strives to give you the opportunity to learn about aquariums by giving you a platform simple and easy enough for anyone to maintain.

Dokdo Tank team have been working side-by-side with experts to create and design the first all-in-one smart aquarium system. With dedication and support we've created a truly unique product that makes owning an aquarium enjoyable and less of a hassle.

During our time in as a start up business we were able to map out a manufacturing process and secure international shipping at a very reasonable rate of $80. As an Indiegogo special, we decided to provide free shipping for all perk packages!

While we've been successful up to this point we need you to help us reach the finish line. As you help us complete our journey we know that some unexpected issues may arise so we want you to know that we've got your back. Give us your support so we can give you the best possible experience in bringing nature into your home. 

If you have any problems with the Dokdo Tank please feel free to contact us. You'll have a direct connection to our team, and we'll do everything we can to correct any problems you have and listen to any feedback.

We know being an early adopter can be a bit stressful so we're doing our part to ease you into the joys of owning an aquarium.


Where will the funds go?

All contributions will go towards the production and delivery of the Dokdo Tank as well as refining the mobile application and improving any kinks based on feedback from the community.


Why do we need your help?

We have worked diligently bringing the Dokdo Tank to life, but need some help manufacturing, shipping, and making improvements. With your contributions we'll be able to produce the first smart all-in-one aquarium. 


Frequently Asked Questions:

Q. What connections are on the back of the Reef Monster?

A. The Reef Monster has five (5) sensor connectors, a main power input, 2 power outputs (for future add-ons), an RJ-45 Ethernet input, and a USB input.

Q. What type of data is the Reef Monster collecting about my aquarium?

A. The Dokdo Tank is able to collect data about your aquarium’s temperature, pH, ORP, DO, and nitrates. This information is only collected if you have the appropriate sensor connected to the Reef Monster.

Q. What tools are required to put the Dokdo Tank together?

A. No tools are required to put the Dokdo Tank together. The users manual will provide all the instructions you need to setup your smart aquarium.

Q. What types of fish can live in the Dokdo Tank?

A. The Dokdo Tank supports fish and other organisms for both fresh water and saltwater.

Q. How often do I need to change components/materials in the Dokdo Tank?

A. The only thing that needs to be replaced in the Dokdo Tank is the activated carbon. Changing the activated carbon once every month will keep your water clean by absorbing out impurities preventing cloudiness. With the 1 kg of activated carbon included in the Dokdo Tank’s standard package will last up to a year.
Adding one bacteria ample per month will provide the highest water quality.

Q. When do I have to change the water in my Dokdo Tank?

A. We designed the Dokdo Tank to change water less frequently, but simply add water to the supply box when needed. Under some circumstances, such as beginners who only wish to start with a few fish and live rock/coral, there is no need to change the water. Since water evaporates you will need to add 1-2 liters of water daily to the water supply box located on the top of the System Sump. the system has an embedded ATO reservoir and can top up evaporated water automatically. For the best results, changing the water by 10-15% once a month is recommended, but not required.

Q. What if I need a replacement part for my Dokdo Tank?

A. We’re working on a warranty plan for the Dokdo Tank and will provide an update once we have a warranty to share. In the mean time you may contact us with any problems or issues you have.

Q. How is the Dokdo Tank different from other aquariums?

A. The Dokdo Tank is an all-in-one unit. What do we mean by “all-in-one?”

 *  Everything you need to get started comes in the box

*  There’s no need to buy any other pieces of equipment

*  We provide a free application to help you monitor your aquarium

The Dokdo Tank was made for any person with no experience to a lot  of experience to be able to use right away with no other components necessary. Although the sensors will provide the highest quality of ease and simplicity through the use of our app, the comprehensive manual will provide instructions and planned settings for the Dokdo Tank to provide a thriving marine ecosystem without the sensors.

Q. What else do I need to use the Dokdo Tank?

 A. Depending on the type of aquarium (fresh or salt) and fish you want to have changes the needs for any fish/living organisms. The manual included in the box will help you make such choices and you may customize your tank to the way you prefer with decorations such as rock or sand with the best outcomes for your the environment you wish to have.Most fish tend to live in temperature conditions ranging from 20 to 30 degrees Celsius (68 to 86 degrees Fahrenheit), therefore, owner's who live in harsher conditions of heat or cold in their home may need to have a heating or cooling system to match such conditions.

Q. How many fish can I have in my Dokdo Tank?

A. As seen in the video above, the Dokdo Tank was capable of breeding 200 clown fish for 2 years showing the efficiency and capacity of its filtration system, however, as fish get bigger, Darwin's theory of the survival of the fittest takes place and the smaller/weaker fish will inevitably start to be out competed by larger fish as is true in nature. Therefore, the recommended capacity of fish for is 10 for them to strive and survive for a long healthy life. 

Q. How to keep my Dokdo Tank clean and functioning properly?

 A. The only manual labor that is needed to keep the Dokdo Tank clean is emptying out the collection cup for the protein skimmer once a week and  wiping down the algae build-up on the glass for visibility (leaving the algae on the glass may be undesirably for visuals, but it is actually good for your fish tank so wipe at your own discretion!)

Q. How do I set up the Dokdo Tank?

 1) Open the box and take out the parts
2) Connect the Reef Monster and System Sump together
3) Place the sand and desired decorations (live rock, etc.) into the tank
4) Gently add the water to the tank so the sand and decorations stay put then   
     turn the return motor.
5) Add the bacteria ample into the tank's water then turn on the LED lighting once
     every 8 hours.
6) Wait 2 weeks until adding any fish into the tank
7) Choose which environment you want to have and you are all set!

The purpose of the System Sump is to make sure that the bad bacteria are removed while allowing the good bacteria to thrive.The System Sump uses porous filter media and bacteria amplifiers to achieve biological filtration. Want to know more about the porous filter media and bacteria amplifiers? Just look below.



Prodibio Startup amplifiers help fish adapt quickly when new water is added to the Dokdo Tank or when you first setup your Dokdo Tank. These amplifiers contain over 50 billion good bacteria that help your fish survive in their new environment.



 




Substrat Pro is developed by EHEIM, and is a top of the line biological filter. The filter helps break down excrement while allowing organic matter to pass through. A surface area of 450m2 per liter enables countless bacteria to live inside your aquarium and help it stay clean.



 



Physical Filtration



 


The System Sump also uses a nano-protein skimmer to create lots of tiny bubbles.  Our patented technology improves upon the traditional spike impeller by producing a greater amount of nano-bubbles.
The benefits of these improvements allows your aquarium's water to be more fully aerated and causes more impurities to be filtered out of your aquarium.
However, when using fresh water in the Dokdo Tank, the nano-protein skimmer is only able to provide aeration for your aquarium but not any form of physical filtration.




Chemical Filtration



Using activated carbon, the System Sump's chemical filtration process is able to keep the aquarium's water transparent and clear by removing impurities from the water. Chemical filtration through activated carbon also helps to remove any bad smells from the aquarium by eliminating unwanted and possibly toxic bacteria.









Managing aquariums comfortably through biological, physical, and chemical filtration raises the survival rate of living organisms by maintaining optimal water quality.

Don't forget that all the filtration needed for the Dokdo Tank is included!








Lighting
The Reef Monster's lighting provides a number of different color variations by allowing you to control the brightness and temperature of the lights. Through a combination of these two elements you are able to create the perfect conditions for your aquarium and an atmosphere that suits your aquarium's needs.
The Reef Monster's lighting is 50% more efficient than traditional aquarium lighting because it uses a 168-watt Cree LED lighting array.








Because of the Cree lighting array, you are able to adjust the Reef Monster's lights between 5,000 to 20,000 Kelvin. This enables you to create a natural lighting environment similar to the one found in various depths of the world's oceans. 








▲ Displays the various light wavelengths the Reef Monster can generate across the color spectrum to suit your aquarium's specific needs.


▲ Adjusting the lights using motion with the Dokdo Tank Mobile App



The TIR lenses used in the Reef Monster offer enhanced permeability. These lenses further diffuse the LEDs, enhancing the lighting to a more natural state.

The Reef Monster's Cooling System



The Reef Monster uses a heat dissipation system that expels hot air while it simultaneously intakes cool air from the outside.

Monitoring and Management

The Dokdo Tank is "smart" because of the technology built into the Reef Monster. With an optional sensor (up to 5 may be connected at a time) you can monitor and manage your aquarium's temperature, pH (acidity), ORP (oxidation reduction potential), DO (dissolved oxygen), and nitrates.








◀ The Reef Monster's touchscreen controller.








The Dokdo Tank uses a 24 gallon / 85 liter Low Iron Crystal Glass tank chosen for its clarity and visibility. The joints of the Low Iron Crystal Glass tank are secured with durable silicone joints.

The Low Iron Crystal Glass used in the Dokdo Tank gives you a front-row view into the underwater world you've created in your aquarium with the highest clarity and visibility.








◀ General glass has a greener tint and may distort the colors and view of your aquarium. Low Iron Crystal Glass provides a colorless view with optimal clarity improving your experience in enjoying your aquarium's beauty.





















You can monitor and manage your smart aquarium using the Dokdo Tank Mobile App.








Monitoring

Check the status of your aquarium with the Dokdo Tank mobile app to stay updated on the aquarium's environment.

              ▲ Aquarium Status                                                             ▲ Lighting Status



                
                  ▲ Sensor Graph


Management

Adjust your aquarium's lighting, temperature and brightness, using your device's touchscreen or with a simple motion.


                 ▲ Kelvin Controller                                                       ▲ Brightness Controller

            
          ▲ Light / Wave Scheduler

You will be able download the Dokdo Tank Mobile App here:













Help support us by choosing a perk on the right. You can get a Dokdo Tank Smart Aquarium for a limited time starting at $499 as an Indiegogo EARLY BIRD SPECIAL ONLY.



Risks and Challenges:
Creator Lee Jun Sang developed the Dokdo Tank to be able to give people a new experience in having their very own fish tanks. With a deep passion and love for aquarium's himself, Jun Sang hopes to give a better understanding of the complex nature of marine life and home aquariums by using new technologies and simplifying the difficulties of common aquarium systems.
By bringing imagination into reality, Dokdo Tank strives to give you the opportunity to learn about aquariums by giving you a platform simple and easy enough for anyone to maintain.
Dokdo Tank team have been working side-by-side with experts to create and design the first all-in-one smart aquarium system. With dedication and support we've created a truly unique product that makes owning an aquarium enjoyable and less of a hassle.
During our time in as a start up business we were able to map out a manufacturing process and secure international shipping at a very reasonable rate of $80. As an Indiegogo special, we decided to provide free shipping for all perk packages!
While we've been successful up to this point we need you to help us reach the finish line. As you help us complete our journey we know that some unexpected issues may arise so we want you to know that we've got your back. Give us your support so we can give you the best possible experience in bringing nature into your home. 
If you have any problems with the Dokdo Tank please feel free to contact us. You'll have a direct connection to our team, and we'll do everything we can to correct any problems you have and listen to any feedback.
We know being an early adopter can be a bit stressful so we're doing our part to ease you into the joys of owning an aquarium.

Where will the funds go?
All contributions will go towards the production and delivery of the Dokdo Tank as well as refining the mobile application and improving any kinks based on feedback from the community.

Why do we need your help?
We have worked diligently bringing the Dokdo Tank to life, but need some help manufacturing, shipping, and making improvements. With your contributions we'll be able to produce the first smart all-in-one aquarium. 
Frequently Asked Questions:
Q. What connections are on the back of the Reef Monster?
A. The Reef Monster has five (5) sensor connectors, a main power input, 2 power outputs (for future add-ons), an RJ-45 Ethernet input, and a USB input.
Q. What type of data is the Reef Monster collecting about my aquarium?
A. The Dokdo Tank is able to collect data about your aquarium’s temperature, pH, ORP, DO, and nitrates. This information is only collected if you have the appropriate sensor connected to the Reef Monster.
Q. What tools are required to put the Dokdo Tank together?
A. No tools are required to put the Dokdo Tank together. The users manual will provide all the instructions you need to setup your smart aquarium.
Q. What types of fish can live in the Dokdo Tank?
A. The Dokdo Tank supports fish and other organisms for both fresh water and saltwater.
Q. How often do I need to change components/materials in the Dokdo Tank?
A. The only thing that needs to be replaced in the Dokdo Tank is the activated carbon. Changing the activated carbon once every month will keep your water clean by absorbing out impurities preventing cloudiness. With the 1 kg of activated carbon included in the Dokdo Tank’s standard package will last up to a year.Adding one bacteria ample per month will provide the highest water quality.
Q. When do I have to change the water in my Dokdo Tank?
A. We designed the Dokdo Tank to change water less frequently, but simply add water to the supply box when needed. Under some circumstances, such as beginners who only wish to start with a few fish and live rock/coral, there is no need to change the water. Since water evaporates you will need to add 1-2 liters of water daily to the water supply box located on the top of the System Sump. the system has an embedded ATO reservoir and can top up evaporated water automatically. For the best results, changing the water by 10-15% once a month is recommended, but not required.
Q. What if I need a replacement part for my Dokdo Tank?
A. We’re working on a warranty
plan for the Dokdo Tank and will provide an update once we have a warranty to
share. In the mean time you may contact us with any problems or issues you
have.
Q. How is the Dokdo Tank different from other aquariums?
A. The Dokdo Tank is an all-in-one
unit. What do we mean by “all-in-one?”
 *  Everything you need to get started comes in the box
*  There’s no need to buy any other pieces of equipment
*  We provide a free application to help you monitor your aquarium
The Dokdo Tank was made for any person with no experience to a lot  of experience to be able to use right away with no other components necessary. Although the sensors will provide the highest quality of ease and simplicity through the use of our app, the comprehensive manual will provide instructions and planned settings for the Dokdo Tank to provide a thriving marine ecosystem without the sensors.
Q. What else do I need to use the Dokdo Tank?
 A. Depending on the type of aquarium (fresh or salt) and fish you want to have changes the needs for any fish/living organisms. The manual included in the box will help you make such choices and you may customize your tank to the way you prefer with decorations such as rock or sand with the best outcomes for your the environment you wish to have.Most fish tend to live in temperature conditions ranging from 20 to 30 degrees Celsius (68 to 86 degrees Fahrenheit), therefore, owner's who live in harsher conditions of heat or cold in their home may need to have a heating or cooling system to match such conditions.
Q. How many fish can I have in my Dokdo Tank?
A. As seen in the video above, the Dokdo Tank was capable of breeding 200 clown fish for 2 years showing the efficiency and capacity of its filtration system, however, as fish get bigger, Darwin's theory of the survival of the fittest takes place and the smaller/weaker fish will inevitably start to be out competed by larger fish as is true in nature. Therefore, the recommended capacity of fish for is 10 for them to strive and survive for a long healthy life. 
Q. How to keep my Dokdo Tank clean and functioning properly?
 A. The only manual labor that is needed to keep the Dokdo Tank clean is emptying out the collection cup for the protein skimmer once a week and  wiping down the algae build-up on the glass for visibility (leaving the algae on the glass may be undesirably for visuals, but it is actually good for your fish tank so wipe at your own discretion!)
Q. How do I set up the Dokdo Tank?
 1) Open the box and take out the parts
2) Connect the Reef Monster and System Sump together
3) Place the sand and desired decorations (live rock, etc.) into the tank
4) Gently add the water to the tank so the sand and decorations stay put then         turn the return motor.
5) Add the bacteria ample into the tank's water then turn on the LED lighting once     every 8 hours.
6) Wait 2 weeks until adding any fish into the tank
7) Choose which environment you want to have and you are all set!

story:
Meet Huge MOTO

We’re building a custom motorcycle for the rest of us. One that has the fit and finish of stock and yet still keeps the factory geometry in order to retain performance, handling and reliability.

Our kit is for any average enthusiast to build in their garage with standard tools--one that doesn't require any welding skills or specialized equipment.

You won't find other custom kits on the market for modern sportbikes that can match our style or meet our fit and finish.



Features

Huge MOTO Levers w/ Integrated Turn Signals


Huge MOTO Dual-bulb Headlight


Huge MOTO Solo Tail w/ Integrated Brake & Turn Signals


Our Full kit includes:

  • Huge MOTO levers
  • Huge MOTO tail
  • Huge MOTO headlight
  • Huge MOTO Bikini Fairing
  • Ignition relocation mount
  • Speedometer relocation mount
  • Mounting hardware
  • Installation instructions

What do I need to build your kit?

  • A 2008 or later model Honda CBR1000RR 

  • Common tools (you know, sockets, screwdrivers, and such)

  • Some basic wiring skills -- the tail requires relocation of factory components such as the fusebox and voltage regulator, connecting the turn signals and tail light, while the headlight and levers require rewiring low and high beam and connecting turn signals.

  • The desire to own a truly unique ride

    Note: Our complete kit comes with a mount to relocate the ignition. Once relocated the existing triple clamp needs to be modified (cut) or replaced with an aftermarket unit to remove the factory ignition guard. 


Our Mission

We have the desire and the drive to bring our unique vision to market. We want to empower the enthusiast to build their own custom bike and the personal satisfaction that comes with it.

We’re seeking funding to manufacture our first production run of CBR kits and we need your help. This campaign is our launch platform to try to achieve our dream of designing and manufacturing custom motorcycle components -- at the same time allow us to gauge interest and demand. We want to know if there’s a market for kits such as this. The response has been fantastic and a lot of people have demonstrated their support telling us: build it, and we will buy it!

We need your support in the form of pre-orders for our complete kit or individual custom components, as well as contributions.



Perks








Our Story

We’re two guys with a passion for motorcycling. Two guys that happen to have experience with design, rapid prototyping, technology and a need for speed. 

Rewind to 2004. Bill and Sumner are both licking wounds from ending relationships and become roommates in an industrial loft space in the heart of San Francisco’s SOMA. Sumner had a bike. Bill didn’t. Not someone to sit around, it didn’t take Bill long to change that.

Their first build wasn’t planned at all. Bill got his hands on an early model Kawasaki ZX7 that Sumner purchased back in the 90s. The bike was used for city transportation mainly and it quickly became a crime statistic after it “grew feet” and disappeared on one fateful evening. While dismayed and disappointed, Bill found solace in a replacement bike only to have to bike returned as a theft recovery months later. Gone was the perfect bodywork, the ignition had been punched out and the bike had never seen worse days.

Fast forward a couple of years to Sumner’s garage and the ZX-7 has been collecting dust. Bill has an idea for a naked urban sportbike and Sumner starts working on it. When the two realize that there was no elegant way to chop the tail using the existing subframe and factory parts -- Bill set off to design a one-off futuristic seat that would replace the stock seat and heavy tail section of the ZX-7. Huge MOTO was beginning to take shape and the innovative features of the Kawasaki would later be highlighted online by many websites. Here’s where the demand and research began. 

The next build would be approached with a more refined methodology. With an eye on sales numbers (we’d only look at bikes readily available on the secondary market), the search for a modern sportbike with an attractive frame and engine began. The Honda CBR turned out to be the perfect platform to build on. It has the beautifully engineered frame, a hundred and sixty horsepower, and available ABS. Bill dove into the bike’s design even going as far as completely modeling the entire bike in CAD. The fit and finish are factory-level and create a custom bike that looks and feels like it came of the Honda assembly line.


The Huge MOTO Team

Bill Webb

Before being the co-founder of a successful design consultancy in San Francisco, Bill worked as creative director for one of the top design firms, collaborating with some of the biggest consumer electronics brands and boldest tech startups to deliver award-winning product design. Prior to that, he gained the perspective of driving innovation from the inside, working for design-forward companies such as Motorola, Palm computing and Samsung Electronics (where he won several awards and even has a patent to his name to boot!). Needless to say, Bill has the proven experience to deliver sophisticated design solutions guided by strong design intuition -- readily apparent in his bike designs. When he’s not knee-deep in CAD programs or out riding, you can find him jogging through the Marina or enjoying time with his daughter.

Bill has been featured in various publications on the subject of motorcycle and industrial design:

Articles:

  • Featured Creative Rider: Bill Webb, Huge Design - PAGNOL-MOTO
  • Bike of the Day #38: Honda CBR1000rr by Huge MOTO - Urban Motoculture
  • Channelling Tron: The Ultimate Cafe Fighter Kit - Bike EXIF
  • Transform Your Honda CBR1000RR into a Modern Custom with HUGE MOTO    - HighSnobiety
  • Now You Can Transform Your Honda CBR1000RR into HUGE MOTO'S Newest Sci-Fi Streetfighter - Lanesplitter
  • 4 Myths About Silicon Valley Industrial Designers - Fast Company
  • Turn your CBR1000rr into a "cafe fighter" - Bike EXIF
  • This Kit will Transform Your Honda CBR into a Sci-Fi Street Fighter - Lanesplitter
  • Ninja 750 by Huge Design - Bike EXIF
  • BEHIND THE DESIGN: How Bill Webb Re-Imagined the Kawasaki Ninja - Motomucci
  • Designing JIBO. Subtracting the Obvious and Adding the Meaningful - Jiboblog

Books:

  • Featured in The Ride - 2nd Gear : New Custom Motorcycles and Their Builders

Sumner Burkart

With 29 years riding experience, Sumner is no stranger to two wheels. With an educational background in business and computer science, he’s got 25 years experience as an IT consultant for industry leaders such as VMware, EMC and PricewaterhouseCoopers. When he’s not busy riding and building bikes, he enjoys geeking out on hobbies such as 3D modeling, building 3d printers from scratch, or getting outside on his fixie or kiteboard.


Risks & Challenges

Our greatest risk is simply not enough demand. If we achieve our campaign goal, we're moving forward. We’ve done the leg work and have a solid manufacturing plan and schedule. Our suppliers are standing by.

If we don't reach our goal, all proceeds will be returned.


I don't ride, how else can I help?

Not a motorcyclist? No inclination to build your own custom but still love our designs? Don’t worry, you can still help! We need folks to get the word out. Social Media is our friend and IndieGogo has the share tools you can use to get our kit out there. We’ll be sure and give you a virtual high-five.

story:
Introducing The Blango a supersoft blanket with loose sleeves and feet pocket. A lightweight, but warm fleece blanket.


One day a friend of mine came to me and said he would really love to have a blanket that he could wear and walk around in. One that keeps him warm and gives him mobility. So after searching the blanket market, we came to the conclusion that the current wearable blankets did not meet those requirements. We had a few other people try the blankets and they came to us with the same complaints. They wanted their feet and back to be warm but they also wanted to walk around in it.

       So we changed and improved the design and came up with The Blango.

We made sure you retain the use of your hands while walking and that The Blango would not drop from your shoulders once you lean forward and, finally, that your feet are warm and cosy.



With an easy to use button system, our blanket gives you 100% freedom to  walk around

It was not that easy to find a way to move while still retaining the use of your hands. We didn't want that people would feel like they are dragging around this lump of cloth in order to move. We want you to still be able to hold on things while moving. Our button system gives you this opportunity.

                          Your feet are kept warm in a comfy pocket.

The Feet pocket is very comfy and it keeps the feet enjoyably warm.We’ve encountered the problem of cold feet when sitting behind the desk, working on this project. Everywhere, except the feet, was nicely covered and warm. We know there are a lot of people who work at home night or day for many hours. Winter can be very cold and especially the closer you are near the ground the colder it gets


                                 Your neck is completely covered.

This feature is one of my favorites, nothing feels better than the feeling of warmth around your neck.


Why you should try our product:

Your hands are free to read a book on your porch or while working on the computer or tablet behind  your desk.
Take your Blango with you to the beach where you can watch the sunset in total warmth.
You can take it with you on Ski holidays and drink your hot chocolate milk outside next to a campfire!

                                             

Choose your color:

                                                           Bordeaux

                                                        


                                                             Dark marine blue

                                                        


                                                  blue with hearts

                                              





FAQ:

What is Blango made of? Our blankets are made of fleece fabric. This material is generally lightweight yet breathable, which means air can flow through easily. It is often preferred over wool because it's lighter. Also people may find themselves becoming itchy when they wear wool, but usually don’t have such a reaction to wearing garments made from this handmade type of textile.

What size do you have? One size fits all. We decided to go for one size but don’t rule out other sizes in the future. We’d like to see what the demands are and based on that we will make new sizes.

Is the Blango unisex? Yes, it's for both men and women.

Will there be other colors in the future? Yes

When can we expect our Blango's? We have put september for our first backers as delivery date. But we strongly believe this can be sooner. We will work our best to make it faster.

Are you planning on making changes in the future? We’re always looking for new challenges and ways to innovate in order to make things more comfortable for our costumers. We definitely hope to bring new ideas in the future


A big thanks to Bilal Senel (www.bilodegand.be) for our coming soon website: www.blangoblanket.com

Video production: Grégoire Muriel

Finally all the people who supported us for launching this campaign.

                                                           Bordeaux 

                                                         
                                                             Dark marine blue 


                                                         

                                                  blue with hearts


                                               


FAQ:
What is Blango made of? Our
 blankets are made of fleece fabric. This material is generally 
lightweight yet breathable, which means air can flow through easily. It 
is often preferred over wool because it's lighter.
 Also people may find themselves becoming itchy when they wear wool, but
 usually don’t have such a reaction to wearing garments made from this 
handmade type of textile.
What size do you have? One size fits all. We decided to go for one size but don’t rule out other sizes in the future. We’d like to see what the demands are and based on that we will make new sizes. 
Is the Blango unisex? Yes, it's for both men and women. 
Will there be other colors in the future? Yes
When can we expect our Blango's? We have put september
 for our first backers as delivery date. But we strongly believe this 
can be sooner. We will work our best to make it faster.
Are you planning on making changes in the future? We’re always looking for new challenges and ways to innovate in order to make things more comfortable for our costumers. We definitely hope to bring new ideas in the future

A big thanks to Bilal Senel (www.bilodegand.be) for our coming soon website: www.blangoblanket.com
Video production: Grégoire Muriel
Finally all the people who supported us for launching this campaign.

story:
We love the particular…
We love real leather…
We love “the way we used to do things”…
We love Italian craftsmanship…


These four points led us to create goods for the present with an eye to the past. We want to create products that give feelings, we leave to others the cold synthetic, it’s not our world, we want the charm of nature, we want to catch your eyes.

We are Wolecraft

And here below our latest product:

| Byron |


The most organized way to carry.

Byron is a customizable carryall designed to satisfy the needs of a diverse range of lifestyles and professions thanks to magnetic spines that accommodate modular Inserts. Byron includes the Insert of your choice designed for unique storage needs. The interior of the Byron includes organization for tablet, phone, pens, glasses, cards, cash, notebook, small items, open compartments, and cords.

Clean and minimal lines. The finest materials. The best craftsmanship. The right price without any intermediate passage.

From us to you.

This is what we believe in.


Our Leather

We use only full grain vegetable tanned leather it's the most expensive leather as it is made from the top layer of the cow hide. It does not have a synthetic leather coating (as usual in cheaper leathers). It retains all of the texture of the original hide and is therefore flexible and more durable.

This also means that each piece of leather is unique as unique will be every our single product we'll deliver to you.

Vegetable tanning is an artisan tradition and deeply rooted for generations from our tuscan leather tannery. Our leathers come exclusively from a tannery that belongs to "The Genuine Italian Vegetable-Tanned Leather Consortium"  founded in 1994 by eleven Tuscan tanneries.

Consortium Website

Through this consortium we can give you the best vegetable tanned leather.

Nearly forty days are actually needed to transform raw hides into unique vegetable-tanned leathers. All the cowhides we use are a by-product of the food industry.
Vegetable-tanned leather absorbs the traces of our living, it matures, gets softer and darker depending on your lifestyle and how you use your product. The natural ageing does not compromise its resistance and gives it a vintage look with warm colour shades showing evidence of being a natural product.

We love it and we think you will too.

Our Wool Felt

We source the different types of wool we use in our products from all over Europe.

100% wool, whether it's woven or felt.

It gives protection with a soft touch.

There are two different Inserts you can choose.

The Travel Insert and the Everyday Insert.

Every Insert can be used separately from the main body. Take off your insert, fold it and fix it with the elastic band on the side. In 10 seconds you have a smaller carryall at your service.

Everyday Insert

  • Measures: 22 cm H x 17 cm W | 8,66" H x 6,69" W
  • Made in vegetable tanned leather and 100% wool felt
  • 3 magnetic snaps allow to change the Insert easily and fast, they are 100% safe with your electronic devices and will have zero negative affects on your gear
  • Large pouch with YKK Excella zip closure
  • Elastic band that allows the Insert to be used separately from the Byron
  • Multiuse leather strip with metal snap
  • Small pouch for your passport, cards, cash or notes
  • Interchangeable between the Byron and the Byron Pro



Travel Insert

  • Measures: 22 cm H x 17 cm W | 8,66" H x 6,69" W
  • Made in vegetable tanned leather and 100% wool felt
  • 3 magnetic snaps allow to change the Insert easily and fast, they are 100% safe with your electronic devices and will have zero negative affects on your gear
  • Elastic band that allows the Insert to be used separately from the Byron
  • Large pouch with YKK Excella zip closure
  • Diagonal cut with seams that transform the right side of the Insert in a big pouch useful to store all the small intems you need during a trip
  • Interchangeable between the Byron and the Byron Pro



Byron

with Travel Insert or Everyday Insert

Classic (light brown) / Cigar (dark brown) / River (petrol)

Super Early Bird: 159$. Get 1 Byron with Travel Insert or 1 Byron with Everyday Insert at the same price. Save 111$ or 133$ (future retail prices 270$ and 292$).

Early Bird Byron with Travel Insert: 169$. Save 101$ (future retail price 270$).

Early Bird Byron with Everyday Insert: 185$. Save 107$ (future retail price 292$).

Indiegogo special price Byron with Travel Insert: 189$. Save 89$ (future retail price 270$).

Indiegogo special price Byron with Everyday Insert: 205$. Save 87$ (future retail price 292$).


Measures: 28,5 cm H x 21,5 cm W | 11,22" H x 8,5" W

Premium Italian vegetable tanned leather

100% wool felt lining

YKK Excella zip closure

3 magnets to fix Travel or Everyday Insert

Pouch for the phone

3 slots for cards

Straps with metal snaps for cords, earphones, etc.

Distinctive handmade stitch under the logo

Can fit: Apple iPad Air, Apple iPad Mini, Amazon Fire, Kindle E-Reader, Nexus 9, Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 & 10.5 etc…





Byron Pro

with Travel Insert or Everyday Insert

Classic (light brown) / Cigar (dark brown) / River (petrol)

Super Early Bird: 189$. Get 1 Byron Pro with Travel Insert or 1 Byron Pro with Everyday Insert at the same price. Save 123$ or 152$ (future retail prices 312$ and 341$).

Early Bird Byron Pro with Travel Insert: 199$. Save 113$ (future retail price 312$).

Early Bird Byron Pro with Everyday Insert: 219$. Save 122$ (future retail price 341$).

Indiegogo special price Byron Pro with Travel Insert: 219$. Save 93$ (future retail price 312$).

Indiegogo special price Byron Pro with Everyday Insert: 239$. Save 102$ (future retail price 341$).

Measures: 34 cm H x 25 cm W | 13,38" H x 9,85" W

Premium Italian vegetable tanned leather

100% wool felt lining

YKK Excella zip closure

3 magnets to fix Travel or Everyday Insert

Pouch for phone

6 solts for cards

Straps with metal snaps for cords, earphones, etc.

Distinctive handmade stitch under the logo

Can fit: iPad Pro, MacBook, MacBook Air 11", Surface 3, Asus Transformer, HP Stream 11, Lenovo Mix 2, Acer Aspire Switch, etc.



Card Holder

Classic (light brown) / Cigar (dark brown) / River (petrol)

Indiegogo special price Card Holder: 45$. Save 25$ (future retail price 70$).


Measures: 9,7 cm H x 7 cm W | 3,8" H x 2,7" W

Premium Italian vegetable tanned leather

100% wool felt separator that creates two pockets for cash and cards




Here we are with an opportunity to win another Byron for you, one of your friend, your mom or everyone you prefer...

The road to become a super backer:

- 1 -

Log in to Indiegogo and get your custom link (use the button in the upper right of the campaign page)

- 2 -

Share the link with your friends, family & people on social media, email or blog it.

- 3 -

When peolple visit and buy using your link what happens?

For every 3 referrals you'll get a Byron with Travel Insert in your colour choice

For every 6 referrals you'll get a Byron Pro with Travel Insert in your colour choice


We need your help. We need your passion.

We are nothing without all of you!!

For this reason we have decided to give away 3 complete sets ( Cord Folder in all 3 colours) of our Cord Folder in a social media contest.

Here what you have to do in order to partecipate at our contest:

- 1 -

Repost in Facebook, Twitter or Instagram with the ashtag #holdbyron one of the pictures you can find at this link: Byron's pictures

- 2 -

Tag two of your friend that may be interested in our campaign

- 3 -

Follow one of our social pages

Instagram: @wolecraft

Facebook: Wolecraft

Twitter: @wolecraft

- 4 -

At the end of the campaign we'll announce the 3 lucky winners through our social pages


Thank you!!!

We have decided to launch a fixed funding campaign because the only possibility to maintain affordable prices with high quality standards is to enter in a scale economy. It would be impossible without reaching the minimum amount of the campaign.

If we don't reach our goal we won't get funded and no one will get his Byron. So please share with your family and friends!


FAQ:

How do I select a color?

At the end of the campaign we'll send you a survey to collect all the informations we need.

Are colors exactly as they appear here?

We tried to show the colors as accurate as possible. Consider that our leather is vegetable tanned. It's the best and natural leather you can find around. Every piece is different from the ather. These differences will make your product unique.

How long would it take to get my product?

Since we are working with the best tanneries and our products are handmade by skilled artisans, manufacturing takes more time than regular mass production. We estimate shipping by May 2016.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kevin Bullington and I am a geek.

I am also a bench jeweler with over fifteen years experience in the jewelry and gemstone industry. I was raised by an artist and an engineer and I have decided the time has come to bring custom-designed, unique, high-end jewelry pieces to other geeks, cosplayers, members of the steampunk community, and anyone and everyone else who has ever loved a comic book, a superhero movie, or British TV show.

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for a total of $150,000.

While I realize this may sound like a lot, understand that this covers the entire start up cost of a manufacturing space, an office, an online store, and a fully functional website for a minimum of one year, possibly more. 

This will allow me to provide you with state of the art manufacturing techniques including rapid prototyping with the use of a 3D printer and will keep the prices for my merchandise at an absolute minimum because I will not have to outsource any of my manufacturing needs to a third party.

This will also allow me to provide you with a direct input into the design and manufacturing process through the use of modern design software and production technology.

The Impact

This is my life's dream. To be not only self-employed in a field I love and I am passionate about but also to provide people in the same sorts of cultural communities I myself participate in with the highest level of quality and expertise.

In other words, I love what I do for a living and I love being a geek.

And I want to bring my passion and my joy to everyone around me.

Risks & Challenges

Starting a business is not easy. There are taxes to pay, equipment to buy and, for good or ill, competitors. There are jewelry stores and custom designers who have more experience than me, have been in business longer, and have larger and more well-established customer bases. And I will have to compete with them.

But none of them have the passion and the drive that I have to provide each of my clients with a unique piece of jewelry that they can own and display in full knowledge that not one other person has anything even like it.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, I understand. Thank you, anyway. Thank you for stopping here and taking the time to read my proposal. If you want to help, please spread the word. Tell your friends. There are many tools available here on Indiegogo to help you help me.
