story:
At Emerton Scott we belieive a few things are important when buying a new watch.

Firstly, you need to love how your watch looks 

It needs to be so comfortable to wear, you never want to take it off 

It needs to be priced without huge mark ups from retailers, wholesalers distributers 

Lastly, your watch should be unique and personal to you

  

Sound too good to be true? Well let us tell you how we’re going to do it!

 

 

       

For over 2 years, we have been perfecting our concept and designing the two collections we are offering our supporters and the fellow Indiegogo community today.

We take our inspiration from everywhere, but we didn't want to be like other watch companies in the sense that they want to 'change the watch industry by making things cheaper'. We focus on creating the perfect experience, using high quality materials and providing our customers with a high quality timepiece that they can genuinely wear for years and never get bored of. 

We'd be lying if we said it had been easy. Juggling our day jobs with staying up until 3 in the morning most nights, just to get things done. Scott ended up saving money he was spending on rent, to move back home and sleep on his parents couch, just so he had money to help fund refined prototypes  so we could get the end product as perfect as humanly possible. 

       

With a focus on quality and precision throughout our design process, we partnered directly with world leading manufacturers who have experience hand crafting timepieces for some of the most prestigious watch companies in the world. From the first time we contacted them, it took us over a year for them to actually take us seriously. But after pestering them with phone calls and countless emails, we managed to get them on board.

Emerton Scott watches are crafted from the highest grade of stainless steel on the market, ensuring maximum durability and a long lasting polish that will stand the test of time. Each collection has been specifically designed to fit perfectly on any wrist, to ensure the upmost comfort whilst worn.

Reserving your watch isn't a purchase; it is an investment. Upon placing your order, your watch will be handmade by an expert watch maker and then engraved with your unique message on the rear casing of your watch.

Each and every watch is individually quality checked once crafted. Once it has passed all required tests, it will be packaged and sent directly to you.

We're so confident in the fact you'll love your Emerton Scott, if it arrives and you don't like it, we'll give you a full refund straight away.

We've worked far too hard on delivering these two new collections and thinking about every little aspect of  making your experience as enjoyable as possible. 

 

For anyone who is new to crowd funding or just wants to know why it's been so popular the last few years. Crowdfunding gives small brands the opportunity to reach millions of open minded people and connect with them, by presenting a unique offering. 

For anyone who is new to crowd funding or just wants to know why it's been so popular the last few years. Crowdfunding gives small brands the opportunity to reach millions of open minded people and connect with them, by presenting a unique offering. 

The benefits for the brand or company are simple. They get exposure and are able to generate funds by allowing supporters to back their project and receive a product in return (often at a highly discounted price).

 

 

The best thing from a potential backers perspective is they get to secure a product at a price which is as close to cost price as you can get. 

Retailers add on various additional costs and obviously have higher overheads than a new company, demand a higher profit to fund growth and also often mark up their products just because it looks good in a shop window. So unfortunately those costs are passed down to the customer. That's you...

Crowd funding doesn't only allow you to support new and exciting up and coming businesses. It can also help you secure a product, that has been obsessed over and cared for, at a far more reasonable price than the mass produced products made by bigger brands and sold in pretty windows.

 

As a company, our passion is centred around making our customers experience with us as personal and unique as possible. We aren't in the game to compete on price, although we do still want to be reasonable. We want to show people how the experience of buying & owning a watch should be. 

 

 

To make your piece even more special and unique, we have a fantastically talented engraver that we met during our trip to Basel World 2015. His passion for personalisation and creating beautiful lettering on the back of timepieces and other items grew on us, and we have been working with hi ever since.     

             

So what makes Emerton Scott so different from other watch companies? After all, there's thousands to choose from, so what makes us so special?

Well first of all, we look at things a little differently. 

Since the beginning, we've always thought the experience of receiving and opening your new watch for the first time should be memorable & special. With our luxury packaging and attention to detail, we are confident you will remember the moment you receive your Emerton Scott watch for years to come.

 

Our presentation case not only acts as the perfect solution for showcasing your new watch, but it can also be completely emptied and used as a jewellery box. Making sure our packaging is reusable was very important to us, firstly in regards to the environment and also for practical reasons.

It's these little thoughts and details that has helped us stand out with our previous collection. We don't like to under promise and then over deliver. We are very confident in our work; so we like to over promise, and then use this pressure to drive us to further exceed your expectations.

               

 

 

              

Case - 38mm in diameter & 9mm in height

Case Material - 316L stainless steel 

Movement - Miyota Cal. 9015 Automatic (24 Jewels)

Glass - Sapphire coated crystal with anti-scratch finish

Dial - Multi-layered & gridded with hand applied indices

Strap - Italian Hirsch or vegetable tanned leather 

Strap Size - 20mm, which fits 14 - 23cm wrists perfectly

Available Strap Colours - Chestnut Brown, Black Onyx, Royal Blue, Deep Burgundy, Emerald Green, Oxford Brown

Buckle -  Stainless steel pin buckle

Warranty – 3 Years

Water Resistance - 100m/10atm

 

 

 

              

Case - 30mm in diameter & 7mm in height

Case Material - 316L stainless steel

Movement - Ronda 705 Quartz Movement (5 Jewels)

Glass - Sapphire coated crystal with anti-scratch finish

Dial - Multi-layered with printed

Strap - Italian Hirsch or vegetable tanned leather

Strap Size - 16 mm, which Fits 11 - 20 cm wrists perfectly

Available Strap Colours - Chestnut Brown, Black Onyx, Royal Blue, Deep Burgundy, Emerald Green, Oxford Brown

Buckle - Stainless steel pin buckle

Warranty – 3 years premium

Water Resistance - 50m/5atm

                 

It really is simple - to secure your own limited edition watch simply select the reward with how many watches you'd like to reserve.

We will work on a first come first serve basis. The first who back us will have first choice for both designs.

But don't worry about that until our campaign is finished - you will choose both your design and inscribed message later.

          

We've had a ton of enquires asking if our watches will be available to be under trees by Christmas. This got us thinking; how can we give our customers the opportunity to gift someone an Emerton Scott watch for Christmas while our watches are still being hand made?

Our solution was simple. We have prepared personalised Gift Certificates posted in elegant 110gsm white envelops, wax sealed and wrapped in bespoke branded ribbon. 

Every backer who chooses the CHRISTMAS EARLY BIRD perk will be sent a gift certificate. The recipient will then choose their watch from our designs; and once their watch is finished, we will deliver for free of charge.

              

               

       

We've been planning and perfecting these collections for 2 years. It's been a long road with plenty of challenges and lessons learnt. We've already successfully ordered, shipped and delivered hundreds of our previous Es.1 Quartz collection all around the world, so we're confident in every aspect of how to get your watch to you in perfect condition and on time.

               

 

          

​

Over the past two years, we've gathered valuable feedback from customers who invested in our first Es.1 collection.

 

This has helped us understand what people really look for, not only in the watch, but in the experience as a whole. We listened carefully to what they had to say.

This is what a handful of them thought :

 

We have hundreds of emails from current and new customers every week. We know there may be questions you may need to ask, or details you'd like to know more about. 

If in the case we don't quite make our funding goal, please don't worry. Everyone will be automatically refunded and we will go back to the drawing board. But the case is, whatever happens, we will get our new collection on your wrist one way or another, we can personally promise you that. All we ask is for you to have beleif in us.

If you have any thing at all you'd like to ask or discuss, please contact either myself or our support team by emailing us at support@emertonscott.com

We will be doing everything we can to answer everyone as quickly as possible, so pop us an email and we'll get in touch as soon as we can.

​From me, Craig, Robi and everyone else who's dedicated time to bring this project to life; thank you so much for your time looking through our campaign and we look forward to you joining us on this amazing journey.
story_txt:
At Emerton Scott we belieive a few things are important when buying a new watch.Firstly, you need to love how your watch looks It needs to be so comfortable to wear, you never want to take it off It needs to be priced without huge mark ups from retailers, wholesalers distributers Lastly, your watch should be unique and personal to you  Sound too good to be true? Well let us tell you how we’re going to do it!         For over 2 years, we have been perfecting our concept and designing the two collections we are offering our supporters and the fellow Indiegogo community today.We take our inspiration from everywhere, but we didn't want to be like other watch companies in the sense that they want to 'change the watch industry by making things cheaper'. We focus on creating the perfect experience, using high quality materials and providing our customers with a high quality timepiece that they can genuinely wear for years and never get bored of. We'd be lying if we said it had been easy. Juggling our day jobs with staying up until 3 in the morning most nights, just to get things done. Scott ended up saving money he was spending on rent, to move back home and sleep on his parents couch, just so he had money to help fund refined prototypes  so we could get the end product as perfect as humanly possible.        With a focus on quality and precision throughout our design process, we partnered directly with world leading manufacturers who have experience hand crafting timepieces for some of the most prestigious watch companies in the world. From the first time we contacted them, it took us over a year for them to actually take us seriously. But after pestering them with phone calls and countless emails, we managed to get them on board.Emerton Scott watches are crafted from the highest grade of stainless steel on the market, ensuring maximum durability and a long lasting polish that will stand the test of time. Each collection has been specifically designed to fit perfectly on any wrist, to ensure the upmost comfort whilst worn.Reserving your watch isn't a purchase; it is an investment. Upon placing your order, your watch will be handmade by an expert watch maker and then engraved with your unique message on the rear casing of your watch.Each and every watch is individually quality checked once crafted. Once it has passed all required tests, it will be packaged and sent directly to you.We're so confident in the fact you'll love your Emerton Scott, if it arrives and you don't like it, we'll give you a full refund straight away.We've worked far too hard on delivering these two new collections and thinking about every little aspect of  making your experience as enjoyable as possible.  For anyone who is new to crowd funding or just wants to know why it's been so popular the last few years. Crowdfunding gives small brands the opportunity to reach millions of open minded people and connect with them, by presenting a unique offering. For anyone who is new to crowd funding or just wants to know why it's been so popular the last few years. Crowdfunding gives small brands the opportunity to reach millions of open minded people and connect with them, by presenting a unique offering. The benefits for the brand or company are simple. They get exposure and are able to generate funds by allowing supporters to back their project and receive a product in return (often at a highly discounted price).  The best thing from a potential backers perspective is they get to secure a product at a price which is as close to cost price as you can get. Retailers add on various additional costs and obviously have higher overheads than a new company, demand a higher profit to fund growth and also often mark up their products just because it looks good in a shop window. So unfortunately those costs are passed down to the customer. That's you...Crowd funding doesn't only allow you to support new and exciting up and coming businesses. It can also help you secure a product, that has been obsessed over and cared for, at a far more reasonable price than the mass produced products made by bigger brands and sold in pretty windows. As a company, our passion is centred around making our customers experience with us as personal and unique as possible. We aren't in the game to compete on price, although we do still want to be reasonable. We want to show people how the experience of buying & owning a watch should be.   To make your piece even more special and unique, we have a fantastically talented engraver that we met during our trip to Basel World 2015. His passion for personalisation and creating beautiful lettering on the back of timepieces and other items grew on us, and we have been working with hi ever since.                  So what makes Emerton Scott so different from other watch companies? After all, there's thousands to choose from, so what makes us so special?Well first of all, we look at things a little differently. Since the beginning, we've always thought the experience of receiving and opening your new watch for the first time should be memorable & special. With our luxury packaging and attention to detail, we are confident you will remember the moment you receive your Emerton Scott watch for years to come.

 
Our presentation case not only acts as the perfect solution for showcasing your new watch, but it can also be completely emptied and used as a jewellery box. Making sure our packaging is reusable was very important to us, firstly in regards to the environment and also for practical reasons.It's these little thoughts and details that has helped us stand out with our previous collection. We don't like to under promise and then over deliver. We are very confident in our work; so we like to over promise, and then use this pressure to drive us to further exceed your expectations.                               Case - 38mm in diameter & 9mm in heightCase Material - 316L stainless steel Movement - Miyota Cal. 9015 Automatic (24 Jewels)Glass - Sapphire coated crystal with anti-scratch finishDial - Multi-layered & gridded with hand applied indicesStrap - Italian Hirsch or vegetable tanned leather Strap Size - 20mm, which fits 14 - 23cm wrists perfectlyAvailable Strap Colours - Chestnut Brown, Black Onyx, Royal Blue, Deep Burgundy, Emerald Green, Oxford BrownBuckle -  Stainless steel pin buckleWarranty – 3 YearsWater Resistance - 100m/10atm                 Case - 30mm in diameter & 7mm in heightCase Material - 316L stainless steelMovement - Ronda 705 Quartz Movement (5 Jewels)Glass - Sapphire coated crystal with anti-scratch finishDial - Multi-layered with printedStrap - Italian Hirsch or vegetable tanned leatherStrap Size - 16 mm, which Fits 11 - 20 cm wrists perfectlyAvailable Strap Colours - Chestnut Brown, Black Onyx, Royal Blue, Deep Burgundy, Emerald Green, Oxford BrownBuckle - Stainless steel pin buckleWarranty – 3 years premiumWater Resistance - 50m/5atm                 It really is simple - to secure your own limited edition watch simply select the reward with how many watches you'd like to reserve.We will work on a first come first serve basis. The first who back us will have first choice for both designs.But don't worry about that until our campaign is finished - you will choose both your design and inscribed message later.          We've had a ton of enquires asking if our watches will be available to be under trees by Christmas. This got us thinking; how can we give our customers the opportunity to gift someone an Emerton Scott watch for Christmas while our watches are still being hand made?Our solution was simple. We have prepared personalised Gift Certificates posted in elegant 110gsm white envelops, wax sealed and wrapped in bespoke branded ribbon. Every backer who chooses the CHRISTMAS EARLY BIRD perk will be sent a gift certificate. The recipient will then choose their watch from our designs; and once their watch is finished, we will deliver for free of charge.                                    We've been planning and perfecting these collections for 2 years. It's been a long road with plenty of challenges and lessons learnt. We've already successfully ordered, shipped and delivered hundreds of our previous Es.1 Quartz collection all around the world, so we're confident in every aspect of how to get your watch to you in perfect condition and on time.                          ​Over the past two years, we've gathered valuable feedback from customers who invested in our first Es.1 collection. This has helped us understand what people really look for, not only in the watch, but in the experience as a whole. We listened carefully to what they had to say.This is what a handful of them thought : We have hundreds of emails from current and new customers every week. We know there may be questions you may need to ask, or details you'd like to know more about. If in the case we don't quite make our funding goal, please don't worry. Everyone will be automatically refunded and we will go back to the drawing board. But the case is, whatever happens, we will get our new collection on your wrist one way or another, we can personally promise you that. All we ask is for you to have beleif in us.If you have any thing at all you'd like to ask or discuss, please contact either myself or our support team by emailing us at support@emertonscott.comWe will be doing everything we can to answer everyone as quickly as possible, so pop us an email and we'll get in touch as soon as we can.​From me, Craig, Robi and everyone else who's dedicated time to bring this project to life; thank you so much for your time looking through our campaign and we look forward to you joining us on this amazing journey.

story:
About us

My name is Grant and I'm the owner of P&G Apparel.

We've all been there: you’re wearing your favourite, most comfortable trousers, you kneel down and *rrrriiiiipppppp!* - they split straight down the middle! Most people who train are restricted to shorts as you often need to go into a danger zone where a rip is likely.

I bring to you the ultimate training bottoms. With these, you can do those lunges, wide squats and any awkward movements without having to worry. These training bottoms are designed to move and flex in the vulnerable areas.

This means that on those cold mornings at the gym or local park, you won't need to wear your shorts. Be warm, be comfy.

The products available from P&G

 

The ultimate joggers

 

So why do I make this bold statement?

Here we have a super comfy, light weight material, that still keeps you warm

on cold mornings. It has a stretchy fabric to soak up all of the strain that would cause other garments to split or break.

Currently we are planning to make red, grey, blue and white joggers.

 

T-shirts

Our t-shirts are made from high quality cotton, for a super comfortable top, which is warm enough to wear as often as you like.

Our standard shirt features our embroidered logo and is currently available in our standard colours of white, black, blue, and red.

We have slogan shirts and the marble collection coming on 1st April this year.

 

Backpack

These are super limited (100 only) and super tidy!

A versatile and fashionable backpack with our logo embroidered on it, available in grey.

These will otherwise be launched on the 1st of May 2017.

 

Snapback hat

Our snapbacks are also limited to 100, so you’d better be quick!

A high quality hat, embroidered with our logo, which will be available in light and dark grey. Also launching on 1st May 2017!

All our items are shipped in the fastest possible way!

 

What stage are we at with development?

We are now at the prototype stage with the joggers.

I don't currently have a physical sale product. The prototype in the video has been created to demonstrate the versatility of the product and how it works.

We have a confirmed supplier for our clothing range.

If we reach our funding targets at an early point in the campaign then we will upload images of the real products for you.

As soon as we have the product in stock you will be informed.

What if I have any questions...?

Please feel free to contact at any time, through any of the means below:

Facebook @painapparel

Twitter @pandgapparel

Instagram @pandgapparel

Email pandgapparel@gmail.com

We will answer your queries as soon as possible, we would love to hear your comments.

story:
The Problem: 

Noise-induced hearing loss is on the rise as our world grows louder. 

Concerts, sports events, races and even the workplace can expose us to unsafe noise hazards, loud enough to require hearing protection. There’s one problem, the options for cool, fun, and safe hearing protection are few and far between, and no earplugs allow for customization. 

This is where OTOGEAR comes in:

Our Product

OTOGEAR is a patent pending modern earplug attachment that is changing the face of hearing protection. OTOGEAR's are fully customizable and interchangeable, allowing you to style your hearing protection for any occasion. We are proud to say that OTOGEAR is a green product as OTOGEAR attachments are molded out of post-consumer and post-production recycled plastic. 

OTOGEAR’s goal is to provide a fun and safe listening experience. To do this we ensure that all earplugs included with our patent pending OTOGEAR Earplug Attachments meet OSHA, NIOSH, and MHSA safety standards. We also test each earplug to make sure they are comfortable and fit perfectly with the OTOGEAR Attachment. Finally, you are guaranteed an American made product, as our manufacturing plant is located in Vancouver Washington.

12 Blue and Green

 

Our Mission

OTOGEAR's mission is to create a new generation of hearing protection users by making hearing protection fun to wear. 

Blinging In Your Ears

 

Notable Mentions:  

OTOGEAR won 3rd in the OSHA, NIOSH and MSHA Hear and Now innovation challenge 

Featured on Geekwire

Featured on the NIOSH/CDC blog 

Madeline receiving award from the Secretary of the Department of Labor Chris Lu

What We Need:

We are in need of $10,000.00 to help launch OTOGEAR into the market and produce educational materials that encourage hearing safety. The great news is, we’ve finalized our tooling and produced our first run of OTOGEARs. The money raised will assist us in taking the next step, and go into full production once we reach our funding goal.

  • Begin work on international patents

  • Pay for initial materials cost

  • Produce our first run of pad printed/decorated OTOGEARS 

  • Bring OTOGEAR to the marketplace

 

What do you get? 

  • You get to protect your ears in style when you contribute enough to get your first pair of OTOGEARS
  • If you contribute $100.00 or more you will be thanked publicly on our social media pages
  • If you Contribute $500.00 or more you will be thanked on our social media pages as well as being featured in our VIP contributor group on our website. 
  • If you contribute $6,500 you will get 1,000 pairs of your very own custom designed OTOGEARS. 

American Dream

 

The Impact

According to the World Health Organization, more than 1 billion people worldwide are at risk of noise-induced hearing loss. Noise-induced hearing loss is preventable with hearing protection, yet there is a negative stigma that deters people from wearing protection. To get rid of the stigma, you must find a way to make hearing protection easy, accessible, affordable, fun, and cool to wear.

By making hearing protection stylish the negative stigma of wearing earplugs at concerts and the risk of noise-induced hearing loss will decrease. OTOGEAR makes hearing protection an extension of one’s personality rather than an eyesore.  Our dream is to create the next generation of hearing protection users.

 

How Do They Work?

OTOGEAR's are easy to assemble. Just slip the included earplug into the cavity inside the OTOGEAR. Push until earplug is fully inserted into the OTOGEAR. Once OTOGEAR's have earplugs inserted, you no longer have to handle the earplugs. Making it a more sanitary way to insert and take out hearing protection. 

 

To insert in the ear, lift ear with one hand and hold the edge of the OTOGEAR to place earplug into ear canal like you would a normal earplug with the other hand. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always a few risks and challenges in creating a new, innovative product.

First, finding a U.S. based manufacturing facility so that we could oversee the production and quality of our OTOGEAR attachments was extremely important to us, even if it meant that our production cost would be slightly higher. We are proud to say that OTOGEAR attachments are Made in America! Our manufacturers are located in Vancouver, WA - less than 15 minutes away from our headquarters!

Video of our 1st batch of OTOGEAR's being molded!
 

We care about the environment and want to decrease the amount of waste created. To do this we made sure our manufacturers used post-consumer as well as post-production recycled plastics. 

Plastic Recycler at Plastics Northwest

Second, we searched high and low to find the right fabricator to source the hearing protection (ear plugs) included with each pair of OTOGEARs. Not only did we find high-quality earplugs that meet multiple safety organization standards, they are comfortable and reusable!

Third, Education! Turning around the negative stigma of wearing hearing protection and educating the public on hearing loss prevention is necessary. People of all ages are at risk of developing hearing loss due to unsafe, repeated exposure to damaging sound levels from personal audio devices, noisy sporting events, entertainment venues, construction and industry. Hearing loss can be prevented and that’s where OTOGEAR can help by making hearing protection safe, fun and fashionable. 

We are excited that the World Health Organization (W.H.O.) is currently running their “Make Listening Safe” campaign highlighting the necessity for hearing protection not just in the U.S.A. but throughout the world. OTOGEAR is committed to take hearing conservation to the next level, by offering a clever solution to the rising problem of noise-induced hearing loss. 

Our manufacturers are prepped and ready. Our tooling is finished. Our first production run of 1,000 OTOGEARs have been produced and waiting to be customized and printed. We need your help in bring OTOGEAR to market and to produce educational materials that encourage hearing safety. With your support, together, we can change the face of hearing protection, plus you may even get a sweet pair of OTOGEARs in the process!

First batch of Silver OTOGEARS finished!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute but still want to help? Follow our Social Media Page's and spread the word! The more people we have sharing our story the more likely our dream of creating a new generation of hearing protection users can come true!

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Linked In

 

Design Options

OTOGEAR 1.0 (Design Option 1)

American Dream (Design Option 2)

Blinging in Your Ears (Design Option 3)

12 Blue and Green (Design Option 4)

12 Black and White (Design Option 5)

Prototype Images

Blank Silver Production Prototype 

Blank Red Production Prototype

Blank Black Production Prototype

Blinging In Your Ears" Production Prototype

 

 

Thanks you for checking out our Indiegogo campaign! 

We are so grateful to all our friend, family, and contributors who have lent their time, mentorship and support to get us this far! We couldn’t have done it without you. Go Team OTOGEAR!

story:
Wawe are t-shirts engineered and designed to look better and feel better. We want our T-shirt to be an investment – something you can wear again and again. Something that won’t just endure, but actually gets more comfortable with each wash and wear.
Fashionable. Modern. Stylish. Our t-shirts provide you with a way to show support for an incredibly important cause while remaining fashion-forward. No matter what t-shirt you choose, our unique, expertly crafted designs will help you stand out from the crowd.
They are insanely soft and you’ll find they’re a comfortable, perfect fit. We’ve partnered with a factory that not only has fantastic working conditions, but also makes clothes for some of the world’s top clothing brands.

available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL

We’ve gone into great depth at every part of the production process to make sure that we’re using the absolute best materials and factories possible. We investigated factories all around the world to ensure the highest possible production quality for our T-shirts. In the end we chose Germany – home to the same factories used by some of the world’s most prominent clothing brands.

Wawe is not a one-man show. There’s a team supporting us who is just as convinced of our mission like us.





Why Indiegogo:

- To launch a new website, with better functionality and user experience (such as filters to find your size/style, social media connections, and a mobile-friendly version)

- Better product photography and content (think hyper-zoom to see the quality of fabrics and colors)

- To change fulfillment centers for faster shipping and better customer service (real-time inventory updates as well as shipping tracking and confirmation)

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page where you can choose your sizes, colors, and styles.

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends


Risks and challenges

We pride ourselves in delivering the best products to you on time, but everything isn’t always in our control, like shipping times. As a result, there might be slight delays that we cannot prevent. We will always do our absolute best to avoid such delays and will keep you posted if we ever find out that such a delay exists. For customized t-shirts, if a submitted design cannot be printed exactly as is, we will work with you to sort everything out and ensure that you are 100% satisfied before printing.

If you have questions we did not answer in our FAQ or you'd like a press kit to help spread the word please contact us at:spungik@gmail.com

We’ve partnered with a factory that not only has fantastic working conditions, but also makes clothes for some of the world’s top clothing brands.



available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL




We’ve gone into great depth at every part of the production process to make sure that we’re using the absolute best materials and factories possible. We investigated factories all around the world to ensure the highest possible production quality for our T-shirts. In the end we chose Germany – home to the same factories used by some of the world’s most prominent clothing brands.


Wawe is not a one-man show. There’s a team supporting us who is just as convinced of our mission like us.























Why Indiegogo:
- To launch a new website, with better functionality and user experience (such as filters to find your size/style, social media connections, and a mobile-friendly version)
- Better product photography and content (think hyper-zoom to see the quality of fabrics and colors)- To change fulfillment centers for faster shipping and better customer service (real-time inventory updates as well as shipping tracking and confirmation)



At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page where you can choose your sizes, colors, and styles.
Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends


Risks and challenges
We pride ourselves in delivering the best products to you on time, but everything isn’t always in our control, like shipping times. As a result, there might be slight delays that we cannot prevent. We will always do our absolute best to avoid such delays and will keep you posted if we ever find out that such a delay exists. For customized t-shirts, if a submitted design cannot be printed exactly as is, we will work with you to sort everything out and ensure that you are 100% satisfied before printing.

If you have questions we did not answer in our FAQ or you'd like a press kit to help spread the word please contact us at:spungik@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

What makes this company different than any other is ultimately the founder, Gregory Leggett, he is an eighteen year old entrepreneur and college student attending St. John's University. He can ultimately provide a unique perspective on what type of clothing should be sold as well as great ideas on how to aggressively market Retro on social media to his peers. Not to mention the company has a fashion consultant who has worked with women from reality tv shows like the real housewives, and has styled many models in clothing campaigns for companies like target, ross, marshals, and forever 21.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Retro By Gregory Benjamin needs to raise 30,000$. the purpose for this funding is to insure that this business concept can be turned into a reality, we will be using the finances contributed to actually advertise, market, register, license, and set up the companies website along with purchasing clothing from manufacturer.

The Impact

Retro will be unique unlike any other clothing company. We will provide our own line of trendy fashion but we will also focus on creating a major presence through social media which ultimately will gain the company a major following base. Retro will also be unique in the since that we will be collaborating often with many other clothing lines in order to not only make a presence but create something unique and trendy. this company will ultimately be influencing the younger generations and attempting to create a positive impact on them.

Risks & Challenges

  • We really don't have any risked involved in this company, the people on the team for Retro have plenty of years of experience in the business, fashion, and financial industries.
  • The only risk is your peers trying to steal your new Retro clothing!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute you can still share with your friends and family on social media!
  • thank you for your awesome support!

story:
Our N1 backpack intertwines contemporary design cues with technical and sustainable materials. 

Made for the Modern Commuter, and Designed for All-Weather. 

 

Our Story

The majority of technical bags in the market have niche consumers in mind. Made for the likes of backpackers and bike couriers who might benefit from the heavy function-focused design, we strongly felt these bags lacked the stylistic discretion sought after by the modern commuter. 

And so, we went about designing a bag for the modern commuter: a sleek backpack that can easily carry your essentials & tech while seamlessly being as stylish as you.

The most difficult part was incorporating both vegan and recycled materials to create this collection. And, after more than a year of testing, we are thrilled to be unveiling our N1 backpack to you all.

Design Process

Our design and material requirements led us to more than a year-long journey to find innovative suppliers and factories who could bring our concepts to life.

We had 3 different iterations as shown here:

Starting from the far left, with each variation, we perfected our design, materials, and hardware for durability and function.

The culmination of our efforts led to our N1 backpack design. It was put to test while commuting on bikes to airplanes and through various weather conditions. 

The bag more than met our daily expectations, and we cant wait to see you enjoy it as well.

Main Features

1. Easy Tech Access

We created a separate compartment for easy access to all your tech. It's encased with a water-resistant zipper lining for added peace of mind against unforeseen weather changes.

Within this separate compartment, you'll find a padded laptop sleeve made to fit a 13in laptop. It additionally has 2 open pockets for your additional tech essentials like portable batteries and chargers. 

For those requiring multiple phones, these extra pockets can fit most large or phablet-sized mobile devices as well. 

2. Recycled Polyester

We are committed to reducing the plastic waste that is currently plaguing our planet. And so, instead of using new materials, we decided to source recycled polyester for the inside lining of our bags. Although this increased our cost of production, we were not willing to compromise on this essential detail.

3. Weatherproofed with Vegan Materials

Using Vegan Leather, DWR Coated Nylon, and Water Resistant Zipper lining, we ensured the bag could withstand rain, sleet, and snow for when you are caught off guard by the inclement or tropical weather. 

Unlike traditional leather, Vegan Leather is incredibly hydrophobic. It's durability also remains uncompromised in wet conditions, unlike real leather. You'll find more information on this just below, underneath the Materials section. 

The laptop compartment additionally features a water-resistant zipper lining for added peace of mind.

This is the bag that can travel wherever you go, and most importantly, in whichever inclement condition your commute might entail.

4. Carry-on Friendly

Our bags can attach to most carry-on rollers. With our separate tech compartment, the N1 backpack is designed to help you breeze through airports, especially through the security checks.

Specifications

N1 backpack is our medium-size collection, primarily designed to fit a 13in laptop.

  • Height: 40cm
  • Depth: 16cm
  • Width: 31cm
  • Adjustable straps are padded for comfort and include ventilation
  • 1 padded sleeve  for laptops or tablets + 2 pockets designed to hold chargers, batteries, and extra phones
  • Water-resistant zipper lining for the tech compartment
  • 1 large front pocket
  • 1 inner zippered pocket for valuables

Materials

We believe in doing our best to preserve the planet with every collection we design.

Vegan Leather - Cruelty-free, synthetic leather made from premium PU outer shell for durability and water-resistance, it additionally features microfiber layer on the backside for additional plush texture -- just like real leather but with technical properties. This material can withstand heavy rain or sleet and is used to reinforce the bag for both shape and technical properties.

Recycled Polyester - We use polyester originating from used plastic bottles to line our bags. Made to be durable as newly spun polyester. 

Water-Resistant Nylon -  Tear-resistant fabric with a luxurious sheen, it has been finished with a durable water-resistant treatment.

Timeline & Availability

  • The campaign will run 30 days from Feb 23-March 24th. 
  • The first 40-60 bags are set to be delivered by the first week of May (or late April at the earliest). And, the next batch will be delivered within 3-4 weeks. The order will be sent out in the sequence it was placed. 
  • If our campaign goal is met sooner, we will ready the bags just as quickly as the goal is met.
  • In all our steps, we will aim to expedite the process and inform you of the progress.

Project Risks and Challenges

There are 2 main issues that may cause delays.

1. Shipping Delays - As the shipment is being sent over by sea, we may incur delays should there be unaccounted weather, or if there are delays with any of the shipping routes. Also, in the unlikely event that the cargo is damaged, we may run into unforeseen delays as we work through resupplying the bags.  To ensure we minimize the chances of these unlikely events, we are working with the most reliable and largest shipping companies who are fully committed to timely delivery. 

2. Manufacturing Delays - We may run into delays if our suppliers are in a short supply of the specified materials required for both the vegan leather and recycled polyester. As well, we may run into manufacturing delays in the case of an unforeseen spike in demand. To go around this, we'll do our best well in advance than the recommended date to have the bags delivered on time.

If any issues should arise, we will note them with you at the earliest time possible, and we'll always keep you in the loop.

story:
We are offering the above perks for our campaign contributors. For each donation which hits the price stated in the below chart, you will receive a bag in the colour of your choice: (we will be in touch at the end of the campaign for colour confirmation if successful).

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOU

Over the past year, we have worked all hours available developing, testing and improving the Eco One. This campaign was launched in the hope we can reach our goals and really bring the product to life. Your kind pledges will go towards:

1. Placing the first mass production order of the Eco One bag - reaching factory MOQ's

2. Assist with Transport costs associated with delivering stock into our UK Warehouse space ready to send on to all of you.

Your contribution will ultimately help us in reaching our goal of launching our sustainable brand, and we hope this can be the first of many more sustainable items in the very near future!

Reaching our campaign goal would also mean we can make use of and prevent 12 recycled plastic bottles per backpack from reaching our landfills, rivers and oceans, improving the environment for future our generations. The more pledges, the more bottles we re-use.

 

TESTING & MANUFACTURING FACILITY

The bags have been put through it's paces with rigorous product testing both at the factory, here in the UK by ourselves, and on various testing trips which included land, sea & air. The Eco One bags are now ready for production!

We have been working with the factory producing the bags for a number of years as we both share the same vision & desire to produce quality products which are at the cutting edge of design yet now using sustainable materials.

The Factory are continually pushing the boundaries by looking for new and improved production methods and materials that will allow for even more new and interesting products to be produced from re-used materials whether plastics, leather or similar. While doing so they always ensure the correct global social and ethical standards are met both for the both factory itself and also the materials they use. Active Sedex and also Global Recycling Standard cerfitications are held by the factory.

 

DELIVERY

As a team we have strong product and project management experience of launching new products to market and fully understand the processes involved in manufacturing, transporting and delivering products on time. Rest assured we have everything planned to the finest detail to deliver the Eco One Backpack when we say we will.

Due to the current worldwide issues with COVID-19 we have factored in additional time to allow the products to be produced, shipped and arrive at the end destination in the quality we promise.

 

CURRENT LIMITATIONS

We had big visions when embarking on this campaign. Video's & Imagery showcasing the bags within hustle and bustle of city life, on scenic walks & mountain hikes, however reality is somewhat different due to the COVID 19 restrictions.

Our NEW daily commutes from the bedroom to the office (which is also the kitchen), and our long walks and mountain hikes now limited to the end of the garden are far from scenic!

With this in mind, you may need to use your imagination at times! We do have some early shots from a local beach and surround area in the UK which should help!

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

We’re focused on producing products that not only are made from recycled materials but also where our economic footprint is as minimal as possible. Packaging, shipping and the surrounding aspects are all as environmentally friendly and low impact as possible.

The products are high quality meaning they will last for many years to come, yet even at the end of its life, the product is fully recyclable and something longer term would are looking to implement a solution for via Trade in options.

Due to the current World crisis of COVID-19 we have safeguarded against potential delays posed by the virus outbreak and included sizeable buffers through our planning and delivery, however this does not mean this will not change depending on governmental restrictions. We have included an additional month onto our standard buffer for delivery where this margin for delay covers any issues at the factory, plus also delays with official paperwork through customs due to limited staff and also couriers delivering to our backers.


Three Peaks and our partners along the supply chain will only carry out the required work if the working environment is safe to do so and government measured are met.
If any delays occur due to the current situation and pass the exaggerated buffer we have implemented, all backers will be notified at the earliest opportunity with full details of why from the outset.

 

ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITMENTS

The Eco one bag is made from the highest quality RPET material that has been full tried and tested and approved by the Global Recycling Standard ensuring the product is not only Sustainable but strong and durable. The product has been internally tested at the factory for its strength and durability and is also something we at Three peaks have used ourselves and really put through it's paces, but just to help, within each product, we will be offering a Care Leaflet that will advise customers on how to look after their bag to maximise the life of the product such as wash instructions.

 

PACKAGING

The packaging is simple and in the form of a mail order paper bag. It is strong enough to protect the products during shipment where it needs to go, yet fully recyclable at end of use. Items will be individually packaged in this format from the factory meaning it will reduce the need for any additional packaging to be added before when sending to you!

 

 

REUSABILITY & RECYCLABILITY

As the products are made from recycled PET bottles, the bags are fully recyclable at the end of their life however,  we do also hope in the future if the project is funded, to set up a trade in policy which would allow backers to return their backpacks that we could re-cycle into new backpacks, and in return offering a discount on a brand new item.

 

SUSTAINABILITY

The Bag itself is made from 100% recycled PET bottles, everything from the outer shell to its inner compartments, straps and Zip covers are all produced using Recycled PET material. Every bag uses 12 recycled plastic bottles to create the bag which saves those bottles from littering our oceans, rivers and beaches.
As for the packaging used, whether the inner cards and leaflets, as well as the outer brown mail order bag that will be used to ship to our backers will all be made from recycled brown card that can be fully recycled at the end of its life.

 

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY FACTORIES

The Factory that we have partnered with and will be producing our products hold current and up to date Certification and Audits from both the Global Recycling Standard and Sedex external audits meaning that the factory not only operate in an Socially and Ethically correct manner, but also are using fully approved recycled materials within their manufacturing process.

 

SHIPMENT & DELIVERY

Our plan is to ship orders to campaign backers in Sep 2020. By working with a manufacturer we fully trust and a secure and experienced UK based shipping company we are confident we can achieve this goal.

Delivering quality and fantastic customer service is very important to us, and we have vast experience in our team in order to ensure this is maintained.

We have safeguarded against potential delays posed by the virus outbreak, however please note we and our partners along the chain will only do so if the working environment is safe and government measured are met.

 

SUSTAINABLE FULFILMENT & DISTRIBUTION

To help reduce the need for re-packing any items ready to send to customers we have decided that every backpack will be packaged at source in it's Brown Recycled Mail order bags that removes the requirement for any additional boxes and waste.
In addition the fulfillment and distribution partner we are looking to use if successful are continually looking to reduce their carbon footprint by investing in low consumption lighting and heating for all warehousing, as well as teaming up with low emission couriers who when combined form the largest all electric delivery fleet in the UK.

 

OTHER PRACTICES WE ARE IMPLEMENTING

If successful and Three Peaks is able to launch its Eco One Bag, for all Mainstream sales following this Kickstarter campaign, we will be donating 5% of the sales revenue per bag to an Ocean plastics charity who are also tirelessly working to reduce the impact that single use plastics is having on our planet. We hope the donations made from the purchases of our bags will support their great cause and make a real difference for future generations.

 

SUMMARY

In a nutshell... what we have is a Recycled, Anti Bacterial Backpack, which boasts high end quality, is packed with practical features and yet competitively priced for all. A sustainable bag for the future, a bag which gives back to the environment, and ultimately something we can all be proud of.

 

FOLLOW US

Please feel free to share this campaign with friends, family & on social media, we appreciate any support we can receive, thank you! 

Instagram: instagram.com/threepeaks_eco

Facebook: facebook.com/Three-Peaks-Eco

Website: threepeaks-eco.co.uk

#EcoOneBag

 

CONTACT

If you have any questions or just want to get in touch, please email us at: contact@threepeaksco.co.uk

story:
Short Summary

Hey guys. Thank you for showing interest in my campaign. Extreme sports if you will have always been an interest of mine. I grew up wearing billabong and idolizing Tony Hawk. Well now I would like to take the leap of faith and start my own skating brand , Killuminati Grim Seeker. Fortunately I have been able to begin this journey but to take it to the level I want it to be at and what it deserves to be at is going to need a little help from you. This is something i am very passionate about and something I have been working very very hard on acheiving. The thought of using a crowdfunding site never crossed my mind as i've just been driving more for doordash and using other outlets to obtain funding for my cloth9ing brand. The risk factor is obviously high as there are tons of clothing brands out there but what makes me different is my initiative and don't give up attitude no matter what.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding I will so graciously acquire off of this site is going to working capital and advertisement. I have already begun the process of trademarking certain logos to protect my work and myself. I have put alot of thought, time and effort into this project and just need a little help from you to make the impact i know this brand can and will make. I plan on investing in a store front and possibly adding in a skate ramp to incorporate the sport that this brand is being funded around. 

The Impact

To be completely honest this is going to be a leap of faith for anyone including myself. The fact that i have invested every bit of the rest of my life savings into this should show you how serious and goal oriented i am at making this dream a reality. The risk is always there for any project you do in life but if you don't try how do you know you wont succeed? I am putting everything  i have into this including my faith and now i ask that you return the favor and put some faith into me. 

Risks & Challenge

There are always risks when starting something new. The question is do you have what it takes to look past those risks and do whatever it takes to succeed? Well I'm telling you I do have what it takes. I've done some financial planning and profit margin for this is unreal. I am excellent at budgeting and putting my dollar to good use. I do take risks but i always make sure to chart it out and plan for every scenario whether good or bad. The only challenge i have met so far is the amount of fund I had to start versus life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow and share my social media pages. Check out my website and just tell people about this awesome new clothing brand / Skating brand , Killuminati Grim Seeker!

story:
KAIROS is an innovative watch measuring not only minutes and hours in a day, but also the emotions that you feel every single moment: passion, fear, anger, calm and love

 

 

 

 
 

Putting Life into Your Time

 

The more fast-paced our world becomes, the more we lose sight of what matters in each day – the quality of our time, the joy in our lives, the magic of every moment. We check the time constantly – but what we are looking for? Instead of watching the numbers that signify the moments as they pass us by, we should be watching the moments themselves and enjoying them for all that they are worth. Sadly, most people get caught up in a cycle of urgency and catch-up, thinking that they never have the time that they need to do everything that they want to do.

 

In Ancient Greek, there were two words to express the concept of time: Chronos and Kairos. Chronos is quantitative, and Kairos is qualitative. There is the time that ticks by on the clock and the time that you fill up with life – if you're fortunate enough to do so. We get the word "chronological" from the Ancient Greek Chronos, but Kairos, on the other hand, is something that may seem a little more obscure to some people. However, the concept may be obscure but not the feeling itself. After all, each of us knows what it means to fill up our time with fun, vibrancy and goodness.

 

 

 

Inspired by time in the Kairos meaning, KAIROS is a watch that measures not only the seconds, minutes, and hours in a day but the emotions that you feel in each moment: your passion, anger, fear, happiness, calm, and love. Made from lava stone, KAIROS gives you a sense of how well you are living your life and not just how much time you have to do this and how much time has passed since that. There are two versions of KAIROS, one that reveals your mood and the actual time and one that tells you just your mood. This happens as the lava changes color following your mood.

 

This is an anti-time watch, the first of its kind. The display features natural lava volcanic stone and the mood stone underneath records your body temperature in order to show your mood with lava details. It is changing to red, green, indigo, black, and blue and other colors, correlating to your unique "inner" state.

 

 

While other watches run on Chronos, our watch shows your Kairos moments, the "inner" unique time that you are feeling. This way, you get to realize the quality of your time, discerning all your most magical moments as they happen and seeing all your emotions as they arise.

 

KAIROS features a real blade, which symbolizes the process of cutting time, and because of this combined with the natural volcanic lava ( a stone of rebirth from the Earth's core), you can count on it for an intense but calming energy, perfect for soothing anxiety, anger, and other negative emotions.

 

KAIROS watch features:

 

There are two versions of KAIROS, one that tells you your mood and the time and one that tells you just your mood.

 

Size - 44MM X 12MM

Movement -  JAPAN MIYOTA Quartz

The mood lava details , that change color based on your mood - records your body temperature via liquid crystal and quartz stones placed on the back side of the watch , similar to the mood ring

Case - Stainless steel , Matte black

Straps - 3 options : Black Crocodile Italian Leather , Black Carbon Leather , Black Sport Rubber

Glass - Scratch proof , Sapphire coated

Display - Natural lava volcanic stone

Headquarters in Rome, Italy and Zug , Switzerland

 

 

 
 

 

 

The Impact

 

The energy of KAIROS has the power to heal, gives courage and strength to whoever wears it. We are offering it with a variety of strap options so that there is a KAIROS watch for everyone who wants one.

We believe wholeheartedly in the spiritual value of this product. By supporting our campaign, you are helping us to extend this power and this spiritual value to people all around the world.

story:
The idea is to have ability to charge your phone or any device anywhere you go with solar power without taking power banks or other bulky devices.

GREEN wallet should have features that others dont have, it's exclusive.

Let's start :

1. Wallet will be made from high quality leather "Power Horse", all the scuffs and marks can easily be cleaned and it will look like new.

2. Solar panel can be flexible and water resistant.

3. High quality Li-Ion or Li-Po battery with safety features (such as overcharge, short circuit protection and so on)

4. Quick Charge 4.0 and Power Delivery technologies should be implemented.

At this moment early first prototype is avalilable. Now a bit of time and money needed for testing different components and implementation of all features.

Later i will also create voting for everybody to choose additional features to implement (for example: Custom colors/ GPS tracking/ Wireless charging)

Please share and support!

Thank you!

story:
Thank you in advance to everyone who is taking the time to look at our indiegogo page. Whether you purchase a perk or not, we truly appreciate you giving us the time of day

 

What even is V I T A?

Have you ever been walking around and ran into someone wearing something very similar, if not identical to what you're wearing? This is something that’s happened one too many times to me... which is what gave me the idea for something different. The idea behind V I T A is a watch that’s limited in supply, meaning not everyone will be able to obtain it. 

 

Okay so that means not as many people will have it, but how is that different?

Each watch will have an engraved numeral on the back of it. This will represent the unit of production you’ve received out of the limited supply, meaning no two numbers will be the same. For our first line of production, we will release 100 units of each color, which are available for purchase on the perks section of this post. 

 

That’s awesome, but once they’re gone what happens?

Once they’re gone, they’re gone. We do not re-release designs, as it ruins the reputation of a brand. With that being said, we will be releasing a new line of watches every month on the 1st. Our designs will be in line with the newest trends & styles, ensuring that you won't be left in the past.

Our vision

Our vision for V I T A is to become the watch brand that can stand behind you, while you stand behind it. We are a brand of its word and want the opportunity to show you that. In a world that seems to consist of many copycats and followers, we want to stand out among the crowd, and want you to join us on this journey. We want you to know that the watch you have on your wrist cannot be found anywhere else in the world. The one of a kind feeling is what we truly hope to give to our customers, empowering them to be different.  

 

Again, we will NOT RE-RELEASE designs. 

Sorry, I had to reiterate this just to make sure people understand.

 

Plans for funding

This campaign was set forth to raise money for our first line of production. We are currently lined up and ready to move forward with production but are missing one thing…. funding. After saving for over a year, we still find ourselves $5000 short of the amount needed to bring these watches to life. By purchasing one of our perks, you are empowering us to help spread the word about our unique vision, while receiving one of our beautiful limited watches. You are helping us take the first step on our journey, and we will forever be indebted to you. The least we figured we could do is offer a deep discount for those who are choosing to support us in the early stages of this journey. 

Even if you aren’t able to purchase a perk, we would still appreciate any help you can give us through the power of spreading the word. By sharing this page with others and getting it out to as many people as possible, our chances of reaching our goal & being able to deliver these one of a kind watches to you will increase tremendously. Something as simple as a share, tweet, or even Facebook post would go a long way, and we would really appreciate it. Thank you in advance!

 

THE COLLECTION

For our first collection, we will be offering 4 unique styles.

 

WATCH SPECIFICS 

Size: 40mm

Band width: 20mm

Movement: Japanese Quartz

Case: Stainless steel

Case width: 7.5mm

Glass: Hardened mineral crystal

Buckle: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel

 

 

 

 

 

WARRANTY BACKED 

If you notice any problem with watch that isn't cosmetic damage caused by you, we'll happily take it back & replace it for you (1year guarantee)

FUTURE CHALLENGES

As with any company, V I T A will run into a few challenges down the line. We want you to know that we will continue to move forward in this industry, regardless of the challenges we face. We hope to empower people across the world with our unique pieces, giving them the confidence they need to stand out, without having to stand alone. 

If funded, what’s the next step?

The manufacturing company we are currently working with has been on stand by waiting for the purchase order. Once funding is released from Indiegogo, we will place the deposit for the order and have the watch to you in the next 60 days. We understand that you are going out on a limb by purchasing from a brand you have never heard of. We want to truly thank you for taking a chance with us, and want to ensure you that you will be satisfied with what you receive.

 

From us to you, Thank you!

story:
Hi! I'm Kimberly Holt. I am the inventor of the Light Up My Life Maternity Band. I want to share with you why I am so passionate about this project. 
 

This project has been about 7 years in the making!
I am a mother to a beautiful 6 year old, and yes, I am almost 50! 

After having 3 grown children and being pregnant with my 4th, I realized how awesome it would have been to be able to share the movement of my babies with my husband and my kids. I have a three grown children and two are new parents of babies of their own. I am a very proud grandmother of two beautiful baby girls. I would give anything to have had the Light Up My Life Maternity Band while my girls were pregnant. So I don't want to waste any more time. I'll be ready for the next one!

It's important to be consistent when you're counting kicks and if you don't have the ability to focus it could mean trouble. With a rule of thumb being that you should count at least 10 movements in an hour, mom doesn't have to try to remember, or heaven forbid guess. The LUML Maternity Band counts baby's kicks accurately so she doesn't have to. Women are busy! They are busy working and running errands, keeping house and taking care of their families. It has nothing to do with being lazy. It can be hard to not get distracted when you're trying to count manually. The band can be worn optionally under your clothing for discretion and a wristband will communicate with it or send notifications to your smartphone when activated. This brings great peace of mind when you haven't noticed a lot of activity and really need to be monitoring.

I think the really great thing about it is that it's not an intimidating device. It doesn't play on the fears and paranoia of the mother to count baby's kicks. It is a fun instrument that just happens to have the benefit of reassuring mom that baby is doing just fine!

I am genuinely looking forward to getting the band into production. I hope you will join us and be a part of something really great!

Although we have a working prototype and it is patent pending, I still feel this is in conception mode.  I originally did not intended it as a medical device; however, I really feel that it should be, and this is why:

Counting kicks is a great way to meditate and bond with your baby. But feeling those kicks and movements are far from just fun thrills—they're also a super important way for mom to monitor (and protect) her developing baby. When I created the LUML maternity band it was with the intention of adding a little excitement to the pregnancy. However, when I discussed it with other expectant mothers I discovered that my work was actually more valuable than I had previously thought! While the band generated a lot of excitement as an entertainment device, the real value was in its ability to detect the movement of the baby to ensure it's health.

Mothers in their last trimester are expected to count kicks as a way to ensure baby's health. And as it turns out, it's not as easy as it sounds. It's easy to forget or lose track of kicks. While there is currently nothing like the LUML Maternity Band, there are devices that let you count kicks manually. You feel a movement, you push the button, and voila you keep track... but it's not a very reliable method and as we soon found out, moms don’t really like it! It's actually inconvenient and a bit of a nuisance.  So we added an LED display counter! We all know monitoring your baby's activity, especially in the last trimester is very important and currently the most reliable method, is of course, manually counting kicks, but check this out...

 

The Light Up My Life Maternity Band Can Count Kicks for You!

 

It goes even further to include fun lights and sounds, including soft musical tones and even personal recordings like baby laughter or family voices that can help to provide reassurance of baby's health when it can be difficult to focus.  

Wireless capability! A wireless component will send kick alerts to your smartphone and to a wristband worn by mom or other family members.


 

HOW IT WORKS

THE BRIGHTNESS OF THE LED LIGHTS AND THE VOLUME OF THE SOUND ARE DETERMINED BY THE INTENSITY OF BABY'S KICKS.


 

The Light Up My Life Maternity Band is completely safe for baby and for mom. It uses only sensors that measure topical movement of the abdomen and does not utilize any type of ultrasound. It features a thick black-out panel as not to disturb baby.

The band is easy to recharge using a standard USB charger. Made of lightweight and breathable jersey fabric, it's designed to slip comfortably over your favorite maternity band or under or over your clothes!

 

You can easily turn off the lights or turn off the sound or both. The counter will only turn off when the band is off and can be reset at any time by just turning off the band and turning it back on. 

 


Sure baby can light up mom's face, but what if baby could light up an entire room?  A removable SD card allows you to record your own sounds. You can record anything!

The Light Up My Life Maternity Band comes with a set of default tones, but you can add your own family voices, baby laughter.. anything you want! Record your experiences to share with your child later!

Peace of mind is everything, especially when it comes to your child. The Light Up My Life Maternity Band is designed to reassure mom AND dad of baby's well-being. 

So often fathers seem to feel a little left out until baby arrives and then it suddenly the whole thing can be a bit overwhelming. Watching over baby while mom is resting helps to create a sense of closeness with the child before he or she is born. Dad can look forward to the birth with a little more confidence in his abilities!

 

 

What we will do with funds.

We want to accomplish these things before production:

  • Wireless accessories to send notifications to your smartphone and LCD counter displays for wristbands for mom and family members.
  • Better fitting capabilities. We want to achieve a one-size-fits all to eliminate exchanges based on incorrect sizing. We will hire a great designer to make sure it's not only aesthetically pleasing, but because this is a maternity belly band it needs to be more ergonomic to help support the abdomen and relieve fatigue on the back.
  • We are considering a few other sensors to address a sensitivity issue leading to a more reliable method to monitor kicks as the band can occasionally mistake mother's movements for baby. We have built the band using Arduino programming; however, the parts are expensive and this can certainly be accomplished in other languages using less pricey parts and by a professional programmer. We want everyone to be able to afford a band.
  • We want to experiment with other speakers and soundboards for optimum sound quality and reduction in battery use.
  • We want to redesign the mainboard panel to not be so bulky.
  • We want to meet with with trusted and recognized doctors in the field to make sure we have every possible safety issue covered. Although no ultrasound is used and the panel prevents baby from being disturbed, official recognition from prominent professionals is a priority. This requires backing to do a bit of traveling.
  • We have a great little team here but we need more help getting the word out. We need funds for social media advertising.

If we do not meet our funding goals we will do as much as we can and continue going forward.

 

 

 

 

 

This is a wonderful tool for new parents.

One of our visions we hope to achieve is to make it available in OBGYN and midwife facilities as a rental.  This would eliminate it ending up in a box or in a landfill later down the road. 

If we can present the LUML Maternity Band as a medical device, rather than just an entertainment device it would have a considerable effect on the last trimester. We know that peace of mind is priceless. Can you imagine Grandma calling you from across the country to tell you she hasn't seen any activity in awhile? While this might seem silly or annoying to some, to most expectant parents and grandparents it is truly a moving experience and serves a vital purpose.  Baby's health is important to everyone! While early warning systems are critical in every aspect of life, this is a child's life and well-being we're considering. We think that's a pretty special reason to make this band!

We appreciate your support!!!

 

 

Please visit our website!
