Designed for all day wear, from morning workouts to evening nights out
Available in 38mm & 42mm Silver, 38mm & 42mm Space Black
Additional diamond like carbon (DLC) layer applied to Space Black band for sleek appearance and additional durability and scratch resistance
38mm fits wrists 130-210mm (Additional 10mm extension links will be available for purchase @ $5 each)
42mm fits wrists 150-215mm (Additional 8mm extension links will be available for purchase @ $5 each)
Normal retail price will be $99


Who are we?


HYPER by Sanho Corporation has been making award winning Apple accessories since 2009 and are no strangers to crowdfunding, this being our 8th crowdfunding project. Our previous crowdfunding projects, CloudFTP, iStick, Pearl Kickstarter, Pearl Indiegogo, iPin for iPhone/Android, iPin for iPhone, HyperDrive for MacBook have altogether raised over $1.6 million.
Shout out to Michael Soo & Capture The Look Team


We highly recommend Michael Soo and the Capture The Look team. We have been working with Capture The Look for all our animation, videography and photography needs in ALL our crowdfunding projects.
Capture The Look team crafted our video from its concept to motion. They are the recipient of one of the highest awards in photography by the largest photography magazine in the world. Capture The Look team fuses life, love and art into a blend of poetic imagery and motion cinema. Check them out for your next project!


Risks and challenges
No project is without their risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Kickstarter/Indiegogo. We are also no strangers to Apple accessories or crowdfunding.
The HyperLink 316L Stainless Steel Bands that you see in the above video/photos are actual production units.
With your support, we can bring HyperLink to Apple Watch users worldwide. We are ready to enter mass production and your contribution will help to reduce mass production cost and raw material bulk purchase cost to make the $59 price a reality.
We have sufficient materials to manufacture about 3,000 units now (for early birds). Beyond that, the lead time is about a month. Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger raw materials order and start mass production earlier.

story:
Sentero is now being produced by our manufacturing partners RPD. Check out the images and video below which show the final device and how it works!

 

 

The video below shows Sentero detecting 'NORTH' and triggering the haptic engine.

 
 

 

The simplicity of Sentero is the real value, feeling connected with a person or place when you are busy and time just flies by, Sentero keeps them into your conscious thought.

 

 

 

BACKED BY SCIENCE

Research has clearly demonstrated the positive health effects associated with touch and social interactions.

(see section below)

 

Sentero frees up your eyes so that you can explore the world around you - use Senteros directional haptics to navigate to new places, discover new experiences and enhance your gaming experience. 

 and more.....

Extending our senses will not only benefit us with new type of sensory input, but will also free our born with senses from them being overloaded by screens.

 

This product is for people wishing to explore further and are curious about the universe. We live in a global community where we can travel across the globe pretty easily compared to our ancestors, which means we spend a lot of time far from those that we care about. And phone calls are not always possible due to busy schedules and different time zones.

Sadly, now we are experiencing the other extreme, where our movement is restricted and so we have much less connection to those outside our homes. We understood that in both realities an enhanced sense of orientation, location, proximity and navigation is very relevant to our existing life and future as a species - how we move and connect to one another on our planet and beyond.  Sentero allows you to stay connected through personalized haptic stimulations. 

 

 

this image is an animated gif, please allow time to load

The device extends your sensory reach beyond that of you visual field, allowing you to feel Nests that in distant locations.

 

Sense people and places when you turn to face them (left picture) or if you hold your arm out to scan for their direction (right picture).

 

It works like most of our senses, based on directional sensory input - when you look at something you see it, when you turn away you see something else. With Sentero when you turn to face the direction of a Nest you will receive a novel haptic stimulus (vibration), giving you the new perception of their location through touch, wherever they may be on the planet.

Over time your brain learns to associate a specific vibration with the person or place you have chosen to sense, just as we learn to recognise a group of letters as a word. The haptic stimulus moves from being a conscious perception to an unconscious one, meaning you no longer have to think of what you are sensing you just know - creating an enhanced sense of orientation!

Use the Sentero App to choose which Nests you want to sense and personalise the haptic patterns for each. 

Only connected wearers can consent to sense each other, and you can turn on/off others permission to sense you anytime. 

 

Sentero is a upgrade of our previous device NorthSense, which had 1 function - to sense the magnetic north. Sentero evolves from this with extra features.

See what the wearers had to say about their journey and why you should experience sensory enhancement with us!

 

 

Human Nests - You can sense the direction of your loved ones, such as your family, anywhere in the universe. If you decide to walk towards them, you will meet.

 

With 2 Sentero you have the added features of sending and receiving haptic emojis and sensing each other's heartbeat! 

BUT

While two is awesome, one Sentero is also great: You don't need to have 2 Sentero to enhance yourself and make the best out of this experience. With 1 Sentero you still have tonnes of great features - you can sense places and memories and still sense people who don't have a Sentero but have downloaded the app! 

 

           

Sentero creates a unique and personal way of connecting with someone in another city, continent or planet. With time, as you get used to someone’s heartbeat, you could also sense the differences in rhythm. What you feel is live and will allow you to understand their physical and emotional status.

 

this image is an animated gif, please allow time to load

 

Mass Connectivity - Connect as group to one person. Sense your yoga teacher when following a class from home. 

 

The ability to Sense the Magnetic North is always ON and connects you to the planet we live on. We experience the world through our senses - but they are limited. By adding a new perception of the magnetic field, like birds have, we open up our world to experience new realities.

 

Location Nests - You can sense locations that have meaning for you - home, your studio, a place of memories, and even the stars!

 

Sentero can sense anything that has gps coordinates, and using an API you can create new content for this sense which can be used for major industries, such as Gaming, VR, Social Media, Travelling … let your imagination flourish. You could then share your creation for other Sentero owners to use and enjoy. ​

 

You can choose to use Sentero in combination with the SiiD implant to enhance your cyborg experience. By injecting the programmable NFC chip you will receive extra features.

SiiD is not available on this campaign, but can be purchased separately, details on our website.

 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES WITH SiiD:

PHONE SOCIAL LINK
To close the loop, when a Nest is sensed, by tapping on your SIID implant with your smartphone you can trigger an app or web-link that links to the person or place we are sensing. Send them a message, call them, open a picture of you together or post something on their social media.

 

At CyborgNest we invest in humans not machines, we strive to develop innovative technologies that expand your perception of the world. We experience the world through the input we receive from our senses. By adding new information we open up new capacities for our brain to think and create in novel ways. Because we can see we created architecture, because we can hear we created music, if we enhance our senses what might we be able to create? By creating sensory enhancement devices we open up human experience to include the hidden parts of nature which are thus far untapped by our natural senses. 

We aim to create technology that makes us more human, connecting us to the planet and to each other. While others invest in developing machines we dedicate our research to exploring human evolution, investing in humans and not devices. Why spend so much time and money on making technology smarter, when we can make ourselves smarter?

 

 

WE HAVE BUILT A VERSATILE TEAM OF DIVERSE EXPERTS TO BE ABLE TO ACHIEVE EXTRAORDINARY THINGS

 

 

 

 

 


We believe in disruptive technology which enables use to design our evolution. 

By expanding your perceptual field with smart senses you further unleash your brain’s potential to think and create in novel ways.

 

The perception of an enhanced human, or 'cyborg', is often seen as the physical integration of technology and the human body. This vision predominantly comes from fiction, we see it slightly differently. After the release of the NorthSense we saw the impact it had on the owners perception of reality, augmenting their understanding of space and enhancing memory recall. It was clear that our focus should be on the affect our technology could have on the brain, which adapts to the new sensory input through neuroplasticity. Whether physically connected, implanted, or simply worn, devices mediate our perception of our world and create a hybrid cognition. 

 

​

 

Neuroscience research has demonstrated that memories have a spatial grid-like representation suggesting that the mechanisms of spatial and episodic memory are similarly structured. In this case, having an additional sensory reference in spatial memory could improve both spatial and episodic memory encoding and retrieval.

         

this image is an animated gif, please allow time to load

Sentero locates you at the centre of your Cyborg Network, surrounded by the people and places that are important to you - we call these your Nests. 

If two loved ones choose to sense each other through the Sentero App - Sentero will vibrate when you are facing their direction, anywhere on the planet.

 

THE SCIENCE OF CONNECTIVITY

Research has clearly demonstrated the positive health effects associated with touch and social interactions. Sentero can increase your feeling of connectedness, help to minimise feelings of social isolation and thereby improve mental wellbeing. Whereas social media connections are abstract and therefore hard to concretise Sentero makes connections concrete, physical and directly relatable.

 

The ability to Sense the Magnetic North is always ON and connects you to the planet we live on, this acts as a cognitive anchor.

You can sense where your home is, or other locations that have meaning for you. You can navigate there like a bird.

 

 

 

THE SCIENCE OF ORIENTATION

At its core, the Sentero provides an external spatial point of reference that extends your local, egocentric sense of space (what you see, hear and feel) to a global, allocentric sense of orientation. The result of having an allocentric spatial sense is especially apparent in cities or inside buildings. In these environments we rely on memory to maintain our orientation relative to the external world. However, spatial memory on its own is not reliable and can easily lead to getting lost or confused, so having a constant point of reference alleviates this issue and allows your mind to realign itself.

Having a permanent external spatial point of reference means that you intuitively link the relative orientation of different locations. In practice this means that you, for example, intuitively relate the orientation of your dining table at home to the orientation of your desk at work.

 

The device is designed to sit on your inner arm, forearm or upper arm, which enables you to feel the vibrations best and detect your heart rate. You can adjust the strap size to fit you, depending on where you would like to wear Sentero. 

Sentero can sense directions when your arm is in a resting position (pointing downward) or if you reach your arm out to determine the direction of a Nest. 

The most important thing is that you always wear it on the same spot so that your brain learns to associate each vibration with a Nest - over time becoming a new sense of orientation!

 

Choose to conceal it or have it on show - your choice!

 

 

Download on App store and Google play. Choose the Nests that you want to sense and see them in your Cyborg Network.

 

this is an animated gif, please allow time to load

- Your Sentero!
- Adjustable Strap
- Charging dock
- Sentero App
 

 

Manufacturing and delivery delays due to the global pandemic have been taken into consideration for this timeline - therefore the delivery date is the latest we anticipate it being in the current circumstances, but will hopefully be earlier!

 

 

 

 

 

Enhancing ourselves is not a dream anymore, but an opportunity we have to explore. together with all of you, part of this new community, we are the ones who will shape how this future will look, and for that we are very thankful and excited on the path forward!  We believe in Human Enhancement where the role of the technology is to enrich our feelings, to bring us closer to ourselves, to each other and to the planet and ultimately to make us more human.

 

Yours, Liviu Babitz - CEO and co-founder / CyborgNest
